quote: “How you do everything is how you do everything.”
author: Byron L. Reeder

quote: “I was a box-checker – marching to the resolute beat of effort/results, effort/results – a devoted follow of the established path”
author: Michelle Obama

quote: “When circumstances demand that we do something that is not natural to our temperament or talents, we must sometimes intentionally choose by discipline what we inherently lack by nature.”
author: Jamie Arpin-Ricci

quote: “The healthy introvert understands that their personality is not a deterministic, fixed reality that they are powerless against. Being an introvert is never an excuse to shirk responsibility or to justify bad habits.”
author: Jamie Arpin-Ricci

quote: “...Be careful not to mistake early incompetency as inherent weakness.”
author: Jamie Arpin-Ricci

quote: “In any organization, someone must be the boss. If it’s even just one person, you’ve got to be the boss of yourself.”
author: Malcolm X

quote: “YELLING silences your message. Speak quietly so your children can hear your words instead of just your voice.”
author: L.R. Knost

quote: “A person either disciplines his finances or his finances disciplines him.”
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: “A strong human spirit with control over appetites of the flesh is master over emotions and passions and not a slave to them. That kind of freedom is as vital to the spirit as oxygen is to the body! Freedom from self-slavery is true liberation!”
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: “We are, each of us, largely responsible for what gets put into our brains, for what, as adults, we wind up caring for and knowing about. No longer at the mercy of the reptile brain, we can change ourselves.”
author: Carl Sagan

quote: “Freedom is the inherent strength of a compassionate involved in acts of kindness and evolved in a constant training of flexibility. There's no free spirit in a rigid body as only a mind with open willingness to change cannot get caught in a trap.”
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: “Is this what I want to be? This? I this all I got - is this everything I can give? Is this going to be my life? Do I accept that?”
author: Jocko Willink

quote: “Little eyes watch what we do far more than little ears hear what we say. It is how we live, not how we demand they live, that has the most impact on who our children will become.”
author: L.R. Knost

quote: “I began to see all disciplines as creating a vocabulary, a set of tools for understanding human life in a particular way.”
author: Paul Kalanithi

quote: “Greatness amazes only people who are not great.”
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: “Discipline is not about the rules, it is about respect.Its respect for those around you, the things you own and for yourself. Discipline is part of being a steward.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “Master the dog, and in so doing you shall master yourself.”
author: Steven James Taylor

quote: “To succeed we need committment, discipline, dedication, and determination. And if you can amalgamate all of the above qualities with your passion and energy then no one can stop you from achieving the uncommon!”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “The foundation of a strong self comes from small acts of daily discipline.”
author: Ophelia Filek

quote: “Discipline is not about rules. It's about respect. Respect for yourself and others.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “some call it influence, others call it peer pressure, i call it choice”
author: Jacob Okoku

quote: “When results are not showing at least practice discipline to show that you are responsible, running away from responsibility is a trick, it might give you an impression that its left far behind, but in reality you end—up standing just a step away”
author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quote: “Is one being a legalist if he works hard unto the Lord? Or can a Christian cruise and coast through this life?”
author: Jonathan Hayashi

quote: “By constant self-discipline and self-control you can develop greatness of character.”
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: “Cultivate an environment fertile for good habits to flourish”
author: Money Tree Man

quote: “Revolutionary’ discipline depends on political consciousness – on an understanding of why orders must be obeyed; it takes time to diffuse this, but it also takes time to drill a man into an automaton on the barrack-square.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “It was the principle of this Court that deterrent laws, however strict, are useless without positive moral discipline; that the happiness of citizens depends, not on having the walls of their porticoes covered with laws, but on having justice in their hearts.”
author: Isocrates

quote: “People who discipline themselves to get up and do things they don’t necessarily love or like doing, but do it regardless to succeed are people who will get the results and the success they are looking for.”
author: Jeanette Coron

quote: “If we are to progress in the spiritual walk so that the Disciplines are a blessing and not a curse, we must come to the place in our lives where we can lay down the everlasting burden of always needing to manage others.”
author: Richard J. Foster

quote: “Stop seeing discipline as something you hate or dislike; start embracing it, start loving it, start seeing it for the friend of your success that it really is, and start seeing comfort for the enemy of your success that it really is.”
author: Jeanette Coron

quote: “You want an experience to leave you cleansed, refreshed, and forgiven.”
author: Anastasia Vitsky

quote: “Discipline is an index of your lifebook, maintain it properly”
author: Myra Yadav Move On

quote: “Sometimes you've got to do things you dislike to get a life you’ll love to have. Sometimes you have to sacrifice joy and comfort in the present to get greater joy and comfort in the future.”
author: Jeanette Coron

quote: “Discipline without direction is drudgery.”
author: Donald S. Whitney

quote: “Peace requires a discipline more iron than war.- Easter, 1939”
author: W.J. Turner

quote: “Our defeats teach us much more than our victories ever would!”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “Endure every hardship as a discipline of grace.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Is there any Great Teacher like Jesus Christ, He taught his disciplines all that He knew..”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “I have come to realise that discipline is not about rules. Discipline is about respect.”
author: Janna Cachola

quote: “If you want more, be more.”
author: Will Craig Living the Hero's Journey

quote: “A hunter is an exceptionally disciplined man, for the parameters of his livelihood are precise.”
author: Théun Mares

quote: “To seek out the disciplined and skilled ways of the hunter is the only true honour we may rightfully claim, and to seek the impeccability of the hunter’s spirit is the only possible justification for our existence.”
author: Théun Mares

quote: “When you discipline a child, you prepare them for a responsible and accountable adulthood.”
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: “Discipline is not something which can be forced, we can make people realize its importance, that’s it; In the long run its the responsibility, commitment & an self-improvement attitude - which runs it.”
author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quote: “Discipline yourself before you discipline others.”
author: Ibn Jeem

quote: “Discipline is only a short term deterrent. It has never been responsible for long term change – only encouragement, upliftment and love can possibly do that!”
author: Elizabeth Richardson

quote: “It is one thing to praise discipline, and another to submit to it.”
author: Miguel De Cervantes

quote: “Discipline is the great equalizer. If a young woman is beautiful but has no discipline, she will lose her looks as she grows older. If a plain woman is disciplined she will undoubtedly become more beautiful with time.”
author: Sophia Loren

quote: “Bravery comes along as a gradual accumulation of discipline”
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: “Don’t let the things of the world distract you. Focus on your purpose”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Self discipline is the mother of success”
author: Topsy Gift

quote: “Passion is a Horse Given to Us to Discipline.”
author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quote: “I may deserve your disappointment as well as a lecture and strict discipline, but what I need is your understanding, your guidance, and your unconditional love.”
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: “Don’t join the queue of ignorant people who do not know that their time flies away into vanity daily. Don’t be a part of the lazy lot who cannot discipline themselves in solitude to convert their time into products or added value.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “All the things that are worth doing, take time.”
author: Mos Def

quote: “Discipline leads us to desire, which matures into delight.”
author: Missionaries Who Love The Arab World

quote: “Be disciplined and prudent in the way you manage your time”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Be disciplined and effective in your relationship with God”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is the result of an action, while refinement is a preparation of your calling.”
author: Robin Bertram

quote: “Make yourself a slave to good habits”
author: Dan John

quote: “Submission is a tyrannical discipline.”
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: “When you decide not to discipline yourself to seek for knowledge in any area, God sees it as the rejection of knowledge.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “To automatically be promoted from one class to another without any serious self- discipline, and self- improvement is a cheap life.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Do Not Dictate a Child through Someone, it Ruins the Child's Experience.”
author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quote: “When you begin to pursue your promised land, you get a lot of prohibitions and temptations”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “It is better to be a discipline than a follower.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Pain is a physical discipline.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Life demands discipline in order to succeed in it.”
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: “One of the major requirement for life's success is discipline.”
author: ANIKOR Daniel

quote: “Discipline is the thing that makes you do what you might not want to, but you do it anyway because it's what you have to do in order to get what you want or desire.”
author: Kyle Vidrine

quote: “I had a plan of action that I was going to run by Will.  He could run it up the flagpole, but I wasn’t asking permission.  My mind was made up.  I was going to The Confessional tonight too.  If she wanted atonement, I’d be happy to give it to her.”
author: kimber nilsson

quote: “Human making is our mission, but if you break the very soul of the would-be humans, then there will be no human to raise.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “Do not let the temporal pain of discipline you need to acquire knowledge stop you from acquiring it.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Embrace who you are and your divine purpose. Identify the barriers in your life, and develop discipline, courage and the strength to permanently move beyond them, and keep moving forward.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “Anyone who, neglecting that fixed hour of prayer, [will] say he can pray at all times but will probably end in praying at no time.”
author: Eric Liddell

quote: “Raise your vibration, Not your tone of voice..You gain inspiration, For Peace is a choice.”
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: “When a boy feels as if no one cares about him, or as if he will never amount to anything, he truly believes it doesn’t matter what he does.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “There’s a wound most troubled boys share, which, at its core, comes from the feeling that they don’t have their father’s unconditional love.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “The point at which things happen is a decision. In stead of focusing on yourself, focus on how you can help someone else.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “There is no shortcut for hard work that leads to effectiveness. You must stay disciplined because most of the work is behind the scenes.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “With practice, you build the road to accomplish your goals. Excellence lives in attention to detail. Give your all, all the time. Don't save anything for the walk home.”
author: Ethan Hawke

quote: “With discipline, you can lose weight, you can excel in work, you can win the war.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Creativity without discipline will struggle, creativity with discipline will succeed.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Despite what you might believe right now, your son’s future is bright. You only need the right tools to help him get there.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “Rebuke without love is abuse. But, a love that would never rebuke? I dare to admit that that, too, would be a kind of abuse.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Healing, it turns out, is a journey. It doesn’t happen all at once.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “According to most studies on the subject, boys who grow up without fathers grow up at a disadvantage.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “Greatness can only be procured with the currency of time and discipline”
author: Topsy Gift

quote: “Discipline leads us to freedom and freedom leads us to fulfillment.”
author: Farshad Asl

quote: “The average person will take the excuses, but the leader will always take responsibilities”
author: Manuel Corazzari

quote: “Discipline, not the Muse, results in productivity. If you write only when she beckons, your writing is not yours at all.”
author: Kenneth Atchity

quote: “Repose is not a discipline or practice. To experience Repose, you do not need to adhere to any specific philosophy or become proficient in any technique. There is no learning curve and no wrong way to be in Repose.”
author: Victor Shamas

quote: “Discipline sets you free.”
author: Pravin Agarwal

quote: “It’s time to stop dreaming about who you want your son to be and help him become the healthy, happy, and successful man he’s supposed to be.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “Healthy boys grow into healthy men.”
author: Clayton Lessor MA LPC

quote: “Life is a curriculum unique to every student.”
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: “Not only is this teacher educating her children in violence, she also has to continuously escalate her own violence to keep control. Her method of teaching breeds disrespect and prejudice. Her students have been dehumanized.”
author: Arun Gandhi

quote: “The only difference between where you are and where you want to be is the number of steps you haven't taken yet.”
author: Hayley Solich

quote: “Discipline yourself to do what is necessary or you won't acquire the necessary...”
author: Stephen Magnus

quote: “Discipline must be without control, without suppression, without any form of fear...It is not discipline first and then freedom; freedom is at the very beginning, not at the end.”
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: “If we don't discipline ourselves, the world will do it for us.”
author: William Feather

quote: “Be creative while inventing ideas, but be disciplined while implementing them.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “What is generally known as discipline in traditional schools is not activity, but immobility and silence. It is not discipline, but something that festers inside a child, arousing his rebellious feelings.”
author: Maria Montessori

quote: “Anyone who has ever achieved anything has been a steward of his potential.”
author: Chris Matakas

quote: “Only those who never stand up, never fall down.”
author: Fedor Emelianenko

quote: “Fasting may not be as easy as feasting, but after a while it is not too different. Both are extremes. It is not hard to go the extreme way, but what is really difficult is neither to fast nor to feast, but to be moderate in everything we do.”
author: Eknath Easwaran

quote: “ability is of no value without discipline. Winning has no style or substance without humility.”
author: Andrew Critchley

quote: “The true extent of one's discipline is revealed when motivation runs out”
author: Elias Tan JS

quote: “Then you have to be nothing. Want nothing. You can't have them-Kat or Annabel-if you need them. You're not a husband. You're not a father. You're a man with a task. Understand?”
author: Greg Hurwitz

quote: “God’s discipline has nothing to do with rejection but more to do with refinement.”
author: Gary Rohrmayer

quote: “Oddly, with discipline, structure, and order, you will find freedom, anything is possible. Without it, locating your saddle may take all morning.”
author: Ethan Hawke

quote: “I have diligently disciplined my life to search out life’s gifts in the places where life stores its scraps.”
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: “Intellectual transcendence is achieved with the leap out of where you know too much, to where you have a lot to learn; then, facing the odds and turning the latter into the starting point of a new leap to where discipline outweighs all.”
author: Majd Bassel Ostah AlHusseini

quote: “They have a special confidence in Christ, plus thoughtfulness plus faithfulness plus humility: for there are no things, in all creation, more beautiful, more rare than the so very disciplined and free, joyful and principled daughters of God.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “I discipline my mind to see past distractions, to scrutinize deceptive tendencies and to pay careful attention to details whether I am conversing with others or I’m just a passive observer.”
author: Carlos Wallace

quote: “For five years Isaac had been working eighteen hours a day.”
author: John Hudson Tiner

quote: “A five-year-old who can follow the ball for ten minutes becomes a sixth grader who can start his homework on time.”
author: Charles Duhigg

quote: “Self-discipline is about disciplined thoughts.”
author: Pearl Zhu

quote: “Education without discipline and integrity is a wasteA man who acquires school certificates but lacks self discipline and integrity is not educated.”
author: OMOSOHWOFA CASEY

quote: “The discipline of focus that is necessary to think profoundly is certainly difficult for many people to achieve.”
author: Pearl Zhu

quote: “Only those who never stand up, never fall down.”
author: John Kavanagh

quote: “Success and discipline are synonymous in life - you can't have one without the other!”
author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.

quote: “If you haven't arrived yet, keep driving, your destiny is waiting for you.”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “Discipline is to present us before grace, it does not produce grace to make sense.”
author: Richard J. Foster

quote: “Self discipline is the ability to make yourself do something you don’t necessarily want to do, to get a result you would really like to have.”
author: Andy Andrews

quote: “God will never disappoint us. He loves us and has only one purpose for us : holiness, which in His kingdom equals joy.”
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: “Do first what you don’t want to do most.”
author: Clifford Cohen

quote: “Every temptation comes with a choice.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “Popularity makes no sense If your fame is a shame.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “You have to choose whether to go to a restless sleep or to stay awake and fight for a blissful night rest.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “This woman gained comfort in her misery by thinking GREAT THOUGHTS OF CHRIST.”
author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quote: “So many wants distract man from his divine purpose.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “If deep in our hearts we suspect that God does not love us and cannot manage our affairs as well as we can, we certainly will not submit to His discipline.”
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: “Nothing has done more damage to the Christian view of life than the hideous notion that those who are truly spiritual have lost all interest in the world and its beauties.”
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: “Don't break your discipline, form it!”
author: J.R. Rim

quote: “A practice of giving [it] your best, means you don't just have to hope for it.”
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: “Mothers and fathers must be gentle at least some of the time. Mothers and fathers must also be strict at least some of the time. Most of the time, though, most mothers and fathers must be mostly strict and gentle together.”
author: Connie Kerbs

quote: “I made the exhilarating discovery that study, when it is pursued with ardour and discipline, becomes creation.”
author: W.K. Hancock

quote: “The general consensus seemed to be that if prayer didn't take care of the problem, a belt to the ass and the threat of reform school would.”
author: steven norton

quote: “To teach someone a lesson, show them how it's done. Force is a temporary solution. Judgment is no solution at all.”
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: “There is a sacred cost for everything.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “It is nothing short of a transformed vision of reality that is able to see Christ as more real than the storm, love more real than hatred, meakness more real than pride, long-suffering more real than annoyance, holiness more real than sin. - Discipline”
author: Elizabeth Elliot

quote: “It is nothing short of a transformed vision of reality that is able to see Christ as more real than the storm, love more real than hatred, meakness more real than pride, long-suffering more real than annoyance, holiness more real than sin. - Discipline”
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: “If I am to love the Lord my God with all my mind, there will not be room in it for carnality, for pride, for anxiety, for the love of myself. How can the mind be filled with the love of the Lord and have space left over for things like that?”
author: Elisabeth Elliot

quote: “Have the discipline to listen to and to trust your instincts.”
author: A.D. Posey

quote: “Good writing like good sex requires discipline.”
author: Chloe Thurlow

quote: “If you have control over yourself, you have no desire to control others.”
author: Miya Yamanouchi

quote: “You don't want captains in the army who know too much or think too much.”
author: Robert Graves

quote: “Only after a writer lets literature shape her can she perhaps shape literature. In working-class France, when an apprentice got hurt, or when he got tired, the experienced workers said, "It is the trade entering his body." The art must enter the body, too.”
author: Annie Dillard

quote: “Discipline is for professionals. Motivation is for amateurs.”
author: J.R. Rim

quote: “Violence is violence and can in no way be misconstrued as discipline under any circumstance cultural or otherwise.”
author: Aysha Taryam

quote: “Persistence in the face of failure is of course important, but it is not the same thing as dedication or passion. Persistence is a discipline that you learn; devotion is a dedication you can't ignore.”
author: Stuart Firestein

quote: “Up in that room I decided that I would write one story about each thing that I knew about. I was trying to do this all the time I was writing, and it was good and severe discipline.”
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: “We will have to work hard to rest.”
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: “Don't let your imperfections conveniently excuse you from having discipline. Have the courage to work through your imperfections.”
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: “God does not discipline us to subdue us but to condition us for a life of usefulness and blessedness. In His wisdom, He knows that an uncontrolled life is an unhappy life, so He puts reins on our wayward souls that they may be directed into the paths of righteousness.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “It’s our version of a black hole. Just like amply compact mass can distort space and time to cause a black hole, a sufficiently dense breach of discipline in our office causes a black hole that sucks the offender away for eternity, never to spit him back.”
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: “Had we not decided to perform this as gracefully as a dancer’s leap? But we turned it into a dinosaur’s dance party!”
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: “Our minds must be set always to seek the will of the Lord. Following the progressive discipline revealed through the Bible will result in a walk of obedience to God.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “To be a disciple is to be committed to Jesus Christ as Savior and Lord and committed to following Him every day. To be a disciple is also to be disciplined in our bodies, minds, and souls.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “Let us always remember that Christ calls men and women not only to trust Him as Savior, but also to follow Him as Lord. That call to discipleship must be part of our message if we are to be faithful to Him.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “If rhetoric study was the military, grammar teachers would be the drill sergeants.”
author: T.K. Naliaka

quote: “Spontaneities offer one kind of pleasure and taste of sanctity, repetitions another equally pleasurable and holy.”
author: Eugene H. Peterson

quote: “One reason we never tame the busy this beast is that we are unwilling to kill anything.”
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: “When young people are insecure, they find ways to manufacture love tests – personal metrics to reassure themselves.”
author: Sherry Turkle

quote: “Every student adheres to strict discipline”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “It is no accident that the words discipline and disciple resemble each other in the English language. The most common word in the Gospels for a Christian is disciple.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “Christ never told his disciples that they would get an Academy Award for their performances, but He did tell them to expect to have troubles.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “Jesus Christ spoke frankly to His disciples concerning the future . . .In unmistakable language He told them that discipleship means a life of self-denial, and the bearing of a cross.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “Many Christians want the benefits of their belief, but they hesitate at the cost of discipleship.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “To be a disciple of Jesus means to learn from Him, to follow Him. The cost may be high.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “We are commissioned to make disciples, to bring them into the same direct relationship with Christ as those who left their nets and their fishing boats to become “fishers of men.”
author: Billy Graham

quote: “It is not what you look at, but rather what you see that matters. Set your focus right.”
author: Emmanuel Ayensu

quote: “You’re smarter than you look,’ I say to Raffe.‘But not as smart as he thinks,’ says Howler.‘I can see discipline has broken down during your vacation,’ says Raffe.‘Yeah, it’s all that lounging on the beach with nothing to do but drink and watch women.”
author: Susan Ee

quote: “Character that is fruit-producing can be summed up in the mastery of these 5 qualities: morals, but a sense of humor; love, but respect for criticism; intelligence without pretense; humility without self-loathing; and a mind open, but with solid convictions.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Most of your unhappiness in life comes from the fact that you are listening to yourself instead of talking to yourself.”
author: John Piper

quote: “You cannot stop loving your child because you know that he has committed a wrong action. But you certainly stop loving yourself for loving him. ~ Rudransh Kashyap”
author: Kirtida Gautam

quote: “The most demanding part of living a lifetime as an artist is the strict discipline of forcing oneself to work steadfastly along the nerve of one’s own most intimate sensitivity.”
author: Annie Dillard

quote: “Good manners is the fabric that holds the community together.”
author: David Esabwa

quote: “Awards and ceremonies are all an applause of discipline.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Onde you bid farewell to discipline you day goodbye to success”
author: Alex Ferguson

quote: “Discipline at the office had long been enforced by the use of three methods: the meeting of the first kind, the meeting of the second kind, and the meeting of the third kind.”
author: Pawan Mishra

quote: “Discipline is a fast track to elevation in life.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline creates ways for the lovers of it.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “The Olympic Games is a celebration of discipline.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “All forms of achievements are all a triumph of discipline.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “The disciplined rule our world.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is needed in our lifestyle.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Desires must be fuelled with discipline”
author: Henrietta Newton Martin

quote: “Oh Man! Maternal love is a bitch. It takes a woman in its grip at the most unexpected moments. ~ Ananya Mehta”
author: Kirtida Gautam

quote: “With discipline, dedication and diligence, you will achieve the goal.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “With patient, you will get what you must have.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Discipline friends is the master of excellence.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is needed in our eating habit.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is needed in our temperance.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is needed in our pursuit.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is needed in our family lives.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “There is no aspect of life that you take that does not demand discipline. It is a requirement of life. It is not a matter of choice.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Live a life of discipline and live a life of celebration.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Learn to work on your work.”
author: David Bayles and Ted Orland

quote: “Self-discipline is the cornerstone of any endeavor.”
author: Bohdi Sanders

quote: “The harder the struggle, the bigger the gain. The important thing is to stick with it, repetitively and consistently.”
author: Mara Schiavocampo

quote: “It takes self-discipline and persistence action to achieve the goal.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “Everything we encounter today is used by God to prepare us for tomorrow. he wastes no trials, withholds no blessings, nor does he hold back on the discipline of his soldiers. All He does prepares us for future usefulness as vessels of honor.”
author: Rick Lambert

quote: “Self-discipline, self-realization and self-reliance.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “It was not by gentle sweetness and self-abnegation that order was brought out of chaos; it was by strict method, by stern discipline, by rigid attention to detail, by ceaseless labor, by the fixed determination of an indomitable will.”
author: Lytton Strachey

quote: “Discipline is when we postpone the pleasure of today for the benefit of tomorrow.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Without discipline you would not go far in life.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “When you give the supply of discipline, life becomes easy for you.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “There’s discipline, Mahrree knew, and then there’s abuse. The first works, while the second never does. And some people, like Lemuel Thorne, had no idea there was even a difference.”
author: Trish Mercer

quote: “Change does not surface when you are not ready to be the catalyst. Your reaction matters, not your inaction.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “Discipline is when we limit ourselves, put borders around ourselves.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “You cannot build a strong team unless you teach your people discipline.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “When building your team look for people who are disciplined even before they came to the Lord.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “No success was won without self- determination and self-discipline.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “...a disciplined pursuit of less will keep us focused and make the greatest impact.”
author: Tim Hiller

quote: “Everything that is online is not necessarily in line.”
author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quote: “Bonobo discipline involves being schooled in a gentler, more playful fashion.”
author: Susan Block

quote: “Living according to God's standards is an acquired taste.”
author: Rosaria Champagne Butterfield

quote: “Discipline is when we delay our gratifications.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is denying ourselves in the present so as to prepare better for the future.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is a demand of life.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “A study of the lives of successful people would show that all successful people are disciplined people.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is one of the basic and primary requirements for success in life.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “No one makes it big without discipline.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Discipline is required in all human endeavours.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “I respect traditional people - they have the eyes which see value in the tarnished. This is a gift in itself. Tradition requires a wealth of discipline in order to be adhered to, hence it is rarely found in youth.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Although this may be a most difficult thing, if one will do it, it can be done. There is nothing that one should suppose cannot be done.”
author: Tsunetomo Yamamoto

quote: “The only real difficulty with becoming disciplined is when you buy into the notion that happiness comes at the price of sacrifice. The reality is this: Discipline becomes freedom when you are doing what you love.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Freedom without discipline is foolish, discipline without freedom is insanity.”
author: Ilona Mialik

quote: “The wrath of God is never an evil wrath. God gets angry because he loves people like a mother would love her child if someone were to harm it. There is something wrong if the mother never gets angry; it is safe to say that that is the unloving mother.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Throughout your life advance daily, becoming more skillful than yesterday, more skillful than today. This is never-ending.”
author: Tsunetomo Yamamoto

quote: “The first person you have to conquer is you. This is because when at last you win over million people, the first person to bring you down could be you. Discipline yourself!”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “Discipline is a bridge built through everyday action.”
author: J.R. Rim

quote: “Selfish DreamscapesIf you have a dream, as you should, relish in being selfish about building every passionate aspect of it. The crowd of spectators and consumers will still be exactly where you left them... gossiping about everybody else's dream but their own.”
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: “The difference between punishment and discipline is a powerful child.”
author: Danny Silk

quote: “It took him (Washington) more than a year to gain control over his own aggressive instincts.”
author: Joseph J. Ellis

quote: “One should every day think over and make an effort to implant in his mind the saying, "At that time is right now." It is said that it is strange indeed that anyone is able to pass through life by one means or another in negligence.”
author: Tsunetomo Yamamoto

quote: “Never base motivation or fear, entirely.”
author: Peter Heather

quote: “Entrepreneur, the development of your daily discipline will determine then deliver your desired distinction.”
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: “Not Eve:Under any condition, in any situation, a mature woman does not need to be checked by her man. She is not childish, but fully capable of [a] self check if she respects the wisdom given to her by The Most High; her name ain't Eve.”
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: “Because discipline is misunderstood or not as valued as it has been, the United States—and some might argue the world—is experiencing a cultural leadership crisis.”
author: John    Manning

quote: “A child, like your stomach, doesn't need all you can afford to give it.”
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: “No feeling is wrong. You have the right to your feelings. However, you do not need to wallow in them, and you do not have the right to act them out. The world hasn't suddenly become your punching bag or litter tray.”
author: Anna Valdiserri

quote: “Without self-discipline, your streams of grace become a flood of disgrace. Never let indiscipline weigh you down for critics to pick mockeries on.”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “The best way to reach your Goal is to say "NO" more than you say "YES”
author: Todd Stocker

quote: “The Disciplined Leader is someone who focuses on the 20 percent of activities that drive 80 percent of results.”
author: John    Manning

quote: “Just like it is in the life of an individual or an organization, one of the catalysts of progress is discipline and order.”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “Good units walk a thin line between indiscipline and ineffectiveness. Ignore the rules too often and you’ve got a mob, but enforce the rules too strictly and you’ve got a herd.”
author: Henry V. O'Neil

quote: “wonderful people are made, not born – that the people I admired had achieved an unfakeable inner virtue, built slowly from specific moral and spiritual accomplishments.”
author: David Brooks

quote: “The key to failure is, lack of self discipline.”
author: Sivaprakash Sidhu Sivaprakash G Sivaprakash Gopal sivaprakash sidhu sivaprakash

quote: “Discipline is a kind of divine hand for the mankind on the matter of achieving great successes!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “The cornerstone of the Roman legionnaires' astonishing fighting spirit can be attributed to their training.”
author: Peter Heather

quote: “Faithfulness to one’s word is one of the principles of discipline”
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: “I no longer fear the pain...I fear no release from this torture...knowing that I've hurt him and he can't forgive me...that he won't be able to make me his good girl again.”
author: Willow Madison

quote: “There is no study that is not capable of delighting us, after a little application to it.”
author: Alexander Pope

quote: “A hammer made of deadlines is the surest tool for crushing writer's block.”
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: “Entrepreneur, become so disciplined that even your distractions become focused.”
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: “Entrepreneur, make today count and but don't let the day count you.”
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: “Anything or everything can happen. You determine how good or bad they are”
author: Constancev Chuks Friday

quote: “You have to be so disciplined that even your distractions become focused.”
author: Onyi Anyado

quote: “[Discipline i]t’s the ability to overcome the urge to grab the bright and shiny and interesting to finish what you’ve started.”
author: Kristine Kathryn Rusch

quote: “The last thing Scripture should do is make you blind in the world. Instead, you hear everything, see everything, and feel everything because everything just so happens to point right back to it.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Never discipline whom you've not discipled.”
author: Neil Kennedy

quote: “One-year enlistment had proven problematic since the troops were scheduled to rotate out of the army just when they had begun to internalize the discipline of military service and became reliable soldiers.”
author: Joseph J. Ellis

quote: “I'm not a parent myself, but I think the best solution at this point is to slap that child across the face. It won't stop crying, but at least now it'll be doing it for a good reason.”
author: David Sedaris

quote: “As one would expect, the Pope’s schedule is quite disciplined—he wakes up at four o’clock each morning and runs on the treadmill for an hour. I’m totally kidding. Nobody’s knees have time for that.”
author: Jared Brock

quote: “Don't you just love it when you're disciplining your kids and God whispers, "This is good. I hope you're listening so you can apply this same truth to your life.”
author: Lysa TerKeurst

quote: “The promises you speak over your children can take on the weight of destiny.”
author: Neil Kennedy

quote: “When everyone believes they are the life coaches, who are the players?”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “It was an inflexible maxim of Roman discipline that good soldier should dread his own officers far more than the enemy”
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: “With determination, discipline and hard work all dreams become a reality.”
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: “If every citizen can get rid of indiscipline syndrome, we have immense potential to build more productive, conflict-free, harmonious and peaceful communities, societies, cities, nations and world.”
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: “For discipline is imposed not just on oneself but on those in one's orbit.”
author: Philip Roth

quote: “We know what we should do. Age is no excuse. Do we go to others for permission or for discipline?”
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: “You can't achieve major goals with minimal work.”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “As she put it, she knew of nothing so ravishing as having a child whom she could whip whenever she was in a bad mood.("The Queen Fantasque")”
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: “...the quickest, efficient, least expensive way to educate a man is to make it painful for him when he is wrong, the same as with any other animal.”
author: James Jones

quote: “If there is one thing above all others a successful man should know, it is when to stop.”
author: Coenus

quote: “Be disciplined and disciple to thrive in every situation and keep cleaved to your plans.”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “It is one thing being disciplined to plan and it is another thing being a disciple of great work. Be your own disciplinarian.”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “What are we if we are not disciplined?”
author: Rob Liano

quote: “If you manage yourself, you control the flow of your time to the right direction. It takes self-discipline to be at the center of control for your own time.”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “Children are the most reasonable about discipline. When they tell you not to do something, it's always because they know why.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Train your Children with Patience, Correct them in Love, Don't Discipline them out of hatred”
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: “Freedom without structure is its own slavery.”
author: David Brooks

quote: “Anyone can stay up late, but only the disciplined can get up early.”
author: Benjamin Lotter

quote: “Staring at the can clock never influence the appointed time that God has ordained for your manifestation. Hold your peace, but don't shift focus.”
author: Bayode Ojo

quote: “Daily discipline is the door to full freedom, and the discipline to count to one thousand gave way to the freedom of wonder and I can't imagine not staying awake to God in the moment, the joy in the now.”
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: “Discipline has enemies, and one of them is you.”
author: David Powning

quote: “When enough is not enough, a Hedonist is born.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Anxious, inexperienced writers obey rules. Rebellious, unschooled writers break rules. Artists master the form.”
author: Robert McKee

quote: “Willingly or not we come to terms with power, forgetting that we are all in the ghetto, that the ghetto is walled in, that outside the ghetto reign the lords of death, and that close by the train is waiting." by Primo Levi in Drowned”
author: Primo Levi

quote: “If you can't manage yourself, you can't manage your time. Discipline and self-control are what get you on track to execute your plans by managing your time effectively!”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “You are either going to go through the pain of disappointment or discipline in your life. The latter makes the pain worth it.”
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: “A credit card allows you transcend time. For it allows you to put off until tomorrow what you bought today, while you are still paying what you bought yesterday.”
author: Robert Morrissette

quote: “To live out God’s plan for your life calls for you to discipline yourself…and your body. To push yourself. To deny yourself.”
author: Elizabeth George

quote: “Personal discipline is a most powerful character quality and one worthy of dedicating your life to nurturing.”
author: Elizabeth George

quote: “Christianity is more than just a belief; it is a life of discipline, a firm determination to live a life of prayer and contemplation, a life of self-denial and Christlikeness.”
author: Ramon M. Torres

quote: “If you do not acquire good training in detachment, you may attach to all the wrong things.”
author: Richard Rohr

quote: “Fine art is the discipline of breaking rules.”
author: M.B. Dallocchio

quote: “Being best at things has nothing to do with talent; it is all about self - discipline and commitment.”
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: “I believe that parents who love their children do everything for them with love, even discipline.”
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: “A credit card allows you transcend time. For it allows you to put off until tomorrow what you bought today, while you are still paying off what you bought yesterday.”
author: Robert Morrissette

quote: “Success = Wisdom + Courage + Discipline. KNOW what to do, be BRAVE enough to do it, and LEAD YOURSELF to doing it again and again.”
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: “How many of us even know what our default state of being is? Check yours at random times; reset it to positive, grateful, disciplined or faithful. Don’t ever let it idle on negative, greedy, lax or doubtful.”
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: “I heard my teacher said "great people make history". I am not concern about "great" or "people" or "history". I am concerned about "make" and it keeps me asking the next question "how?"! They are Determined and Disciplined!”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “The purpose of a spiritual discipline is to give us a way to stop the war, not by our force of will, but organically, through understanding an gradual training.”
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: “Discipline yourself to be a disciple of great works and to do that excellently, you have to wave "bye-bye" to some things and then switch off your inner person not to go near them again!”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “Being disciplined with an ego that makes you to feel like you can never be disciplined by any other person is "indiscipline".”
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: “In the end, the greatest victory we can know is the result of all of our hard work, discipline, and dedication: the realization of our dreams.”
author: Cheryl  Burke

quote: “When we procrastinate, we also put a hold on happiness.”
author: Charles F. Glassman

quote: “The assistant commander at any post is supposed to be a ruthless son of a bitch.”
author: Tom Clancy

quote: “But we need to pray daily for humility and honesty to see these sinful attitudes for that they really are, and then for grace and discipline to root them out of our minds and replace them with thoughts pleasing to God.”
author: Jerry Bridges

quote: “You can judge the quality of their faith from the way they behave. Discipline is an index to doctrine.”
author: Tertullian

quote: “Somedays you're the cue ball, somedays you are the eight ball”
author: Pablo

quote: “Beginning of a great day begins a night before.”
author: Sukant Ratnakar

quote: “Without true celebration discipline is obnoxious.”
author: Adi Da Samraj

quote: “don't ever think that you're a single in total freedom,but think of combating the forces of lust.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “If I love a dose of (good) theology or philosophy, I probably also love discipline, improvement, wisdom, and challenges. If I hate it, I am probably too comfortable and proud to try to question myself.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Anger, hate, blind temper, that crazy switch to destroy, all of it purified into discipline and control, the best side of boxing, Billy says.”
author: Adam Berlin

quote: “Beating children will not make them wise. They will grow wilder and wilder and the cane will feel like paper on their skins.”
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: “Patton would have said a warmer goodbye to his horse, The author writes on Eisenhower's cold dismissal of his wartime lover.”
author: Jean Edward Smith

quote: “It's easy to be disciplined when you have no freedoms.”
author: Dick Couch

quote: “If leadership is the spinal cord of success then discipline is its lumbar vertebrae.”
author: Noel DeJesus

quote: “I think the sense of family and family achievement, plus the discipline which I received there from that one-room school were really very helpful in what I did later on.”
author: Alan Shepard

quote: “The disciplined soul hardly needs "Yoga" to control the body it temporarily resides in.”
author: Aniruddha Sastikar

quote: “A science is any discipline in which the fool of this generation can go beyond the point reached by the genius of the last generation.”
author: Max Gluckman

quote: “... the best education is self-discipline with good principles through human university.”
author: Uzoma Nnadi

quote: “Make a list of goals for every year, tick them off & reward yourself when you achieve each one. Will give much discipline in your life.”
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: “You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements gained slowly over time.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “People who worry that nuclear weaponry will one day fall in the hands of the Arabs, fail to realize that the Islamic bomb has been dropped already, it fell the day MUHAMMED (pbuh) was born.”
author: - Dr. Joseph Adam Pearson.

quote: “If you do the things you need to do when you need to do them, then someday you can do the things you want do when you want to do them.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “Most of us don't mind doing what we ought to do when it doesn't interfere with what we want to do, but it takes discipline and maturity to do what we ought to do whether we want to or not.”
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: “Piety is a discipline of the will through respect. It admits the right to exist of things larger than the ego, of things different from the ego.”
author: Richard M. Weaver

quote: “Give me the discipline to get rid of the stuff that's not important, the freedom to savor the stuff that gives me joy, and the patience not to worry about the stuff that's messy but not hurting anybody.”
author: Vinita Hampton Wright

quote: “If you don't acquire the discipline to push through a personal low point, you will miss the reward that comes with persevering.”
author: Jeff Goins

quote: “He was too explosive for her to touch him so intimately. It would lead to the wrong things. And places he'd banned himself from. As her protector, he had to stay away from her. That was how it worked. This, he could not stray from. Not again. Even if it killed him.”
author: Jennifer Lowery

quote: “A disciple does not ask, "How much can I keep?" but, "How much more can I give?" Whenever we start to get comfortable with our level of giving, it's time to raise it again.”
author: Randy Alcorn

quote: “Desires to which we cling closely can easily prevent us from being what we ought to be and can be; and on the other hand, desires repeatedly mastered for the sake of present duty make us richer.Lack of desire is poverty.”
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: “Once upon a time, this idea of having a trained, disciplined, cultivated memory was not nearly so alien as it would seem to us to be today.”
author: Joshua Foer

quote: “Muhammad adhered meticulously to the charter he forged for Medina, which - grounded as it was in the Quranic injunction, "Let there be no compulsion in religion" (2:256) - is arguably the first mandate for religious tolerance in human history.”
author: Huston Smith

quote: “To discipline your body, you need a disciplined mind!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “Great men have great discipline.”
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: “Discipline is aimed at formation for a specific end, and that end is determined by our founding narrative.”
author: James K.A. Smith

quote: “To procrastinate obedience is to disobey God.”
author: Randy Alcorn

quote: “Children cannot develop a sense of inner discipline if all of the control comes from the outside.”
author: Babara Coloroso

quote: “Oh, my father, such a difficult man.His world turned on his axis.From "The Father Tamer" in BREATHE IN”
author: Eileen Granfors

quote: “If you must speak ill of another, do not speak it, write it in the sand near the water's edge.”
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “This is the secret to mastering any discipline: as you conquer one, you'll find it easier to tackle another.”
author: Jeff Goins

quote: “Simply to render oneself able to understand what other Christian thinkers have themselves come to understand and to more or less felicitously communicate requires that one's mind not be a blank slate but already properly formed, disciplined, and exercised.”
author: Gregory B. Sadler

quote: “Confidence is a pencil best sharpened with paper.”
author: Kale Burton

quote: “There are many whose tongues might govern multitudes, if they could govern their tongues.”
author: Prentice

quote: “Discipline is a given; the choice is whether it is applied internally or externally.”
author: Orrin Woodward

quote: “By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.”
author: Confucious

quote: “It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.”
author: Confucious

quote: “Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.”
author: Confucius

quote: “He who knows all the answers has not been asked all the questions.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Study the past if you would define the future.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The funniest people are the saddest ones”
author: Confucius

quote: “Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.”
author: Confucius

quote: “To be wronged is nothing, unless you continue to remember it.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Respect yourself and others will respect you.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.”
author: Confucius

quote: “When you see a good person, think of becoming like her/him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Attack the evil that is within yourself, rather than attacking the evil that is in others.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Silence is a true friend who never betrays.”
author: Confucius

quote: “You cannot open a book without learning something.”
author: Confucius

quote: “What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others.”
author: Confucius

quote: “I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The hardest thing of all is to find a black cat in a dark room, especially if there is no cat.”
author: Confucius

quote: “We have two lives, and the second begins when we realize we only have one.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Give a bowl of rice to a man and you will feed him for a day. Teach him how to grow his own rice and you will save his life.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The way out is through the door. Why is it that no one will use this method?”
author: Confucius

quote: “It is not the failure of others to appreciate your abilities that should trouble you, but rather your failure to appreciate theirs.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The man of wisdom is never of two minds;the man of benevolence never worries;the man of courage is never afraid.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.”
author: Confucius

quote: “It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.”
author: Confucius

quote: “And remember, no matter where you go, there you are.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If what one has to say is not better than silence, then one should keep silent.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.”
author: Confucius

quote: “To be wealthy and honored in an unjust society is a disgrace.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.”
author: Confucius

quote: “To put the world in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order; we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right.”
author: Confucius

quote: “When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Don't do unto others what you don't want done unto you.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If your plan is for one year plant rice. If your plan is for ten years plant trees. If your plan is for one hundred years educate children. ”
author: Confucius

quote: “In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of. In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of.”
author: Confucius

quote: “A lion chased me up a tree, and I greatly enjoyed the view from the top.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The beginning of wisdom is to call things by their proper name.”
author: Confucius

quote: “To see what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.”
author: Confucius

quote: “When a wise man points at the moon the imbecile examines the finger.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The superior man thinks always of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort.”
author: Confucious

quote: “Time flows away like the water in the river. ”
author: Confucius

quote: “Don’t complain about the snow on your neighbor’s roof when your own doorstep is unclean.”
author: confucius

quote: “It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.”
author: Confucius

quote: “He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Learning without thought is labour lost; thought without learning is perilous.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The Master said, “A true gentleman is one who has set his heart upon the Way. A fellow who is ashamed merely of shabby clothing or modest meals is not even worth conversing with.”(Analects 4.9)”
author: Confucius

quote: “Without knowing the force of words, it is impossible to know more.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The Man who says he can, and the man who says he can not.. Are both correct”
author: Confucius

quote: “The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Have no friends not equal to yourself.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Consideration for others is the basis of a good life, a good society.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Never give a sword to a man who can't dance.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The noble-minded are calm and steady. Little people are forever fussing and fretting.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If you are the smartest person in the room, then you are in the wrong room.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The nobler sort of man emphasizes the good qualities in others, and does not accentuate the bad. The inferior does.”
author: Confucius

quote: “roads were made for journeys not destinations”
author: Confucius

quote: “The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The Master said, “If your conduct is determined solely by considerations of profit you will arouse great resentment.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The Master said, “A true teacher is one who, keeping the past alive, is also able to understand the present.”(Analects 2.11)”
author: Confucius

quote: “Worry not that no one knows you; seek to be worth knowing.”
author: Confucius

quote: “A common man marvels at uncommon things. A wise man marvels at the commonplace.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.”
author: Confucious

quote: “Those who know the TRUTH are not equal to those who love it.”
author: Confucius

quote: “By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Behind every smile there's teeth.”
author: Confucius

quote: “When the wind blows,the grass bends.”
author: Confucius

quote: “He Who Knows And Knows That He Knows Is A Wise Man - Follow Him;He Who Knows Not And Knows Not That He Knows Not Is A Fool - Shun Him”
author: Confucius

quote: “Knowledge is merely brilliance in organization of ideas and not wisdom. The truly wise person goes beyond knowledge.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If one should desire to know whether a kingdom is well governed, if its morals are good or bad, the quality of its music will furnish the answer.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The Master said, “The gentleman understands what is right, whereas the petty man understands profit.”(Analects 4.16)”
author: Confucius

quote: “Fix your mind on truth, hold firm to virtue, rely on loving kindness, and find your recreation in the Arts.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Settle one difficulty, and you keep a hundred away.”
author: Confucius

quote: “The green reed which bends in the wind is stronger than the mighty oak which breaks in a storm.”
author: Confucius

quote: “No lake so still but it has its wave.No circle so perfect but that it has its blur.I would change things for you if I could; As I can't you must take them as they are.”
author: Confucius

quote: “If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?”
author: Confucius

quote: “Jack: “Gwendolen, wait here for me.”Gwendolen: “If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “You are what you read.”
author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Other people are quite dreadful. The only possible society is oneself.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “If one plays good music, people don't listen, and if one plays bad music people don't talk.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “And with tears of blood he cleansed the hand,The hand that held the steel:For only blood can wipe out blood,And only tears can heal”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I love hearing my relations abused. It is the only thing that makes me put up with them at all. Relations are simply a tedious pack of people, who haven't got the remotest knowledge of how to live nor the smallest instinct about when to die.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Now produce your explanation and pray make it improbable.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “We teach people how to remember, we never teach them how to grow.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “She is a peacock in everything but beauty!”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I want to be good. I can't bear the idea of my soul being hideous.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Memory is the diary that chronicles things that never happened or couldn't possibly have happened.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “When bankers get together for dinner, they discuss Art. When artists get together for dinner, they discuss Money”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “There are two ways to dislike poetry: One is to dislike it; the other is to read Pope.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Perhaps, after all, America never has been discovered. I myself would say that it had merely been detected.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “As for believing things, I can believe anything, provided that it is quite incredible.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It is so easy to convince others; it is so difficult to convince oneself.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Where there is no love there is no understanding.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “In the common world of fact the wicked were not punished, nor the good rewarded. Success was given to the strong, failure thrust upon the weak. That was all. ”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The old believe everything; the middle-aged suspect everything; the young know everything.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “And all the woe that moved him soThat he gave that bitter crythe wild regrets, and the bloody sweatsNone knew so well as I:For he who lives more lives than oneMore deaths than one must die.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and richness to life that nothing else can bring.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Art only begins where Imitation ends.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “We can forgive a man for making a useful thing as long as he does not admire it. The only excuse for making a useless thing is that one admires it intensely.All art is quite useless.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “She knew nothing but she had everything he had lost.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I must say... that I ruined myself: and that nobody, great or small, can be ruined except by his own hand.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Those who find beautiful meanings in beautiful things are the cultivated. For these there is hope.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “A poet can survive everything but a misprint.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The secret to life is to enjoy the pleasure of being terribly, terribly deceived.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Imagination is a quality that was given to man compensate him from whats not. The sense of humor was given to console him from what is.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “A burnt child loves the fire.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I can stand brute force, but brute reason is quite unbearable. There is something unfair about it's use. It is hitting below the intellect.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “One should absorb the colour of life, but one should never remember its details. Details are always vulgar.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I can't help detesting my relations. I suppose it comes from the fact that none of us can stand other people having the same faults as ourselves.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Women have a wonderful instinct about things. They can discover everything except the obvious.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “My wallpaper and I are fighting a duel to the death. One or the other of us has to go.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Wherever there is a man who exercises authority, there is a man who resists authority.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Truth is independent of facts always.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “What men call the shadow of the body is not the shadow of the body, but is the body of the soul.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I don't want to earn my living, I want to live.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Marriage is the triumph of imagination over intelligence. Second marriage is the triumph of hope over experience.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Why can't these American women stay in their own country? They are always telling us that it is the paradise for women.''It is. That is the reason why, like Eve, they are so excessively anxious to get out of it.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “When one is in town one amuses oneself. When one is in the country one amuses other people. It is excessively boring.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “One can survive everything, nowadays, except death, and live down everything except a good reputation.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Do you smoke?Well, yes, I must admit I smoke.I'm glad to hear of it. A man should always have an occupation of some kind.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The only way to behave to a woman is to make love to her if she is pretty, and to someone else if she is plain.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Just because a man has died for it, does not make it true.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “One must have a heart of stone to read the death of little Nell without laughing.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It is not wise to find symbols in everything that one sees. It makes life too full of terrors.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It's the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “By giving us the opinions of the uneducated, journalism keeps us in touch with the ignorance of the community.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I never saw anybody take so long to dress, and with such little result.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “You and I will always be friends.""Yet you poisoned me with a book once. I should not forgive that.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I regard the theatre as the greatest of all art forms, the most immediate way in which a human being can share with another the sense of what it is to be a human being.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Every woman becomes their mother. That's their tragedy. And no man becomes his. That's his tragedy.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “America had often been discovered before Columbus, but it had always been hushed up.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I want to make Romeo jealous! I want the dead lovers of the world to hear our laughter, and grow sad. I want a breath of our passion to stir their dust into consciousness, to wake their ashes into pain.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “because to influence a person is to give one's own soul.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Suffering is one very long moment. We cannot divide it by seasons. We can only record its moods, and chronicle their return. With us time itself does not progress. It revolves. It seems to circle round one centre of pain.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Plain women are always jealous of their husbands. Beautiful women never are. They are always so occupied with being jealous of other women's husbands.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “She lives in the poetry she cannot write.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “And alien tears will fill for him pity's long broken urn. For his mourners will all be outcast men, and outcasts always mourn.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Cheap editions of great books may be delightful, but cheap editions of great men are absolutely detestable”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Dear little Swallow,’ said the Prince, ‘you tell me of marvelous things, but more marvelous than anything is the suffering of men and of women. There is no Mystery so great as Misery.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Now art should never try to be popular. The public should try to make itself artistic.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I am the only person I would like to know thoroughly”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It is a very sad thing that nowadays there is so little useless information.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Love is easily killed.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “If you pretend to be good, the world takes you very seriously. If you pretend to be bad, it doesn't. Such is the astounding stupidity of optimism.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Even before I met you I was far from indifferent to you.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “We live in an age that reads too much to be wise, and that thinks too much to be beautiful.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Well, I can't eat muffins in an agitated manner. The butter would probably get on my cuffs.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “He is really not so ugly after all, provided, of course, that one shuts one's eyes, and does not look at him.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The only difference between a caprice and a lifelong passion is that the caprice lasts a little longer.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “To disagree with three-fourths of the British public is one of the first requisites of sanity.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Genius lasts longer than beauty”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The simplicity of your character makes you exquisitely incomprehensible to me.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Veil after veil of thin dusky gauze is lifted, and by degrees the forms and colours of things are restored to them, and we watch the dawn remaking the world in its antique pattern.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I've now realised for the first time in my life the vital Importance of Being Earnest.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Most people live for love and admiration. But it is by love and admiration that we should live.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “It is a curious fact that people are never so trivial as when they take themselves seriously”

quote: “But she is happiest alone. She is happiest alone.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “As for omens, there is no such thing as an omen. Destiny does not send us heralds. She is too wise or too cruel for that.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I asked the question for the best reason possible, for the only reason, indeed, that excuses anyone for asking any question - simple curiosity.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.”

quote: “The tragedy of the poor is that they can afford nothing but self denial.”

quote: “Conscience makes egotists of us all.”

quote: “I don't play accurately--any one can play accurately--but I play with wonderful expression. As far as the piano is concerned, sentiment is my forte. I keep science for Life.”

quote: “And all at once, summer collapsed into fall.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Is insincerity such a terrible thing? I think not. It is merely a method by which we can multiply our personalities.”

quote: “Nothing spoils romance so much as a sense of humor in the woman”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “From the moment I met you, your personality had the most extraordinary influence over me. I was dominated, soul brain and power.”

quote: “Truth, in matters of religion, is simply the opinion that has survived.”

quote: “The best way to make children good is to make them happy.”

quote: “Hesitation of any kind is a sign of mental decay in the young, of physical weakness in the old.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The only horrible thing in the world is ennui.”

quote: “I never take any notice to what common people say, and I never interfere with what charming people do.”
author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “In war, the strong make slaves of the weak, and in peace the rich makes slaves of the poor.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “True friends stab you in the front”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Ignorance is like a delicate exotic fruit; touch it and the bloom is gone.”

quote: “I don’t regret for a single moment having lived for pleasure. I did it to the full, as one should do everything that one does. There was no pleasure I did not experience.”

quote: “For he who lives more lives than one more deaths than one must die.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “When a man is old enough to do wrong he should be old enough to do right also.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I dislike arguments of any kind. They are always vulgar and often convincing.”

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The Book of Life begins with a man and a woman in a garden. It ends with Revelations.”
author: Wilde Oscar

quote: “Woman begins by resisting a man's advances and ends by blocking his retreat.”
author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The one charm about the past is that it is the past. But women never know when the curtain has fallen. ”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Either this wallpaper goes, or I do.”

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “To get into the best society, nowadays, one has either to feed people, amuse people, or shock people - that is all!”

quote: “we always misunderstood ourselves, and rarely understood others”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The true perfection of man lies not in what man has, but in what man is.”

quote: “To get back one's youth one has merely to repeat one's follies.”

quote: “The critic has to educate the public; the artist has to educate the critic.”

quote: “I like Wagner's music better than anybody's. It is so loud that one can talk the whole time without other people hearing what one says.”

quote: “The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray.”

quote: “Pleasure is the only thing one should live for, nothing ages like happiness.”

quote: “You can have your secret as long as I have your heart[.]”

quote: “Would you be in any way offended if I said that you seem to me to be in every way the visible personification of absolute perfection?”

quote: “Surely Love is a wonderful thing. It is more precious than emeralds, and dearer than fine opals. Pearls and pomegranates cannot buy it, nor is it set forth in the marketplace. It may not be purchased of the merchants, for can it be weighed out in the balance for gold.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “I hope you hair curls naturally, does it?Yes, darling, with a little help from others.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “The proper basis for marriage is a mutual misunderstanding.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Every great man nowadays has his disciples, and it is usually Judas who writes the biography.”

quote: “Love is not fashionable anymore; the poets have killed it.”

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Literature always anticipates life. It doesn't copy it but moulds it to it's purpose.”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Experience is a question of instinct about life.”

quote: “It is a sad truth, but we have lost the faculty of giving lovely names to things. ”
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: “Those who have much are often greedy; those who have little often share.”

author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde
