quote: “You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust. You were born with ideals and dreams. You were born with greatness. You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly.”
author: Rumi

quote: “A smart person knows how to talk. A wise person knows when to be silent.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When life gives you lemons, chunk it right back.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “It scares me how hard it is to remember life before you. I can't even make the comparisons anymore, because my memories of that time have all the depth of a photograph. It seems foolish to play games of better and worse. It's simply a matter of is and is no longer.”
author: David Levithan

quote: “Pulvis et umbra sumus. (We are but dust and shadow.)”
author: Horace

quote: “Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you only shine light on your flaws, all your perfects will dim.”
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: “Life is not a PG feel-good movie. Real life often ends badly. Literature tries to document this reality, while showing us it is still possible for us to endure nobly.”
author: Matthew Quick

quote: “A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “There is no escape—we pay for the violence of our ancestors.”
author: Frank Herbert

quote: “Most everything you think you know about me is nothing more than memories.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “No one here gets out alive.”
author: Jim Morrison

quote: “Losing your life is not the worst thing that can happen. The worst thing is to lose your reason for living.”
author: Jo Nesbo

quote: “How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.”
author: Annie Dillard

quote: “The great object of life is sensation- to feel that we exist, even though in pain.”
author: Lord Byron

quote: “To look life in the face, always, to look life in the face, and to know it for what it is...at last, to love it for what it is, and then, to put it away...”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,To gain all while you give,To roam the roads of lands remote,To travel is to live.”
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: “How terribly sad it was that people are made in such a way that they get used to something as extraordinary as living.”
author: Jostein Gaarder

quote: “People rarely bring flowers to a suicide.”
author: Jennifer Niven

quote: “Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.”
author: Will Durant

quote: “If you want to identify me, ask me not where I live, or what I like to eat, or how I comb my hair, but ask me what I am living for, in detail, ask me what I think is keeping me from living fully for the thing I want to live for.”
author: Thomas Merton

quote: “I seem to have run in a great circle, and met myself again on the starting line.”
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: “Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.”
author: Marc Riboud

quote: “But I have learned that you make your own happiness, that part of going for what you want means losing something else. And when the stakes are high, the losses can be that much greater.”
author: Emily Giffin

quote: “Never let hard lessons harden your heart; the hard lessons of life are meant to make you better, not bitter.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “We only need to be one person.We only need to feel one existence. We don't have to do everything in order to be everything, because we are already infinite. While we are alive we always contain a future of multifarious possibility.”
author: Matt Haig

quote: “You can live your whole life not realizing that what you're looking for is right in front of you.”
author: David Nicholls

quote: “There is more to life than simply increasing its speed.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: “When you hold a grudge, you want someone else’s sorrow to reflect your level of hurt but the two rarely meet.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.”
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: “You’re not obligated to win. You’re obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.I wish you all very good lives.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “The human race tends to remember the abuses to which it has been subjected rather than the endearments. What's left of kisses? Wounds, however, leave scars.”
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: “Each affects the other, and the other affects the next, and the world is full of stories, but the stories are all one.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “How can I be substantial if I do not cast a shadow? I must have a dark side also If I am to be whole.”
author: C.G. Jung

quote: “The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “We should forgive our enemies, but not before they are hanged”
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: “Quiet is peace. Tranquility. Quiet is turning down the volume knob on life. Silence is pushing the off button. Shutting it down. All of it. - Amir”
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: “Take it moment by moment, and you will find that we are all, as I’ve said before, bugs in amber.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “Be happy, but never satisfied.”
author: Bruce Lee

quote: “Do not lose hope — what you seek will be found. Trust ghosts. Trust those that you have helped to help you in their turn. Trust dreams. Trust your heart, and trust your story. (from 'Instructions')”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Be the positive impact on the lives of others.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Life is a gift. Don't forget to live it.”
author: Nicola Yoon

quote: “We never know which lives we influence, or when, or why.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “You must be shapeless, formless, like water. When you pour water in a cup, it becomes the cup. When you pour water in a bottle, it becomes the bottle. When you pour water in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can drip and it can crash. Become like water my friend.”
author: Bruce Lee

quote: “You can't just plan a moment when things get back on track, just as you can't plan the moment you lose your way in the first place.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “One half of the world cannot understand the pleasures of the other.”
author: Jane Austen

quote: “Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Though the road's been rocky it sure feels good to me.”
author: Bob Marley

quote: “I am not the same having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.”
author: mary anne radmacher

quote: “Don’t worry if people think you’re crazy. You are crazy. You have that kind of intoxicating insanity that lets other people dream outside of the lines and become who they’re destined to be.”
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: “There's gon' be some stuff you gon' seethat's gon' make it hard to smile in the future.But through whatever you see,through all the rain and the pain,you gotta keep your sense of humor.You gotta be able to smile through all this bullshit.Remember that.”
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: “I wish to weepbut sorrow isstupid.I wish to believebut belief is agraveyard.”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “There was a moment in my life when I really wanted to kill myself. And there was one other moment when I was close to that. . . . But even in my most jaded times, I had some hope.”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “My destination is no longer a place, rather a new way of seeing.”
author: Marcel Proust

quote: “and when all the wars are over, a butterfly will still be beautiful.”
author: Ruskin Bond

quote: “When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “People die, I think, but your relationship with them doesn't. It continues and is ever-changing.”
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: “When you do something noble and beautiful and nobody noticed, do not be sad. For the sun every morning is a beautiful spectacle and yet most of the audience still sleeps.”
author: John Lennon

quote: “When I lost my sight, Werner, people said I was brave. When my father left, people said I was brave. But it is not bravery; I have no choice. I wake up and live my life. Don't you do the same?”
author: Anthony Doerr

quote: “Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.”
author: Ransom Riggs

quote: “Just remember that the things you put into your head are there forever, he said. You might want to think about that.You forget some things, dont you?Yes. You forget what you want to remember and you remember what you want to forget.”
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: “It is a very funny thing that the sleepier you are, the longer you take about getting to bed.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “We’d met at a carefree time, a moment full of promise, in its place now were the harsh lessons of the real world.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “I don't get it,' Caroline said, bemused. 'She's the only one with wings. Why is that?'There were so many questions in life. You couldn't ever have all the answers. But I knew this one.It's so she can fly,' I said. Then I started to run.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “There will be time, there will be timeTo prepare a face to meet the faces that you meet.”
author: T.S. Eliot.

quote: “I have a deeply hidden and inarticulate desire for something beyond the daily life.”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “Despair is the price one pays for self-awareness. Look deeply into life, and you'll always find despair.”
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: “Yeah, sometimes life really sucks," she says. "But you know what I'm holding on for?"I raise my eyebrows.She raises hers, too, mimicking me."The moments that don't suck," she says. "The trick is to notice them when they come around.”
author: Veronica Roth

quote: “All knowledge is worth having.”
author: Jacqueline Carey

quote: “A man is like a novel: until the very last page you don't know how it will end. Otherwise it wouldn't even be worth reading.”
author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quote: “You can't become a decent horseman until you fall off and get up again, a good number of times.  There's life in a nutshell.”
author: Bear Grylls

quote: “You don’t have to like someone, but you have to treat them as you wish to be treated.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you don't know who you truly are, you'll never know what you really want.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Life is a journey. Time is a river. The door is ajar”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “Carve your name on hearts, not tombstones. A legacy is etched into the minds of others and the stories they share about you.”
author: Shannon Alder

quote: “The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.”
author: Michel Legrand

quote: “What I'm not sure about, is if our lives have been so different from the lives of the people we save. We all complete. Maybe none of us really understand what we've lived through, or feel we've had enough time.”
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: “After all, what's a life, anyway? We're born, we live a little while, we die.”
author: E.B. White

quote: “Dreams don't work unless you take action. The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “It's worth making time to find the things that really stir your soul. That’s what makes you really feel alive. You have to say ‘no’ to other things you’re used to, and do it with all your heart.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Writing is a form of therapy; sometimes I wonder how all those who do not write, compose, or paint can manage to escape the madness, melancholia, the panic and fear which is inherent in a human situation.”
author: Graham Greene

quote: “Let today be the day you stop being haunted by the ghost of yesterday. Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The beautiful is always bizarre.”
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: “But if everything was always smooth and perfect, you'd get too used to that, you know? You have to have a little bit of disorganization now and then. Otherwise, you'll never really enjoy it when things go right.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.”
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quote: “Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I suppose sooner or later in the life of everyone comes a moment of trial. We all of us have our particular devil who rides us and torments us, and we must give battle in the end.”
author: Daphne Du Maurier

quote: “It doesn’t matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Some things cannot be taught; they must be experienced. You never learn the most valuable lessons in life until you go through your own journey.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “V-Day…if you need this one day in a year to show everyone else you truly care for “your loved one” I think it’s quite stupid. I hate this commercialism. It’s all artificial, and has nothing to do with real love.”
author: Jess C Scott

quote: “The camera is an instrument that teaches people how to see without a camera.”
author: Dorothea Lange

quote: “How quick come the reasons for approving what we like.”
author: Jane Austen

quote: “Perhaps - I want the old days back again and they'll never come back, and I am haunted by the memory of them and of the world falling about my ears. ”
author: Margaret Mitchell

quote: “Dreams are necessary to life.”
author: Anais Nin

quote: “Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “No single event can awaken within us a stranger whose existence we had never suspected. To live is to be slowly born.”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: “For someone like myself in whom the ability to trust others is so cracked and broken that I am wretchedly timid and am forever trying to read the expression on people's faces.”
author: Osamu Dazai

quote: “Sometimes I just think depression's one way of coping with the world. Like, some people get drunk, some people do drugs, some people get depressed. Because there's so much stuff out there that you have to do something to deal with it.”
author: Ned Vizzini

quote: “My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus."[The Science of Second-Guessing (New York Times Magazine Interview, December 12, 2004)]”
author: Stephen W. Hawking

quote: “Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.”
author: Bohdi Sanders

quote: “You are -- your life, and nothing else.”
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: “When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.”
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for.”
author: Tom Robbins

quote: “A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.”
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: “MagicSandra’s seen a leprechaun,Eddie touched a troll,Laurie danced with witches once,Charlie found some goblins gold.Donald heard a mermaid sing,Susy spied an elf,But all the magic I have knownI've had to make myself.”
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: “Most of us must learn to love people and use things rather than loving things and using people.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Learning to distance yourself from all the negativity is one of the greatest lessons to achieve inner peace.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “Life gives us choices. You either grab on with both hands and just go for it, or you sit on the sidelines.”
author: Christine Feehan

quote: “People are strange: They are constantly angered by trivial things, but on a major matter like totally wasting their lives, they hardly seem to notice.”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “It doesn't matter what you did or where you were...it matters where you are and what you're doing. Get out there! Sing the song in your heart and NEVER let anyone shut you up!!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I am always sad, I think. Perhaps this signifies that I am not sad at all, because sadness is something lower than your normal disposition, and I am always the same thing. Perhaps I am the only person in the world, then, who never becomes sad. Perhaps I am lucky.”
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: “The worst memories stick with us, while the nice ones always seem to slip through our fingers.”
author: Rachel Vincent

quote: “When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.”
author: Uchiha Madara

quote: “Our battered suitcases were piled on the sidewalk again; we had longer ways to go. But no matter, the road is life”
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: “He had the look of one who had drunk the cup of life and found a dead beetle at the bottom.”
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: “Be still, sad heart! and cease repining;Behind the clouds is the sun still shining;Thy fate is the common fate of all,Into each life some rain must fall”
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: “If you live each day as it was your last, someday you'll most certainly be right”
author: Steve Jobs

quote: “Without music, life would be a blank to me.”
author: Jane Austen

quote: “I don't want to live, I want to love first and live incidentally.”
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: “The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “It's not hard to decide what you want your life to be about. What's hard, she said, is figuring out what you're willing to give up in order to do the things you really care about.”
author: Shauna Niequist

quote: “Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs.”
author: Joan Didion

quote: “Independence is my happiness, and I view things as they are, without regard to place or person; my country is the world, and my religion is to do good.”
author: thomas paine

quote: “Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, alistening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, allof which have the potential to turn a life around.”
author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quote: “Don’t bother trying to explain your emotions. Live everything as intensely as you can and keep whatever you felt as a gift from God. The best way to destroy the bridge between the visible and invisible is by trying to explain your emotions.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When one has a grateful heart, life is so beautiful.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “...when pain is over, the remembrance of it often becomes a pleasure.”
author: Jane Austen

quote: “Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “Until you step into the unknown, you don’t know what you’re made of.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time.”
author: Coco Chanel

quote: “Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make.”
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: “I’ve come to the conclusion that people who wear headphones while they walk, are much happier, more confident, and more beautiful individuals than someone making the solitary drudge to work without acknowledging their own interests and power.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “You are someone who is different, but who wants to be the same as everyone else. And that in my view is a serious illness. God chose you to be different. Why are you disappointing God with this kind of attitude?”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I believe that life is a game, that life is a cruel joke, and that life is what happens when you're alive and that you might as well lie back and enjoy it.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Life is nothing without a little chaos to make it interesting.”
author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

quote: “Life, unfortunately, doesn't seem to care what we want.”
author: Richelle Mead

quote: “If you can’t save your own life, is it even worth saving?”
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: “The hardest thing about the road not taken is that you never know where it might have led.”
author: Lisa Wingate

quote: “Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.”
author: Erol Ozan

quote: “What you stay focused on will grow.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Personally, I don’t like inherently happy people. I don’t trust them. I think there’s something seriously wrong with anyone who isn’t at least a little let down by the world.”
author: Tiffanie DeBartolo

quote: “Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Nothing makes a person happier than having a happy heart.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The thing about a spiral is, if you follow it inward, it never actually ends. It just keeps tightening, infinitely.”
author: John Green

quote: “Pierre was right when he said that one must believe in the possibility of happiness in order to be happy, and I now believe in it. Let the dead bury the dead, but while I'm alive, I must live and be happy.”
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: “Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.”
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: “It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There are three deaths. The first is when the body ceases to function. The second is when the body is consigned to the grave. The third is that moment, sometime in the future, when your name is spoken for the last time.”
author: David M. Eagleman

quote: “The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with Nature.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “The world changes, we do not, therein lies the irony that kills us.”
author: Anne Rice

quote: “The mistakes I've made are dead to me. But I can't take back the things I never did.”
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: “If you try to change it, you will ruin it. Try to hold it, and you will lose it.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: “You have wakened not out of sleep, but into a prior dream, and that dream lies within another, and so on, to infinity, which is the number of grains of sand. The path that you are to take is endless, and you will die before you have truly awakened.”
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: “Look. I have a strategy. Why expect anything? If you don’t expect anything, you don’t get disappointed.”
author: Patricia McCormick

quote: “Life is a blank canvas, and you need to throw all the paint on it you can.”
author: Danny Kaye

quote: “All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.”
author: Walt Disney

quote: “Those who hurt others will also hurt themselves.”
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: “You learn something valuable from all of the significant events and people, but you never touch your true potential until you challenge yourself to go beyond imposed limitations.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “How can I go forward when I don't know which way I'm facing?”
author: John Lennon

quote: “Even chance meetings are the result of karma… Things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.”
author: Wendy Wasserstein

quote: “Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The cost of oblivious daydreaming was always this moment of return, the realignment with what had been before and now seemed a little worse.”
author: Ian McEwan

quote: “Books can be dangerous. The best ones should be labeled ‘This could change your life’.”
author: Helen Exley

quote: “Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power.”
author: John Steinbeck

quote: “One swallow does not make a summer, neither does one fine day; similarly one day or brief time of happiness does not make a person entirely happy.”
author: Aristotle

quote: “It might be possible that the world itself is without meaning.”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “Let me give you a tip on a clue to men's characters: the man who damns money has obtained it dishonorably; the man who respects it has earned it.”
author: Ayn Rand

quote: “What do you most value in your friends?Their continued existence.”
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: “Happiness was but the occasional episode in a general drama of pain.”
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: “You were made by God and for God and until you understand that, life will never make sense.”
author: Rick Warren

quote: “You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.”
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: “Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.”
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: “I should be happy, but instead I feel nothing. I feel a lot of nothing these days. I've cried a few times, but mostly I'm empty, as if whatever makes me feel and hurt and laugh and love has been surgically removed, leaving me hollowed out like a shell.”
author: Jennifer Niven

quote: “Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Conventionality is not morality. Self-righteousness is not religion. To attack the first is not to assail the last.”
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: “This is how the entire course of a life can be changed: by doing nothing.”
author: Ian McEwan

quote: “Life is not like water. Things in life don't necessarily flow over the shortest possible route.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Don't own so much clutter that you will be relieved to see your house catch fire.”
author: Wendell Berry

quote: “So much working, reading, thinking, living to do! A lifetime is not long enough.”
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: “Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Madame, all stories, if continued far enough, end in death, and he is no true-story teller who would keep that from you.”
author: Hemingway Ernest

quote: “Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Enjoy every step you take. If you're curious, there is always something new to be discovered in the backdrop of your daily life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I know there may be universes out there where I made different choices and they led me somewhere else, led me to someone else. And my heart breaks for every single version of me that didn't end up with you.”
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quote: “This work was strictly voluntary, but any animal who absented himself from it would have his rations reduced by half.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.”
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: “Do you believe a man can truly love a woman and constantly betray her? Never mind physically but betray her in his mind, in the very "poetry of his soul". Well, it's not easy but men do it all the time.”
author: Mario Puzo

quote: “Clocks slay time... time is dead as long as it is being clicked off by little wheels; only when the clock stops does time come to life.”
author: William Faulkner

quote: “EARLY BIRDOh, if you’re a bird, be an early birdAnd catch the worm for your breakfast plate.If you’re a bird, be an early early bird--But if you’re a worm, sleep late.”
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: “We should count time by heart-throbs. He most lives,Who thinks most, feels noblest, acts the best.”
author: Philip James Bailey

quote: “...nothing ever happens quickly (except when it does). Nothing is ever, ever easy (except when it is). And, most of all, nothing ever goes perfectly according to plan (except in the movies).”
author: Ally Carter

quote: “...I told him a story of two people. Two people who shouldn't have met, and who didn't like each other much when they did, but who found they were the only two people in the world who could possibly have understood each other.”
author: Jojo Moyes

quote: “Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “The reason many people in our society are miserable, sick, and highly stressed is because of an unhealthy attachment to things they have no control over.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I saw the world from the stars' point of view, and it looked unbearably lonely.”
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: “We are unusual and tragic and alive.”
author: dave eggers

quote: “I hate to say it, but shit really does happen. You just have to get over it. Beat the hell out of it by doing things that make you happy.”
author: J.A. Redmerski

quote: “7 Effective Ways to Make Others Feel Important 1. Use their name.2. Express sincere gratitude.3. Do more listening than talking.4. Talk more about them than about you.5. Be authentically interested.6. Be sincere in your praise.7. Show you care.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge — every adversity — contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “All the world's a stage and most of us are desperately unrehearsed.”
author: Seán O'Casey

quote: “Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future.”
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: “You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.”
author: Shaun Hick

quote: “Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “We lead our lives like water flowing down a hill, going more or less in one direction until we splash into something that forces us to find a new course.”
author: Arthur Golden

quote: “You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I was in the biggest breakdown of my life when I stopped crying long enough to let the words of my epiphany really sink in. That whore, karma, had finally made her way around, and had just bitch-slapped me right across the face. The realization only made me cry harder.”
author: Jennifer Salaiz

quote: “I do not believe anyone can be perfectly well, who has a brain and a heart”
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: “You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.”
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: “Kiss a lover, Dance a measure, Find your name And buried treasure. Face your life, It's pain, It's pleasure, Leave no path untaken.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Before I can live with other folks I’ve got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn’t abide by majority rule is a person’s conscience.”
author: Harper Lee

quote: “Life is more or less a lie, but then again, that's exactly the way we want it to be.”
author: Bob Dylan

quote: “There are a lot of things I wish I would have done, instead of just sitting around and complaining about having a boring life.”
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: “Man starts over again everyday, in spite of all he knows, against all he knows.”
author: Emil Cioran

quote: “Well, I like to eat, sleep, drink, and be in love.I like to work, read, learn, and understand life.”
author: Langston Hughes

quote: “Everyone enjoys being acknowledged and appreciated. Sometimes even the simplest act of gratitude can change someone's entire day. Take the time to recognize and value the people around you and appreciate those who make a difference in your lives.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing.”
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: “Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon.”
author: Woody Allen

quote: “I know it's not easy for you, living this life, but try to remember, always try to remember, you're not the only one with troubles.”
author: Laini Taylor

quote: “One way of looking at speech is to say that it is a constant stratagem to cover nakedness.”
author: Harold Pinter

quote: “Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.”
author: Christina Westover

quote: “Sometimes life is too hard to be alone, and sometimes life is too good to be alone.”
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: “Hard is trying to rebuild yourself, piece by piece, with no instruction book, and no clue as to where all the important bits are supposed to go.”
author: Nick Hornby

quote: “You are a child of the universe, no less than the trees and the stars; you have a right to be here. And whether or not it is clear to you, no doubt the universe is unfolding as it should.”
author: Max Ehrmann

quote: “Your "I CAN" is more important than your IQ.”
author: Robin Sharma

quote: “Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love—then make that day count!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.”
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: “Art is unquestionably one of the purest and highest elements in human happiness. It trains the mind through the eye, and the eye through the mind. As the sun colors flowers, so does art color life.”
author: John Lubbock

quote: “For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.”
author: Aristotle

quote: “If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning: just as, if there were no light in the universe and therefore no creatures with eyes, we should never know it was dark. Dark would be without meaning.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “... you don't have to wait for someone to treat you bad repeatedly. All it takes is once, and if they get away with it that once, if they know they can treat you like that, then it sets the pattern for the future.”
author: Jane Green

quote: “Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.”
author: Bill Gates

quote: “It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “When you make a choice, you change the future.”
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: “The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?”
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: “Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “All that happens means something; nothing you do is ever insignificant.”
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: “People don’t like to think, if one thinks, one must reach conclusions. Conclusions are not always pleasant.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “If you don't live a life in service of a greater good, you've gotta at least die a death in service of a greater good, you know? And I fear that I won't get either a life or a death that means anything.”
author: John Green

quote: “The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “I think that you’ve got to make something that pleases you and hope that other people feel the same way.”
author: Thomas Keller

quote: “When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and all science. He to whom this emotion is a stranger, who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead: his eyes are closed.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Depression isn't a war you win. It's a battle you fight every day. You never stop, never get to rest. It's one bloody fray after another.”
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: “I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.”
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: “Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized.”
author: Osho

quote: “If we admit that human life can be ruled by reason, then all possibility of life is destroyed.”
author: leo tolstoy

quote: “Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?”
author: Jenny Han

quote: “We can never judge the lives of others, because each person knows only their own pain and renunciation.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.”
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: “If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome."[Meditations Divine and Moral]”
author: Anne Bradstreet

quote: “The monsters were neverunder my bed.Because the monsterswere inside my head.I fear no monsters,for no monsters I see.Because all this timethe monster has been me.”
author: Nikita Gill

quote: “Sharing tales of those we've lost is how we keep from really losing them.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “What other people think and say about you is none of your business. The most destructive thing you would ever do is to believe someone else's opinion of you. You have to stop letting other people's opinions control you.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Successful people have no fear of failure. But unsuccessful people do. Successful people have the resilience to face up to failure—learn the lessons and adapt from it.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Life is but a day;A fragile dew-drop on its perilous wayFrom a tree’s summit.”
author: John Keats

quote: “Never forget that anticipation is an important part of life. Work's important, family's important, but without excitement, you have nothing. You're cheating yourself if you refuse to enjoy what's coming.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “I have known the joy and pain of friendship. I have served and been served. I have made some good enemies for which I am not a bit sorry. I have loved unselfishly, and I have fondled hatred with the red-hot tongs of Hell. That's living.”
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: “Obscurity and a competence—that is the life that is best worth living.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: “Life is hard. After all, it kills you.”
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: “There is no thing as a single-issue struggle because we do not live single-issue lives.”
author: Audre Lorde

quote: “Tears are words the heart can't express”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.”
author: Epictetus

quote: “The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Progress just means bad things happen faster.”
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: “I hope you will go out and let stories, that is life, happen to you, and that you will work with these stories... water them with your blood and tears and your laughter till they bloom, till you yourself burst into bloom.”
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

quote: “You need to find a way to live your life, that it doesn't make a mockery of your values.”
author: Bill Ayers

quote: “Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.”
author: Roger Caras

quote: “I don’t really want to become normal, average, standard. I want merely to gain in strength, in the courage to live out my life more fully, enjoy more, experience more. I want to develop even more original and more unconventional traits”
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: “Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “To care about your outward appearance is important, but what’s more important is to have a beautiful soul.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Wisdom is knowing I am nothing,Love is knowing I am everything,and between the two my life moves.”
author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

quote: “Live or die, but don't poison everything.”
author: Anne Sexton

quote: “It doesn't matter how many people you meet in your life; you just need the real ones who accept you for who you are and help you become who you should be.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.”
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: “Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There's no advantage to hurrying through life." -Shikamaru Nara”
author: Masashi Kishimoto

quote: “Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.”
author: Chad Sugg

quote: “It can only take a moment to waste the rest of your life.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “I definitely learned a lesson this time. I know that I can be broken. I am not as tough as I thought. I see it now. At this point, it's the only thing good that came out of all of this. I know myself better now and know what I have to do.”
author: Henry Rollins

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Love, like everything else in life, should be a discovery, an adventure, and like most adventures, you don’t know you’re having one until you’re right in the middle of it.”
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: “In the end, the world always wins. That's just the way of things.”
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: “Wanting him to come back before anyone notices part of the world has not moved since he left.”
author: Brian Andreas

quote: “Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.”
author: Alysha Speer

quote: “But that was the problem with having the answers. It was only after you gave them that you realized they sometimes weren't what people wanted to hear.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “The choices you make now, the people you surround yourself with, they all have the potential to affect your life, even who you are, forever.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “There's no need to wait for the bad things and bullshit to be over. Change now. Love now. Live now. Don't wait for people to give you permission to live, because they won't.”
author: Kris Carr

quote: “My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “My head’ll explode if I continue with this escapism.”
author: Jess C Scott

quote: “One does no question miracles, or complain that they are no constructed perfectly to one's liking.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “It can take years to mold a dream. It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered.”
author: Mary E. Pearson

quote: “To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “It’s not that we have to quit this life one day, but it’s how many things we have to quit all at once: music, laughter,the physics of falling leaves, automobiles, holding hands,the scent of rain, the concept of subway trains... if only one could leave this life slowly!”
author: Roman Payne

quote: “I do not forget any good deed done to me & I do not carry a grudge for a bad one.”
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: “I scream for everything that has gone wrong. I scream for everything broken in our lives.”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “And these children that you spit onAs they try to change their worldsAre immune to your consultations.They're quite aware of what they're going through.- Changes”
author: David Bowie

quote: “We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.”
author: Jim Rohn

quote: “We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize that we only have one.”
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: “Do you know what your problem is? You can't live with the idea that someone might leave.”
author: John Green

quote: “Chocolate says "I'm sorry" so much better than words.”
author: Rachel Vincent

quote: “Hobbes: Do you think there's a God?Calvin: Well, somebody's out to get me!”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Sorrow looks back, Worry looks around, Faith looks up”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Let all of life be an unfettered howl.”
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: “Our sweetest songs are those of saddest thought.”
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: “Associate Yourself with People Who Think Positively: Associate yourself with people who think positively. You cannot surround yourself with negative people and expect positive outcomes.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Civilized men are more discourteous than savages because they know they can be impolite without having their skulls split, as a general thing.”
author: Robert E. Howard

quote: “Life happens. Shit happens. And it happens a lot. To a lot of people.”
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: “When a stargirl cries, she sheds not tears but light.”
author: Jerry Spinelli

quote: “The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor.”
author: Candace Bushnell

quote: “But we can't go back. We can only go forward.”
author: Libba Bray

quote: “I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “In order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “The absence of the will to live is, alas, not sufficient to make one want to die.”
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: “I think the highest and lowest points are the important ones. Anything else is just...in between.”
author: Jim Morrison

quote: “Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.”
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: “You can get all A's and still flunk life.”
author: Walker Percy

quote: “Changing is what people do when they have no options left.”
author: Holly Black

quote: “Droll thing life is -- that mysterious arrangement of merciless logic for a futile purpose. The most you can hope from it is some knowledge of yourself -- that comes too late -- a crop of inextinguishable regrets.”
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: “It's important in life if you don't give a shit. It can help you a lot.”
author: George Carlin

quote: “Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter.”
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: “You will suffer, son of Hades!’ What else is new? Nico thought.”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “I am ready for whatever's coming. I expect nothing but to be let down or turned away. I am alone. Goddamn. The shit hurts sometimes, but I realize what I am, what I have become.”
author: Henry Rollins

quote: “It's okay. We aren't in the same class. Just don't forget that some of us watch the sunset too.”
author: S.E. Hinton

quote: “Because isn’t that the point of every relationship: to be known by someone else, to be understood? He gets me. She gets me. Isn’t that the simple magic phrase?”
author: Gillian Flynn

quote: “I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: "If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?" And whenever the answer has been "No" for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.”
author: Steve Jobs

quote: “What strange phenomena we find in a great city, all we need do is stroll about with our eyes open. Life swarms with innocent monsters.”
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: “Whether we fall by ambition, blood, or lustLike diamonds we are cut with our own dust”
author: John Webster

quote: “Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.”
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: “He stood at the window of the empty cafe and watched the activites in the square and he said that it was good that God kept the truths of life from the young as they were starting out or else they'd have no heart to start at all.”
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: “Youth offers the promise of happiness, but life offers the realities of grief.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “One can be the master of what one does, but never of what one feels.”
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: “She was like a drowning person, flailing, reaching for anything that might save her. Her life was an urgent, desperate struggle to justify her life.”
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: “The fear of appearances is the first symptom of impotence.”
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: “Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty.”
author: John Lennon

quote: “Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I'm not saying it's going to be easy. Nothing in life is easy. But that's no reason to give up. You'll be surprised what you can accomplish if you set your mind to it. After all, you only have one life, so you should try to make the most of it.”
author: Louis Sachar

quote: “God is the Cure, Love is the Answer”
author: Aimee Cabo Nikolov

quote: “Oh, you hate your job? Why didn't you say so?There's a support group for that. It's called EVERYBODY, and they meet at the bar.”
author: Drew Carey

quote: “Life is infinitely stranger than anything which the mind of man could invent.”
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: “All that is important is this one moment in movement. Make the moment important, vital, and worth living. Do not let it slip away unnoticed and unused.”
author: Martha Graham

quote: “I had rather be shut up in a very modest cottage with my books, my family and a few old friends, dining on simple bacon, and letting the world roll on as it liked, than to occupy the most splendid post, which any human power can give.”
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: “For a day, just for one day,Talk about that which disturbs no oneAnd bring some peace into yourBeautiful eyes.”
author: شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez

quote: “Maybe everyone is just waiting for someone else to save them.”
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix

quote: “I want someone whose heart is big enough to hold me.”
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: “I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.”
author: John Burroughs

quote: “Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.”
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: “Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse”
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: “I am suddenly comsumed by nostalgia for the little girl who was me, who loved the fields and believed in God, who spent winter days home sick from school reading Nancy Drew and sucking menthol cough drops, who could keep a secret.”
author: Audrey Niffenegger

quote: “Stay hungry, stay young, stay foolish, stay curious, and above all, stay humble because just when you think you got all the answers, is the moment when some bitter twist of fate in the universe will remind you that you very much don't.”
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: “Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “I will be stronger than my sadness.”
author: Jasmine Warga

quote: “To be alive is to be missing.”
author: John Green

quote: “Life is problems. Living is solving problems.”
author: Raymond E. Feist

quote: “People wait around too long for love. I'm happy with all of my lusts!”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have , so to speak , pawned a part of their narcissism.”
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: “We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “A bend in the road is not the end of the road…Unless you fail to make the turn.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “The fact that life has no meaning is a reason to live --moreover, the only one.”
author: E. M. Cioran

quote: “Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Selling my soul would be a lot easier if I could just find it.”
author: Nikki Sixx

quote: “I think computer viruses should count as life ... I think it says something about human nature that the only form of life we have created so far is purely destructive. We've created life in our own image.”
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: “Life is but a dream for the dead.”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “That’s how stories happen — with a turning point, an unexpected twist. There’s only one kind of happiness, but misfortune comes in all shapes and sizes. It’s like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a story.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Along with the idea of romantic love, she was introduced to another--physical beauty. Probably the most destructive ideas in the history of human thought. Both originated in envy, thrived in insecurity, and ended in disillusion.”
author: Toni Morrison

quote: “You were not born on earth to please anyone; you have to live life to express yourself, not to impress someone. Don't pretend to be someone you're not, and never lose yourself in search of other people's acceptance and approval.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Jamie: You know what I figured out today?Landon: What?Jamie: Maybe God has a bigger plan for me than I had for myself. Like this journey never ends. Like you were sent to me because I'm sick. To help me through all this. You're my angel.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “A joke is a very serious thing.”
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: “Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The irony of life is that those who wear masks often tell us more truths than those with open faces.”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Push your boundaries beyond the ordinary; be that “extra” in “extraordinary.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I feel sorry for anyone who is in a place where he feels strange and stupid.”
author: Lois Lowry

quote: “I want to be the best version of myself for anyone who is going to someday walk into my life and need someone to love them beyond reason.”
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: “In the midst of life, we are in death.”
author: Agatha Christie

quote: “We have nothing to lose, nothing to gain, nothing we desired anymore- except to make our lives into a work of art.”
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: “Pain or love or danger makes you real again....”
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: “Hopes are like hair ornaments. Girls want to wear too many of them. When they become old women they look silly wearing even one.”
author: Arthur Golden

quote: “Great Leaders Create More LeadersGood leaders have vision and inspire others to help them turn vision into reality. Great leaders create more leaders, not followers. Great leaders have vision, share vision, and inspire others to create their own.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Never forget:we walk on hell,gazing at flowers.”
author: Kobayashi Issa

quote: “In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: “That’s how I know they are dreams. Because the simple and plain and everyday things are the ones that we can never have. (Cassia Reyes)”
author: Ally Condie

quote: “After you find out all the things that can go wrong, your life becomes less about living and more about waiting.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.”
author: David Hume

quote: “I haven’t been very impressed lately.By people,or places,or the way someone said he loved me and then slowly changed his mind.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “Some things in life are too complicated to explain in any language.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree. All these aspirations are directed toward ennobling man's life, lifting it from the sphere of mere physical existence and leading the individual towards freedom.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “You have every right to a beautiful life.”
author: Selena Gomez

quote: “I don’t want life to imitate art. I want life to be art.”
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: “At 50, everyone has the face he deserves.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “My life is a reading list.”
author: John Irving

quote: “One who makes himself a worm cannot complain afterwards if people step on him.”
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: “The Lord prefers common-looking people. That is why he made so many of them.”
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: “And when I saw him[my father] lying dead in a pool of his own blood, I knew then that I hadn't stopped believing in God. I'd just stopped believing God cared. There might be a God, Clary, and there might be not. Either way, we're on our own.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Normal is an illusion. What is normal for the spider is chaos for the fly.”
author: Charles Addams

quote: “I have noticed that even those who assert that everything is predestined and that we can change nothing about it still look both ways before they cross the street.”
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: “Wisdom is having things right in your lifeand knowing why.”
author: William Stafford

quote: “We pass through this world but once. Few tragedies can be more extensive than the stunting of life, few injustices deeper than the denial of an opportunity to strive or even to hope, by a limit imposed from without, but falsely identified as lying within.”
author: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: “It's good to do uncomfortable things. It's weight training for life.”
author: Anne Lamott

quote: “There is no standard normal. Normal is subjective. There are seven billion versions of normal on this planet.”
author: Matt Haig

quote: “Your time may come. Do not be too sad, Sam. You cannot be always torn in two. You will have to be one and whole, for many years. You have so much to enjoy and to be, and to do.”
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: “Anything can happen in life, especially nothing.”
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: “A boo is a lot louder than a cheer.”
author: Lance Armstrong

quote: “It is in vain to say human beings ought to be satisfied with tranquility: they must have action; and they will make it if they cannot find it.”
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: “Positive expectations are the mark of the superior personality.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “The life where nothing was ever unexpected. Or inconvenient. Or unusual. The life without colour, pain or past.”
author: Lois Lowry

quote: “Life will defend itself no matter how small it is.”
author: Yann Martel

quote: “I would not have you descend into your own dream. I would have you be a conscious citizen of this terrible and beautiful world.”
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: “Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.”
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: “Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “All any of us wanted, really, was to know that we counted. That someone else's life would not have been as rich without us here.”
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: “I am not good at noticing when I'm happy, except in retrospect.”
author: Tana French

quote: “This place is a dream. Only a sleeper considers it real. Then death comes like dawn, and you wake up laughing at what you thought was your grief.”
author: Rumi

quote: “I always had this idea that you should never give up a happy middle in the hopes of a happy ending, because there is no such thing as a happy ending. Do you know what I mean? There is so much to lose.”
author: John Green

quote: “It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.”
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: “When we're connected to others, we become better people.”
author: Randy Pausch

quote: “And though you think the world is at your feet, it can rise up and tread on you.”
author: Ian McEwan

quote: “Change course, but don’t give up.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for”
author: Oliver James

quote: “We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.”
author: Voltaire

quote: “Do not let your difficulties fill you with anxiety, after all it is only in the darkest nights that stars shine more brightly.”
author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib AS

quote: “What makes earth feel like hell is our expectation that it should feel like heaven.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “No one ever does live happily ever after, but we leave the children to find that out for themselves.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.”
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: “I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.”
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote: “...Despite the mayhem that followed, Bruno found that he was still holding Shmuel's hand in his own and nothing in the world would have persuaded him to let go.”
author: John Boyne

quote: “We are born in one day. We die in one day. We can change in one day. And we can fall in love in one day. Anything can happen in just one day.”
author: Gayle Forman

quote: “I only want to write. And there's no college for that except life.”
author: Dodie Smith

quote: “I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy. ”
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: “Our lives can't be measured by our final years, of this I am sure.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “That's not a bad word...hate and war are bad words, but fuck isn't.”
author: Judy Blume

quote: “It is not worth the while to let our imperfections disturb us always.”
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: “It’s probably my job to tell you life isn’t fair, but I figure you already know that. So instead, I’ll tell you that hope is precious, and you’re right not to give up.”
author: C.J. Redwine

quote: “In the Book of Life, The answers aren't in the back.”
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: “It is life, I think, to watch the water. A man can learn so many things.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “Going back to something is harder than you think.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “ah, life—the thingthat happensto uswhile we’re offsomewhere elseblowing ondandelions& wishingourselves intothe pages ofour favoritefairy tales.”
author: Amanda Lovelace

quote: “Remember how it was when we kissed? Armfuls and armfuls of light thrown right at us. A rope dropping down from the sky. How can the word love and the word life even fit in the mouth?”
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: “If you're not comfortable enough with yourself or with your own truth when entering a relationship, then you're not ready for that relationship.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.”
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: “We should live our lives as though Christ was coming this afternoon.”
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: “I believe in looking reality straight in the eye and denying it. ”
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: “There's always another storm. It's the way the world works. Snowstorms, rainstorms, windstorms, sandstorms, and firestorms. Some are fierce and others are small. You have to deal with each one separately, but you need to keep an eye on whats brewing for tomorrow.”
author: Maria V. Snyder

quote: “So he tasted the deep pain that is reserved only for the strong, just as he had tasted for a little while the deep happiness.”
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: “The end is in the beginning and yet you go on.”
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: “Can a person steal happiness? Or is just another internal, infernal human trick?”
author: Markus Zusak

quote: “Those born to wealth, and who have the means of gratifying every wish, know not what is the real happiness of life, just as those who have been tossed on the stormy waters of the ocean on a few frail planks can alone realize the blessings of fair weather.”
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: “I do not love men: I love what devours them.”
author: André Gide

quote: “We may be small, and we may be young, but we will shake the world for our beliefs.”
author: Samantha Shannon

quote: “No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Self-consciousness is the enemy of all art, be it acting, writing, painting, or living itself, which is the greatest art of all.”
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: “May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.”
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: “Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.”
author: Ayn Rand

quote: “The problem, of course, was that [he] saw the world in black and white. And he got to decide what was black and what was white. You can't love a person who lives that way without fearing him too. Maybe even hating him a little.”
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: “When you are measuring life, you are not living it.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “All sacrifice and suffering is redemptive. It is used to either teach the individual or to help others. Nothing is by chance.”
author: A.J. RUSSELL

quote: “Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I love you, even if there isn’t any me, or any love, or even any life. I love you.”
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: “You can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “If after I die, people want to write my biography, there is nothing simpler. They only need two dates: the date of my birth and the date of my death. Between one and another, every day is mine.”
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: “Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.”
author: Dr Roopleen

quote: “Einmal ist keinmal, says Tomas to himself. What happens but once, says the German adage, might as well not have happened at all. If we have only one life to live, we might as well not have lived at all.”
author: Milan Kundera

quote: “It's such a shame to waste time. We always think we have so much of it.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “No matter where you are, you're always a bit on your own, always an outsider.”
author: Banana Yoshimoto

quote: “If you can't do anything about it, laugh like hell.”
author: David Cook

quote: “In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid!" "And what if you do get a second chance?" "You take it!”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “I am nothing more than the consequence of catastrophe.”
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: “Life will hit you hard in the face, wait for you to get back up just so it can kick you in the stomach. But getting the wind knocked out of you is the only way to remind your lungs how much they like the taste of air.”
author: Sarah Kay

quote: “Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.”
author: Wil Zeus

quote: “Life is 10 percent what you make itand 90 percent how you take it.”
author: Irving Berlin

quote: “Life is a drama full of tragedy and comedy. You should learn to enjoy the comic episodes a little more.”
author: Jeannette Walls

quote: “Love demands everything, they say, but my love demands only this: that no matter what happens or how long it takes, you`ll keep faith in me, you`ll remember who we are, and you`ll never feel despair.”
author: Ann Brashares

quote: “The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.”
author: Eric Berne

quote: “Son. Everyone dies alone. That's what it is. It's a door. It's one person wide. When you go through it, you do it alone. But it doesn't mean you've got to be alone before you go through the door. And believe me, you aren't alone on the other side.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “Love is forgiving, accepting, moving on, embracing, and all encompassing. And if you’re not doing that for yourself, you cannot do that with anyone else.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “He could only consider me as the living corpse of a would-be suicide, a person dead to shame, an idiot ghost.”
author: Osamu Dazai

quote: “Look for the good in every person and every situation. You'll almost always find it.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “It is hard work and great art to make life not so serious.”
author: John Irving

quote: “Beauty is a whore, I like money better.”
author: Michael Cunningham

quote: “What I want is so simple I almost can't say it: elementary kindness.”
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: “Never lose faith in yourself, and never lose hope; remember, even when this world throws its worst and then turns its back, there is still always hope.”
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: “Don't wish it was easier wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenge wish for more wisdom”
author: Jim Rohn

quote: “Life would be unbearably dull if we had answers to all our questions.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “What a waste my life would be without all the beautiful mistakes I've made.”
author: Alice Bag

quote: “An ability to look into the confusing mess of life and see things for what they are.”
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: “Cease, cows, life is short.”
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: “The world will give you that once in awhile, a brief timeout; the boxing bell rings and you go to your corner, where somebody dabs mercy on your beat-up life.”
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: “Everyone has a past, but that's just it--it's in the past. You can learn from it, but you can't change it.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “That's the thing about life. A lot of the time, it isn't easy at all. We just have to try to make the best of it.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “Opening up to the wrong person is like putting ammo in their hands.”
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: “People do not die for us immediately, but remain bathed in a sort of aura of life which bears no relation to true immortality but through which they continue to occupy our thoughts in the same way as when they were alive. It is as though they were traveling abroad.”
author: Marcel Proust

quote: “Life is too short when you think of the length of death”
author: Sean Mangan

quote: “My point is, life is about balance. The good and the bad. The highs and the lows. The pina and the colada.”
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If you spend your life sparing people’s feelings and feeding their vanity, you get so you can’t distinguish what should be respected in them.”
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: “Crap.It's all crap.Living is crap.Life has no meaning.None. Nowhere to be found.Crap.Why doesn't anybody realize this?”
author: K-Ske Hasegawa

quote: “Life seems to go on without effort when I am filled with music.”
author: George Eliot

quote: “It's a funny thing about life, once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “You wanted to feel alive, right? It doesn't matter if you're monster or human. Living hurts.”
author: Victoria Schwab

quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Alice had got so much into the way of expecting nothing but out-of-the-way things to happen, that it seemed quite dull and stupid for life to go on in the common way.”
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: “Life’s greatest gift is the freedom it leaves you to step out of it whenever you choose.”
author: André Breton

quote: “Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling”
author: Tony DeLiso

quote: “But the only way never to do the wrong thing is never to do anything.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “I wonder if that's how darkness wins, by convincing us to trap it inside ourselves, instead of emptying it out.I don't want it to win.”
author: Jasmine Warga

quote: “If someone does not want me it is not the end of the world. But if I do not want me, the world is nothing but endings.”
author: Nayyirah Waheed
