quote: “Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Yesterday was surreal. At times K was almost back to herself…funny…interested and relatively mobile. She was tactile and we kissed…she whispered naughty comments into my ear…achingly beautiful…I love her so much”
author: Peter B. Forster

quote: “Because horror on Earth is real and it is every day. It is like a flower or like the sun; it cannot be contained.”
author: Alice Sebold

quote: “I'm sure you think that I don't understand what you're going through, but I do. It's just that sometimes, our future is dictated by what we are, opposed to what we want.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “Mathematics expresses values that reflect the cosmos, including orderliness, balance, harmony, logic, and abstract beauty.”
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: “Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Too many people seem to believe that silence was a void that needed to be filled, even if nothing important was said.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “When we fail to set boundaries and hold people accountable, we feel used and mistreated. This is why we sometimes attack who they are, which is far more hurtful than addressing a behavior or a choice.”
author: Brené Brown

quote: “Everyone has his own reality in which, if one is not too cautious, timid or frightened, one swims. This is the only reality there is.”
author: Henry Miller

quote: “Life isn’t about what you get, it’s about what you DO with what you get.”
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: “Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “Anyone who isn't embarrassed of who they were last year probably isn't learning enough.”
author: Alain de Botton

quote: “No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I had forgotten how much light there is in the world, till you gave it back to me.”
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: “If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.”
author: John von Neumann

quote: “Realize deeply that the present moment is all you will ever have.”
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: “regret is mostly caused by not havingdone anything.”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “all of us have a place in history. mine is clouds.”
author: richard brautigan

quote: “Normal is getting dressed in clothes that you buy for work and driving through traffic in a car that you are still paying for—in order to get to the job you need to pay for the clothes and the car, and the house you leave vacant all day so you can afford to live in it.”
author: Ellen Goodman

quote: “If I had a camera,' I said, 'I'd take a picture of you every day. That way I'd remember how you looked every single day of your life.”
author: Nicole Krauss

quote: “A home filled with nothing but yourself. It's heavy, that lightness. It's crushing, that emptiness.”
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: “The true hypocrite is the one who ceases to perceive his deception, the one who lies with sincerity.”
author: Andre Gide

quote: “Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Who would have guessed that four minutes could change everything?”
author: Jennifer E. Smith

quote: “By the way, when Oprah Winfrey is suggesting you may have overextended yourself, you need to examine your fucking life.”
author: Tina Fey

quote: “Love changes what is probable and makes unlikely things possible.”
author: Ally Condie

quote: “The world is merciless, and it's also very beautiful.”
author: Hajime Isayama

quote: “You know how both life and porno movies end. The only difference is life starts with the orgasm.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “Life doesn't make any sense, and we all pretend it does. Comedy's job is to point out that it doesn't make sense, and that it doesn't make much difference anyway.”
author: Eric Idle

quote: “Dignity is as essential to human life as water, food, and oxygen. The stubborn retention of it, even in the face of extreme physical hardship, can hold a man's soul in his body long past the point at which the body should have surrendered it.”
author: Laura Hillenbrand

quote: “Frustration and Love can’t exist in the same place at the same time, so get real and start doing what you would rather be doing in life. Love your life. All of it. Even the heavy shit that happened to you when you were 8. All of it was and IS perfect.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “Life is a long lesson in humility.”
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: “I wish we could sometimes love the characters in real life as we love the characters in romances. There are a great many human souls whom we should accept more kindly, and even appreciate more clearly, if we simply thought of them as people in a story.”
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: “When she is happy, she can't stop talking, when she is sad she doesn't say a word.”
author: Ann Brashares

quote: “Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Now and then we had a hope that if we lived and were good, God would permit us to be pirates.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: “To invent your own life's meaning is not easy, but it's still allowed, and I think you'll be happier for the trouble.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “End? No, the journey doesn't end here. Death is just another path. One that we all must take.”
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: “I began to understand that suffering and disappointments and melancholy are there not to vex us or cheapen us or deprive us of our dignity but to mature and transfigure us.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Dancers are the athletes of God.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment”
author: Jim Rohn

quote: “Oh threats of Hell and Hopes of Paradise!One thing at least is certain - This Life flies;One thing is certain and the rest is Lies -The Flower that once has blown forever dies.”
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: “Potential has a shelf life.”
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: “She smiled and said with an ecstatic air: "It shines like a little diamond","What does?""This moment. It is round, it hangs in empty space like a little diamond; I am eternal.”
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: “Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.”
author: Bohdi Sanders

quote: “A woman laughing is a woman conquered.”
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: “Rules for happiness: something to do, someone to love, something to hope for.”
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: “I can't. You can't rewrite the past.”
author: Jay Asher

quote: “No matter how hard life is, don't lose hope”
author: Zayn Malik

quote: “When it was over, she gathered him in her arms. And told him the terrible irony of her life.That she had wanted to be dead all those years while her brother had been alive. That had been her sin.And this was her penance.Wanting to live when everyone else seemed dead.”
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: “Your Life Is Happening Right Now: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I've come to believe that in everyone's life, there's one undeniable moment of change, a set of circumstances that suddenly alters everything.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “I love the Lord, for he heard my voice; he heard my cry for mercy. Because he turned his ear to me, I will call on him as long as I live. (Psalms 116:1-2 NIV)”
author: Anonymous

quote: “Here’s to freedom, cheers to art. Here’s to having an excellent adventure and may the stopping never start.”
author: Jason Mraz

quote: “While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.”
author: Angela Schwindt

quote: “You don't ask people with knives in their stomachs what would make them happy; happiness is no longer the point. It's all about survival; it's all about whether you pull the knife out and bleed to death or keep it in...”
author: Nick Hornby

quote: “Life isn't worth living, unless it is lived for someone else.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Having perfected our disguise, we spend our lives searching for someone we don’t fool.”
author: Robert Brault

quote: “Never try to do anything that is outside of who you are. A forced smile is a sign of what feels wrong in your heart, so recognize it when it happens. Living a lie will reduce you to one.”
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: “Distance sometimes lets you know who is worth keeping, and who is worth letting go.”
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: “If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I'd found out that if you pushed people away hard enough, they tended to go.”
author: Morgan Matson

quote: “I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances, Be more active, Show up more often.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “Bring something incomprehensible into the world!”
author: Gilles Deleuze

quote: “To live is to be musical, starting with the blood dancing in your veins. Everything living has a rhythm. Do you feel your music?”
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: “Please, touch me, I pray.”
author: Jess C Scott

quote: “People die all the time. Life is a lot more fragile than we think. So you should treat others in a way that leaves no regrets. Fairly, and if possible, sincerely. It's too easy not to make the effort, then weep and wring your hands after the person dies.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile.”
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: “If you can't control your peanut butter, you can't expect to control your life.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “That's the problem with life. You never get enough time to stare at your ceiling and try to figure out what's going on.”
author: Leila Sales

quote: “Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again.”
author: Eric Roth

quote: “Life is full of grief, to exactly the degree we allow ourselves to love other people.”
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: “When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “And there in the dark, he asks if it was really worth it.Were the instants of joy worth the stretches of sorrow?Were the moments of beauty worth the year of pain?And she turns her head, and looks at him, and says 'Always.”
author: V.E. Schwab

quote: “YOU FEAR TO DIE?"It's not that I don't want... I mean, I've always...it's just that life is a habit that's hard to break...”
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: “I sent my Soul through the Invisible, Some letter of that After-life to spell: And by and by my Soul return'd to me, And answer'd: 'I Myself am Heav'n and Hell”
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: “We're so engaged in doing things to achieve purposes of outer value that we forget the inner value, the rapture that is associated with being alive, is what it is all about.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “We are all ordinary. We are all boring. We are all spectacular. We are all shy. We are all bold. We are all heroes. We are all helpless. It just depends on the day.”
author: Brad Meltzer

quote: “When terrible things have happened to you, sometimes the promise of something good can be just as frightening.”
author: Margaret  Rogerson

quote: “Whether we like it or not, the one justification for the existence of all religions is death, they need death as much as we need bread to eat.”
author: José Saramago

quote: “I don’t chase after anyone, If you wanna walk out of my life, then I’ll hold the fucking door open for you.”
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: “You can be young without money, but you can't be old without it.”
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: “Don't Worry Be Happy”
author: Meher Baba

quote: “To live is to war with trolls.”
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: “My only regrets are the moments when i doubted myself and took the safe route. Life is too short to waste time being unhappy.”
author: Dan Howell

quote: “Memory can make a thing seem to have been much more than it was.”
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: “Life doesn't require ideals. It requires standards of action.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “That's what I love about Aibileen, she can take the most complicated things in life and wrap them up so small and simple, they'll fit right in your pocket.”
author: Kathryn Stockett

quote: “Envy, after all, comes from wanting something that isn't yours. But grief comes from losing something you've already had.”
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: “I like shape very much. A novel has to have shape, and life doesn't have any. ”
author: Jean Rhys

quote: “But I have my life, I’m living it. It’s twisted, exhausting, uncertain, and full of guilt, but nonetheless, there’s something there.”
author: Banana Yoshimoto

quote: “One of the greatest journeys in life is overcoming insecurity and learning to truly not give a shit.”
author: J. A. Konrath

quote: “I don't want to do anything. I don't even want to start this day because then I'll just be expected to finish it.”
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: “You've never lived what you are thinking, and that isn't good. Only the ideas we actually live are of any value.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “There is no such thing as work-life balance. Everything worth fighting for unbalances your life.”
author: Alain de Botton

quote: “She had been given a wonderful gift: life. Sometimes it was cruelly taken away too soon, but it's what you did with it that counted, not how long it lasted.”
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: “In fairy tales, the princesses kiss the frogs, and the frogs become princes. In real life, the pricesses kiss princes, and the princes turn into frogs.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “One can be very much in love with a woman without wishing to spend the rest of one's life with her.”
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: “It's easy to look back and see it, and it's easy to give the advice. But the sad fact is, most people don't look beneath the surface until it's too late.”
author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quote: “We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.”
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: “I came here looking for a Great Perhaps, for real friends and a more-than-minor life..”
author: John Green

quote: “We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.”
author: Brian Cox

quote: “And were an epitaph to be my story I'd have a short one ready for my own. I would have written of me on my stone: I had a lover's quarrel with the world.”
author: Robert Frost

quote: “Because if you've found meaning in your life, you don't want to go back. You want to go forward.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Life has but one true charm: the charm of the game. But what if we’re indifferent to whether we win or lose?”
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: “You serve a greater cause. Your life is not yours to throw away (Magnus Bane)”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't three lefts make a right? Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't two negatives make a positive?”
author: Andrew Clements

quote: “Desire makes life happen. Makes it matter. Makes everything worth it. Desire is life. Hunger to see the next sunrise or sunset, to touch the one you love, to try again. 'Hell would be waking up and wanting nothing,' he agrees.”
author: Karen Marie Moning

quote: “Everything changes in my life, and the world stays the same.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “Real life is only ever just real life. Messy. What it means depends on how you look at it. The only thing you’ve got to do is find a way to live there.”
author: Patrick Ness

quote: “I’m a fake fact factory. The things I make are the things I make up. Also, as a side business, I make love. Actually, I just made that up.”
author: Dora J. Arod

quote: “You often meet your fate on the road you take to avoid it.”
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: “She felt... how life, from being made up of little separate incidents which one lived one by one, became curled and whole like a wave which bore one up with it and threw one down with it, there, with a dash on the beach.”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “It has shown me that everything is illuminated in the light of the past. It is always along the side of us...on the inside, looking out.”
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: “you might want to decide fast. We live in a dangerous world. If you see a chance to be happy, you have to fight for it, so later you have no regrets.”
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: “Fate loves the fearless.”
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: “The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.”
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: “You live it forward, but understand it backward.”
author: Abraham Verghese

quote: “Home is where somebody notices when you are no longer there. ”
author: Aleksandar Hemon

quote: “Rise to the occassion which is life!”
author: Virginia Euwer Wolff

quote: “Sometimes things happen to people and they're not equipped to deal with them.”
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: “I am old enough to know only too well my good and bad qualities, which were often one in the same.”
author: Lisa See

quote: “Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “People, in general, would rather die than forgive. It's that hard.”
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: “See, the poor dream all their lives of getting enough to eat and looking like the rich. And what do the rich dream of?? Losing weight and looking like the poor.”
author: Aravind Adiga

quote: “Sometimes life happens.”
author: Katie McGarry

quote: “Art is the reason I get up in the morning, but the definition ends there. It doesn't seem fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.”
author: Ani DiFranco

quote: “I believe when life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade...and try to find someone whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.”
author: Ron White

quote: “I don't pray really, because I don't want to bore God.”
author: Orson Welles

quote: “Find someone who has a life that you want and figure out how they got it. Read books, pick your role models wisely. Find out what they did and do it.”
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: “All I am is literature, and I am not able or willing to be anything else.”
author: Franz Kafka

quote: “The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.”
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: “We all have such fateful objects — it may be a recurrent landscape in one case, a number in another — carefully chosen by the gods to attract events of specific significance for us: here shall John always stumble; there shall Jane's heart always break.”
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: “The connections we make in the course of a life--maybe that's what heaven is.”
author: Fred Rogers

quote: “Life is a spark between two identical voids, the darkness before birth and the one after death.”
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: “Life is more fun if you play games.”
author: Roald Dahl

quote: “Life is ours to be spent, not tobe saved.”
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: “I know my life's meaningful because" - and here he stopped, and looked shy, and was silent for a moment before he continued - " because I'm a good friend. I love my friends, and I care about them, and I think I make them happy.”
author: Hanya Yanagihara

quote: “Oh, God of Dust and Rainbows,Help us to seeThat without the dust the rainbowWould not be.”
author: Langston Hughes

quote: “Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Life is a series of surprises and would not be worth taking or keeping if it were not.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “You don’t get to pick where you’re from, but you always have control of where you’re going.”
author: Chris Colfer

quote: “Never compete with someone who has nothing to lose.”
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: “Be so good they can't ignore you.”
author: Steve Martin

quote: “That’s life for you. All the happiness you gather to yourself, it will sweep away like it’s nothing. If you ask me I don’t think there are any such things as curses. I think there is only life. That’s enough.”
author: Junot Diaz

quote: “You don't know me. You know one me, just like I know one you. And you can't know every me, and I can't know every you.”
author: David Levithan

quote: “You read and write and sing and experience, thinking that one day these things will build the character you admire to live as. You love and lose and bleed best you can, to the extreme, hoping that one day the world will read you like the poem you want to be.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “Single is no longer a lack of options – but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.”
author: Mandy Hale

quote: “We're not words, Henry, we're people.Words are how others define us, but we can define ourselves any way we choose.”
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: “What had human beings become? Did war make us evil or just activate an evil already lurking within us?”
author: Ruta Sepetys

quote: “That's the problem with memories: you can visit them, but you can't live in them.”
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: “Life... is like a grapefruit. Well, it's sort of orangey-yellow and dimpled on the outside, wet and squidgy in the middle. It's got pips inside, too. Oh, and some people have half a one for breakfast.”
author: Douglas Adams

quote: “Exactly!" said Deep Thought. "So once you do know what the question actually is, you'll know what the answer means.”
author: Douglas Adams

quote: “What we like to think of ourselves and what we really are rarely have much in common....”
author: Stephen King

quote: “Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it is gone; and do not be troubled about the future, for it has yet to come. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering”
author: Ida Scott Taylor

quote: “Plato says that the unexamined life is not worth living. But what if the examined life turns out to be a clunker as well?”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “To understand just one life you have to swallow the world ... do you wonder, then, that I was a heavy child?”
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: “Each time we don't say what we wanna say, we're dying.”
author: Yoko Ono

quote: “Nothing is built on stone; All is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone.”
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: “If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Everything you do is triggered by an emotion of either desire or fear.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “Everything is funnier in retrospect, funnier and prettier and cooler. You can laugh at anything from far enough away.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “I made up my mind not to care so much about the destination, and simply enjoy the journey.”
author: David Archuleta

quote: “Disappointment came to me,and booted me,and bruised and hurt me,but that's how people grow up.”
author: Morrissey

quote: “And meanwhile time goes about its immemorial work of making everyone look and feel like shit.”
author: Martin Amis

quote: “Love and friendship. They are what make us who we are, and what can change us, if we let them.”
author: Emily Giffin

quote: “It is after all so easy to shatter a story. To break a chain of thought. To ruin a fragment of a dream being carried around carefully like a piece of porcelain. To let it be, to travel with it, as Velutha did, is much the harder thing to do.”
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: “Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials.”
author: Lin Yutang

quote: “It is a joy to be hidden, and disaster not to be found.”
author: D.W. Winnicott

quote: “Politeness is organized indifference.”
author: Paul Valéry

quote: “For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible.”
author: Stuart Chase

quote: “The bounties of space, of infinite outwardness, were three: empty heroics, low comedy, and pointless death.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “It's good to let God pick a man for you. We don't do so well when we pick them ourselves. They end up lipsticks in a drawer, all those wrong colors you thought looked so good in the package.”
author: Deb Caletti

quote: “An education is not so much about making a living as making a person.”
author: Tara Westover

quote: “I finally figured out the only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.”
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: “Life is a sexually transmitted disease and the mortality rate is one hundred percent.”
author: R.D. Laing

quote: “Accidents don't happen to people who take accidents as a personal insult.”
author: Mario Puzo

quote: “My heart is afraid that it will have to suffer.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “You'll forget it when you're dead, and so will I. When I'm dead, I'm going to forget everything–and I advise you to do the same.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live”
author: Lin Yutang

quote: “Life is and will ever remain an equation incapable of solution, but it contains certain known factors.”
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: “...and you drink a little too much and try a little too hard. And you go home to a cold bed and think, 'That was fine'. And your life is a long line of fine.”
author: Gillian Flynn

quote: “I met a boy whose eyes showed me that the past, present and future were all the same thing.”
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: “You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The difference between school and life? In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.”
author: Tom Bodett

quote: “Good things don’t wait until you’re ready. Sometimes they come right before, when you’re almost there. And I figured when that happens, you can let them pass by like a bus not meant for you. Or you can get ready. So I got ready.”
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quote: “There are no conditions to which a person cannot grow accustomed, especially if he sees that everyone around him lives in the same way.”
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: “Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Single” is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.”
author: Mandy Hale

quote: “I know I wrote letters to people with no address on this earth, I know that you are dead. But I hear you. I hear all of you. We were here. Our lives matter.”
author: Ava Dellaira

quote: “No matter how much you love someone, you still want to have you own way.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “People are going to say what they want to say and think what they want to think, and I can't change their minds.”
author: Hilary Duff

quote: “Maybe you could be mine / or maybe we’ll be entwined / aimless in this sexless foreplay.”
author: Jess C Scott

quote: “For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.”
author: Sam Levenson

quote: “Good works is giving to the poor and the helpless, but divine works is showing them their worth to the One who matters.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being.”
author: Rumi

quote: “Everything you want in life is a relationship away.”
author: Idowu Koyenikan

quote: “When all is said and done, the life of faith is nothing if not an unending struggle of the spirit with every available weapon against the flesh.”
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: “Go for it, while you can. I know you have it in you. And I can't promise you'll get everything you want, but I can promise nothing will change if you don't try.”
author: J.M. Darhower

quote: “The deepest wounds aren't the ones we get from other people hurting us. They are the wounds we give ourselves when we hurt other people.”
author: Isobelle Carmody

quote: “I used to wonder if it was God's plan that I should be alone for so much of my life. But I found peace. I found happiness within people and the world.”
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: “No,’ Nico said. ‘Getting a second life is one thing. Making it a better life, that’s the trick.’ As soon as he said it, Nico realized he could’ve been talking about himself. He decided not to bring that up.”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “Have you ever hoped for something? And held out for it against all the odds? Until everything you did was ridiculous? ”
author: Ali Shaw

quote: “What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The consequences of every act are included in the act itself.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “There are things you can't walk away from. Not if you want to live with yourself afterward.”
author: Jim Butcher

quote: “Some say life is the thing, but I prefer reading.”
author: Ruth Rendell

quote: “Sometimes life is very mean: a person can spend days, weeks, months and years without feeling new. Then, when a door opens - a positive avalanche pours in. One moment, you have nothing, the next, you have more than you can cope with.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Do you know how there are moments when the world moves so slowly you can feel your bones shifting, your mind tumbling? When you think that no matter what happens to you for the rest of your life, you will remember every last detail of that one minute forever?”
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: “Most of what matters in our lives takes place in our absence.”
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: “We do not remember days, we remember moments. The richness of life lies in memories we have forgotten.”
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: “Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.”
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: “There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.”
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: “I am a horror maniac who prefers to stay at home.”
author: Junji Ito

quote: “The path to success is to take massive, determined action.”
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: “The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.”
author: Amit Ray

quote: “It would be so nice if something made sense for a change.”
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: “If fate doesn't make you laugh, you just don't get the joke.”
author: Gregory David Roberts

quote: “Time ticks by; we grow older. Before we know it, too much time has passed and we've missed the chance to have had other people hurt us. To a younger me this sounded like luck; to an older me this sounds like a quiet tragedy.”
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: “When you say "I" and "my" too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we" and "our".”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The behavior of a human being in sexual matters is often a prototype for the whole of his other modes of reaction in life.”
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: “We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “Sometimes you have to be a bitch to get things done.”
author: Madonna

quote: “Your entire sense of self-worth is predicated upon your belief that you matter, that you matter to the universe. But you don't. Because we are the ants.”
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: “Silence is argument carried out by other means.”
author: Ernesto "Che" Guevara

quote: “I am a person who is unhappy with things as they stand. We cannot accept the world as it is. Each day we should wake up foaming at the mouth because of the injustice of things.”
author: Hugo Claus

quote: “Look, everyone talks about the unknown like it's some big scary thing, but it's the familiar that's always bothered me. It's heavy, builds up around you like rocks, until it's walls and a ceiling and a cell.”
author: V.E. Schwab

quote: “That I shall love always, I argue theethat love is life,and life hath immortality”
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: “The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “Here is a test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: If you're alive it isn't.”
author: Richard Bach

quote: “The moment you recognize what is beautiful in this world, you stop being a slave”
author: Aravind Adiga

quote: “Totally without hope one cannot live. To live without hope is to cease to live. Hell is hopelessness. It is no accident that above the entrance to Dante's hell is the inscription: "Leave behind all hope, you who enter here.”
author: Jurgen Moltmann

quote: “Sometimes bad things have to happen before good things can.”
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: “You don't dwell on what you've lost, you just move on."-Allison”
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: “I had a dream about you. We installed Dr. Robert Jarvik’s artificial heart in a mannequin and brought it to life, only to later kill it because a creature that’s all fake heart and no brain is what’s commonly called a “politician,” and must be destroyed. ”
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: “Why did I write? Because I found life unsatisfactory.”
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: “We're all made of stories. When they finally put us underground, the stories are what will go on. Not forever, perhaps, but for a time. It's a kind of immortality, I suppose, bounded by limits, it's true, but then so's everything.”
author: Charles de Lint

quote: “If something doesn't work exactly right, or maybe needs some special treatment, you don't just throw it away. Everything can't be fully operational all the time. Sometimes, we need to have the patience to give something the little nudge it needs.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “You enter the forestat the darkest point,where there is no path.Where there is a way or path,it is someone else's path.You are not on your own path.If you follow someone else's way,you are not going to realizeyour potential.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “I run after her, not really giving chase. I’m running because I can, because I must.Because I want to see how far I can go before I have to stop.”
author: Libba Bray

quote: “It is a curious situation that the sea, from which life first arose should now be threatened by the activities of one form of that life. But the sea, though changed in a sinister way, will continue to exist; the threat is rather to life itself.”
author: Rachel Carson

quote: “Sadly enough, the most painful goodbyes are the ones that are left unsaid and never explained.”
author: Jonathan Harnisch

quote: “A feeling is no longer the same when it comes the second time. It dies through the awareness of its return. We become tired and weary of our feelings when they come too often and last too long.”
author: Pascal Mercier

quote: “Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.”
author: Ana Monnar

quote: “There's nothing wrong with not understanding yourself.”
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: “Keep good company, read good books, love good things and cultivate soul and body as faithfully as you can.”
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: “I am my own experiment. I am my own work of art.”
author: Madonna

quote: “I believe that I am not responsible for the meaningfulness or meaninglessness of life, but that I am responsible for what I do with the life I've got.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “That's how it is on this bitch of an earth.”
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: “If there be light, then there is darkness; if cold, heat; if height, depth; if solid, fluid; if hard, soft; if rough, smooth; if calm, tempest; if prosperity, adversity; if life, death.”
author: Pythagoras

quote: “It’s strange how things can change back as suddenly as they changed originally. When one thing happens and suddenly, things are back to normal.”
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: “I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.”
author: Holly Black

quote: “Most of us have the good or bad fortune of seeing our lives fall apart so slowly we barely notice.”
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: “He said that we belonged together because he was born with a flower and I was born with a butterfly and that flowers and butterflies need each other for survival.”
author: Gemma Malley

quote: “When all else fails, there's always delusion.”
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: “No matter how qualified or deserving we are, we will never reach a better life until we can imagine it for ourselves and allow ourselves to have it.”
author: Richard Bach

quote: “I want to keep my dreams, even bad ones, because without them, I might have nothing all night long.”
author: Joseph Heller

quote: “You don't put your life into your books, you find it there.”
author: Alan Bennett

quote: “We have to lie to ourselves to live. Otherwise, we'd go crazy.”
author: Patrick Ness

quote: “You said we all want there to be more than this! Well, there's always more than this. There's always something you don't know.”
author: Patrick Ness

quote: “Only after disaster can we be resurrected.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If people make fun of you, that probably means you're doing something right.”
author: Evanescence

quote: “A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.”
author: George Augustus Moore

quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself. Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “There’s a really stupid saying: When life hands you a lemon, make lemonade. Well, I have a better saying: When life hands you a lemon, shove that lemon up its stupid butt.”
author: Gena Showalter

quote: “There is strange comfort in knowing that no matter what happens today, the Sun will rise again tomorrow.”
author: Aaron Lauritsen

quote: “You stay safe, You love. You survive. You laugh and cry and struggle and sometimes you fail and sometimes you succeed. You Push.”
author: Carrie Ryan

quote: “it was when I stopped searching for home within others and lifted the foundations of home within myself I found there were no roots more intimate than those between a mind and body that have decided to be whole.”
author: Rupi Kaur

quote: “Wildflower; pick up your pretty little head, It will get easier, your dreams are not dead.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “To find out if she really loved me, I hooked her up to a lie detector. And just as I suspected, my machine was broken. ”
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: “Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The world is 3 days: As for yesterday, it has vanished along with all that was in it. As for tomorrow, you may never see it. As for today, it is yours, so work on it.”
author: Hasan Al-Basri

quote: “Because there was a hunger in me to see everything and do everything. I wanted to be everyone I saw. I wasn't enough for me. Can you understand that?”
author: Sidney Sheldon

quote: “Do nothing, and nothing happens. Life is about decisions. You either make them or they're made for you, but you can't avoid them.”
author: Mhairi McFarlane

quote: “What if I'm in charge of my own damn light switch?”
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: “Being born is like being kidnapped. And then sold into slavery.”
author: Andy Warhol

quote: “There's a sorrow and pain in everyone's life, but every now and then there's a ray of light that melts the loneliness in your heart and brings comfort like hot soup and a soft bed.”
author: Hubert Selby Jr.

quote: “Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form.”
author: John Berger

quote: “The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve. ”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “I think, that if the world were a bit more like ComicCon, it would be a better place.”
author: Matt Smith

quote: “Son, are you happy? I don't mean to pry,but do you dream of Heaven?Have you ever wanted to die?”
author: Tim Burton

quote: “If you have kindness in your heart, you offer acts of kindness to touch the hearts of others wherever you go—whether they are random or planned. Kindness becomes a way of life.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “You’ll be fine. You’re 25. Feeling [unsure] and lost is part of your path. Don’t avoid it. See what those feelings are showing you and use it. Take a breath. You’ll be okay. Even if you don’t feel okay all the time.”
author: Louis C.K.

quote: “My life has been one great big joke,A dance that's walked,A song that's spoke,I laugh so hard I almost choke,When I think about myself.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I can’t really act the way I want to act, or say what I want to say all the time. And a lot of times, I cover that up with a smile.”
author: Hilary Duff

quote: “I simply regard romantic comedies as a subgenre of sci-fi, in which the world created therein has different rules than my regular human world.”
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: “It is beautiful, it is endless, it is full and yet seems empty. It hurts us.”
author: Jackson Pearce

quote: “She cracked a smile. "So what's your poison?" He sighed dramatically, and let the truth tumble off his tongue. "Life." "Ah," she said ruefully. "That'll kill you.”
author: Victoria Schwab

quote: “There's more to life than love.”
author: Ramon Bautista

quote: “I need to stop fantasizing about running away to some other life and start figuring out the one I have.”
author: Holly Black

quote: “Rule your mind or it will rule you.”
author: Horace

quote: “There is something incredibly nostalgic and significant about the annual cascade of autumn leaves.”
author: Joe L. Wheeler

quote: “The reason why the universe is eternal is that it does not live for itself; it gives life to others as it transforms.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: “He found himself understanding the wearisomeness of this life, where every path was an improvisation and a considerable part of one's waking life was spent watching one's feet.”
author: William Golding

quote: “Life is like an onion; you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.”
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: “People don't always want to be with people. It gets tiring.”
author: Emma Donoghue

quote: “Would you like to know your future?If your answer is yes, think again. Not knowing is the greatest life motivator.So enjoy, endure, survive each moment as it comes to you in its proper sequence -- a surprise.”
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: “Like gravity, karma is so basic we often don't even notice it.”
author: Sakyong Mipham

quote: “Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.”
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: “Before I can tell my life what I want to do with it, I must listen to my life telling me who I am.”
author: Parker J. Palmer

quote: “Love yourself. Forgive yourself. Be true to yourself. How you treat yourself sets the standard for how others will treat you.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Everybody know death is inevitably coming, but it never fails to catch everybody by surprise everytime one is going”
author: Hlovate

quote: “having nothing to struggleagainstthey have nothing to strugglefor.”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “Maybe a person is just made up of a lot of people," I say. "Maybe we're accumulating these new selves all the time.”
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: “It frightens me, the awful truth, of how sweet life can be...”
author: Bob Dylan

quote: “Every man should lose a battle in his youth, so he does not lose a war when he is old.”
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: “The past can teach us, nurture us, but it cannot sustain us. The essence of life is change, and we must move ever forward or the soul will wither and die.”
author: Susanna Kearsley

quote: “You had to risk your life to get love. You had to get right to the edge of death to ever be saved.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now.”
author: Rick Warren

quote: “I don't judge people. It blurs out the center of my attention,my focus, myself.”
author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

quote: “The cradle rocks above an abyss, and common sense tells us that our existence is but a brief crack of light between two eternities of darkness.”
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: “They both listened silently to the water, which to them was not just water, but the voice of life, the voice of Being, the voice of perpetual Becoming.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “I have stitched life into me like a rare organ--from "Three Women: A Poem for Three Voices", written 1962”
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: “In the meantime, I hope you will find your place, wherever you are. Even in the silence, I hope you will find the words you need to share.”
author: Rebecca   Ross

quote: “Listen to the cry of a woman in labor at the hour of giving birth — look at the dying man’s struggle at his last extremity, and then tell me whether something that begins and ends thus could be intended for enjoyment.”
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: “The desire to love someone always exceeds the desire to be loved by someone & that's exactly why we end up loving the person who doesn't deserve that LOVE.”
author: Anirban Bose

quote: “You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it." (George Santayana)I've got news for Mr. Santayana: we're doomed to repeat the past no matter what. That's what it is to be alive.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “A stumble may prevent a fall.”
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: “Perhaps it would be simpler if you just did what you're told and didn't try to understand things.”
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: “You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “If you want something you can have it, but only if you want everything that goes with it, including all the hard work and the despair, and only if you're willing to risk failure. ”
author: Philip Pullman

quote: “Dying is only one thing to be sad over. Living unhappily is something else.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “What I am telling you, before you begin my story, is this -- two things: I crave truth. And I lie. ”
author: Tana French

quote: “War is not for winning, Masha," sighed Koschei, reading the tracks of supply lines, of pincer strategies, over her shoulder. "It is for surviving.”
author: Catherynne M. Valente

quote: “My eyes were glued on lifeand they were full of tears.”
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: “Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.”
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: “You need just the right amount of 'Fuck the world' and the right amount of belief in something...and you need the right amount of love.”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “I’m sort of… coming off a bad relationship”“When did it end?”“Slightly before it started.”
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: “You see, doing one thing differently is very often the same as doing everything differently.”
author: Matt Haig

quote: “Let others lead small lives, but not you.. Let others argue over small things, but not you.. Let others cry over small hurts, but not you.. Let others leave their future in someone else's hands, but not you.”
author: Jim Rohn

quote: “But I can hardly sit still. I keep fidgeting, crossing one leg and then the other. I feel like I could throw off sparks, or break a window--maybe rearrange all the furniture.”
author: Raymond Carver

quote: “You won't lag behind, because you'll have the speed. You'll pass the whole gang and you'll soon take the lead.Wherever you fly, you'll be best of the best.Wherever you go, you will top all the rest.Except when you don't.Because, sometimes, you won't.”
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: “If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.”
author: Dolly Parton

quote: “To believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.”
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: “Life consists of two days, one for you one against you. So when it's for you don't be proud or reckless, and when it's against you be patient, for both days are test for you.”
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “Per aspera ad astra, Papa,' I whispered. Through hardship to the stars.”
author: Ruta Sepetys

quote: “Life' wrote a friend of mine, 'is a public performance on the violin, in which you must learn the instrument as you go along.”
author: E.M. Forster

quote: “The way I define happiness is being the creator of your experience, choosing to take pleasure in what you have, right now, regardless of the circumstances, while being the best you that you can be.”
author: Leo Babauta

quote: “So, what if, instead of thinking about solving you whole life, you just think about adding additional good things. One at a time. Just let your pile of good things grow.”
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: “If you're gonna burn a bridge behind you, make sure you've crossed it first.”
author: Quentin R. Bufogle

quote: “Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Those who have failed to work toward the truth have missed the purpose of living.”
author: Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

quote: “Your heart’s strength is measured by how hard it holds on. Your self worth and faith is measured by finally letting go. However, your peace is measured by how long you don’t look back.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “A good half of the art of living is resilience.”
author: Alain de Botton

quote: “Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I wanted so badly for there to be more. I ached for there to be more than my crappy little life.' He shakes his head. 'And there was more. I just couldn't see it.”
author: Patrick Ness

quote: “When you lost sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart (Allen Walker, D-gray Man)”
author: Katsura Hoshino

quote: “If you're afraid of everyone leaving you, what do you do?"Make them stay."And if you can't do that, or don't know how to?"Ellie shrugged. "I don't know."Yes, you do. In fact, you've done it. You leave first," Coop said, "so you don't have to watch them walk away.”
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: “Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “While there's life, there's hope.”
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: “How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Fear? What has a man to do with fear? Chance rules our lives, and the future is all unknown. Best live as we may, from day to day.”
author: Sophocles

quote: “The spiritual life does not remove us from the world but leads us deeper into it”
author: Nouwen Henri J. M.

quote: “Right now, I had everything I could ask for. It wasn't a long list, but it was a very satisfying one, starting with the love of my life back in my arms.”
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: “I believe the stars align so souls can find one another. Whether they are meant to be souls in love or souls in life remains to be seen.”
author: Renee Ahdieh

quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Dance above the surface of the world. Let your thoughts lift you into creativity that is not hampered by opinion.”
author: Red Haircrow

quote: “Live all you can: it's a mistake not to. It doesn't matter what you do in particular, so long as you have had your life. If you haven't had that, what have you had?”
author: Henry James

quote: “Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...”
author: King James Gadsden

quote: “The spirit of a man is constructed out of his choices.”
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: “All those who try to unveil the mysteries always have tragic lives. At the end they are always punished.”
author: Anais Nin

quote: “Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.”
author: Christopher    Rice

quote: “We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “What about the rest of your life?"She shrugged. "What about it?""Aren't you worried about, like, forever?""Forever is composed of nows," she says.”
author: John Green

quote: “One of the tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon - instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.”
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: “Rock 'n' roll is not red carpets and MySpace friends, rock'n'roll is dangerous and should piss people off”
author: Gerard Way

quote: “I realize that life is risks. It’s acknowledging the past but looking forward. It’s taking a chance that we willmake mistakes but believing that we all deserve to be forgiven.”
author: Carrie Ryan

quote: “If a man is to live, he must be all alive, body, soul, mind, heart, spirit.”
author: Thomas Merton

quote: “All I feel are the assaults of apprehension and terror at the thought that I am the only one who is entirely unlike the rest. It is almost impossible for me to converse with other people. What should I talk about, how should I say it? - I don't know.”
author: Osamu Dazai

quote: “I want to see beauty. In the ugly, in the sink, in the suffering, in the daily, in all the days before I die, the moments before I sleep.”
author: Ann Voskamp

quote: “Life is only precious because it ends, kid. Take it from a god. You mortals don't know how lucky you are”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.”
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: “I know there is no straight road No straight road in this world Only a giant labyrinth Of intersecting crossroads”
author: Federico García Lorca

quote: “I was lost yesterday, I am found today and I will be forgotten tomorrow.”
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: “Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you’re doing.”
author: Leo Babauta

quote: “Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.”
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: “Some people are born with tornadoes in their lives, but constellations in their eyes. Other people are born with stars at their feet, but their souls are lost at sea.”
author: Nikita Gill

quote: “I never could bear the idea of anyone's expecting something from me. Italways made me want to do just the opposite.”
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: “I wonder if I'll ever have to decide which is worse, life as we're living or no life at all.”
author: Susan Beth Pfeffer

quote: “You know, life fractures us all into little pieces. It harms us, but it's how we glue those fractures back together that make us stronger.”
author: Carrie Jones

quote: “You normally have to be bashed about a bit by life to see the point of daffodils, sunsets and uneventful nice days.”
author: Alain de Botton

quote: “So shut up, live, travel, adventure, bless and don't be sorry”
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: “Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can.”
author: Douglas Pagels

quote: “Few of us ever live in the present. We are forever anticipating what is to come or remembering what has gone.”
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: “Everyone in this world is breathing borrowed air.”
author: Rachael Lippincott

quote: “Love is the only thing that we can carry with us when we go, and it makes the end so easy.”
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: “As for the goddess’s answer, I did not care. I would have no need of her. I did not plan to live after he was gone.”
author: Madeline Miller

quote: “The world is moving so fast these days that the man who says it can't be done is generally interrupted by someone doing it.”
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: “But love is complicated, it’s messy. It can inspire selflessness, selfishness, our greatest accomplishments and our hardest mistakes. It brings us together and it can just as easily drive us apart.”
author: Courtney Summers

quote: “Because I'm selfish. I'm a coward. I'm the kind of girl who, when she might actually be of use, would run to stay alive and leave those who couldn't follow to suffer and die.”
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: “She didn't read books so she didn't know that she was the world and the heavens boiled down to a drop.”
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: “Sometimes you need a little crisis to get your adrenaline flowing and help you realize your potential.”
author: Jeannette Walls

quote: “The great thing, if one can, is to stop regarding all the unpleasant things as interruptions of one's 'own,' or 'real' life. The truth is of course that what one calls the interruptions are precisely one's real life -- the life God is sending one day by day.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “Too late, I found you can't wait to become perfect, you got to go out and fall down and get up with everybody else.”
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: “It’s too bad if a heart lacks fire,and is deprived of the light of a heart ablaze.The day on which you arewithout passionate loveis the most wasted day of your life.”
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: “A quitter never wins-and-a winner never quits.”
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “I knew it like destiny, and at the same time, I knew it as choice.”
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: “Don't wake me for the end of the world unless it has very good special effects.”
author: Roger Zelazny

quote: “Poor creatures. What did we do to you? With all our schemes and plans?”
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: “Not in his speech, not in his thoughts, I see his greatness, only in his actions, in his life.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “No one escapes from life alive.”
author: Michael Crichton

quote: “Real life is messy, inconsistent, and it's seldom when anything ever really gets resolved. It's taken me a long time to realize that.”
author: Alan Moore

quote: “Returning home is the most difficult part of long-distance hiking; You have grown outside the puzzle and your piece no longer fits.”
author: Cindy Ross

quote: “How much sweeter life would be if it all happened in reverse, if, after decades of disappointments, you finally arrived at an age when you had conceded nothing, when everything was possible.”
author: Karen Thompson Walker

quote: “Not forever does the bulbul singIn balmy shades of bowers,Not forever lasts the springNor ever blossom the flowers.Not forever reigneth joy,Sets the sun on days of bliss,Friendships not forever last,They know not life, who know not this.”
author: Khushwant Singh

quote: “I always knew, on some level, that I wouldn't live long. It's simply not written in my stars.”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “the worst thing," he told me,"is bitterness, people end up sobitter.”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “He looked different in sleep, beautiful but cold as moonlight. I found myself wishing he would wake so that I might watch the life return.”
author: Madeline Miller

quote: “Hate is nothing when weighed against survival. (Valentine)”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “There's no benchmark for how life's "supposed" to happen. There is no ideal world for you to wait around for. The world is always just what it is now, it's up to you how you respond to it.”
author: Isaac Marion

quote: “Keep your mind open. The meaning of things lies in how people perceive them. The same thing could mean different meanings to the same people at different times.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “the world is not a pleasant place to be without someone to hold and be held by.”
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: “To leave, after all, was not the same as being left.”
author: Anita Shreve

quote: “Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.”
author: Carl G. Jung

quote: “The land knows you, even when you are lost.”
author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

quote: “You will receive everything you need when you stop asking for what you do not need”
author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quote: “If you don't learn to laugh at life it'll surely kill you, that I know.”
author: Brom

quote: “I am afraid to show you who I really am, because if I show you who I really am, you might not like it--and that's all I got.”
author: Sabrina Ward Harrison

quote: “CALVIN:When I grow up I want to be an inventor. First I will invent a time machine. Then I'll come back to yesterday and take myself to tomorrow and skip this dumb assignment.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “There are times in our lives when we have to realize our past is precisely what it is, and we cannot change it. But we can change the story we tell ourselves about it, and by doing that, we can change the future.”
author: Eleanor Brown

quote: “This is the strangest life I have ever known.”
author: Jim Morrison

quote: “In the short term, it would make me happy to go play outside. In the long term, it would make me happier to do well at school and become successful. But in the VERY long term, I know which will make better memories.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “CALVIN:As usual goodness hardly puts up a fight.”
author: Bill Watterson

quote: “You rely too much on brain. The brain is the most overrated organ.”
author: Woody Allen

quote: “there isn't enough of anythingas long as we live. But at intervalsa sweetness appears and, given a chanceprevails.”
author: Raymond Carver

quote: “Three films a day, three books a week and records of great music would be enough to make me happy to the day I die.”
author: François Truffaut

quote: “The heart may freeze, or it can burn. The pain will ease and I can learn. There is no future, there is no past. I live this moment as, my last.”
author: Jonathan Larson

quote: “This is a wonderful day, I have never seen this one before.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “She should have done science, not spent all her time with her head in novels. Novels gave you a completely false idea about life, they told lies and they implied there were endings when in reality there were no endings, everything just went on and on and on.”
author: Kate Atkinson

quote: “If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else.”
author: Marvin Gaye

quote: “Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.”
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: “We all make choices, but in the end our choices make us.”
author: Ken Levine

quote: “He was fucking sad. That's it. That's the point. He knows life is never going to get any different for him. That there's no fixing him. It's always going to be the same monotonous depressing bullshit. Boring, sad, boring, sad. He just wants it to be over.”
author: Jasmine Warga

quote: “How easy it was to capitalize on a person’s own bent for self-destruction; how simple to nudge them into non-being, then to stand back and shrug and agree that it had been the inevitable result of a chaotic, catastrophic life.”
author: Robert Galbraith

quote: “People who say that yesterday was better than today are ultimately devaluing their own existence.”
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: “Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got a hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations.”
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: “I have lost and loved and won and cried myself to the person I am today.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: “You can't have living without dying. So you can't call it living, what we got. We just are, we just be, like rocks beside the road.”
author: Natalie Babbitt

quote: “But I always liked side-paths, little dark back-alleys behind the main road- there one finds adventures and surprises, and precious metal in the dirt.”
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: “Destiny is a lie. Destiny is justification for atrocity. It is the means by which murderers armour themselves against reprimand. It is a word intended to stand in place of ethics, denying all moral context.”
author: Steven Erikson

quote: “When was it I realized that, on this truly dark and solitary path we all walk, the only way we can light is our own? Although I was raised with love, I was always lonely.Someday, without fail, everyone will disappear, scattered into the blackness of time.”
author: Banana Yoshimoto

quote: “Books can truly change our lives: the lives of those who read them, the lives of those who write them. Readers and writers alike discover things they never knew about the world and about themselves.”
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: “Life isn’t meant to be lived perfectly…but merely to be LIVED. Boldly, wildly, beautifully, uncertainly, imperfectly, magically LIVED.”
author: Mandy Hale

quote: “Tried living in the real world instead of a shell, but I was bored before I even began.”
author: Morrissey

quote: “Life is so beautiful that death has fallen in love with it, a jealous possessive love that grabs at what it can.”
author: Yann Martel

quote: “Life makes fools of all of us sooner or later. But keep your sense of humor and you'll at least be able to take your humiliations with some measure of grace. In the end, you know, its our own expectations that crush us.”
author: Paul Murray

quote: “All successful people men and women are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “Come clean with a child heartLaugh as peaches in the summer windLet rain on a house roof be a songLet the writing on your facebe a smell of apple orchards on late June.”
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: “Remember, man does not live on bread alone: sometimes he needs a little buttering up.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “Occasionally in life there are those moments of unutterable fulfillment which cannot be completely explained by those symbols called words. Their meanings can only be articulated by the inaudible language of the heart.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: “Windmill or no windmill, he said, life would go on as it had always gone on--that is, badly.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Ten years from now, make sure you can say that you CHOSE your life, you didn’t SETTLE for it.”
author: Mandy Hale

quote: “Oh sorry, I was taking life seriously.”
author: Bill Hicks

quote: “And all the lives we ever lived and all the lives to be are full of treesand changing leaves.”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “The best stories don't come from "good vs. bad" but "good vs. good.”
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: “People are the most difficult thing in the world to change”
author: Gena Showalter

quote: “My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.”
author: Jim Henson

quote: “It is not the strongest of the species that survives,not the most intelligent that survives.It is the one that is the most adaptable to change.”
author: Charles Darwin

quote: “Whatever happens to your body, your soul will survive, untouched...”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “The river is everywhere.”
author: Herman Hesse

quote: “Life is at its best when everything has fallen out of place, and you decide that you're going to fight to get them right, not when everything is going your way and everyone is praising you.”
author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quote: “By the truth we are undone. Life is a dream. 'Tis the waking that kills us. He who robs us of our dreams robs us of our life.”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “He was unheeded, happy, and near to the wild heart of life. He was alone and young and wilful and wildhearted, alone amid a waste of wild air and brackish waters and the seaharvest of shells and tangle and veiled grey sunlight.”
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: “ Every path is the right path. Everything could've been anything else.﻿ And it would have just as much meaning.”
author: Mr. Nobody

quote: “As you grow up, always tell the truth, do no harm to others, and don't think you are the most important being on earth. Rich or poor, you then can look anyone in the eye and say, 'I'm probably no better than you, but I'm certainly your equal.”
author: Harper Lee

quote: “We shouldn't live as if [other worlds] mattered more than this life in this world, because where we are is always the most important place.”
author: Philip Pullman

quote: “Don't lose heart if it's very difficult at times, everything will come out all right and nobody can in the beginning do as he wishes.”
author: Vincent Willem van Gogh

quote: “Our lives were just beginning, our favorite moment was right now, our favorite songs were unwritten.”
author: Rob Sheffield

quote: “The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is they very essence of life.”
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: “I want you. I want you so badly I can’t stand it. When you left, it felt like the world got darker. Like I couldn’t truly see anything. Couldn’t feel anything.”
author: Rachel Vincent

quote: “The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.”
author: Brian Tracy

quote: “You have the ability to choose your reactions.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.”
author: Ansel Adams

quote: “Don't forget, a person's greatest emotional need is to feel appreciated.”
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: “Muscles aching to work, minds aching to create - this is man.”
author: John Steinbeck

quote: “All paths are present, always... and we can but choose among them.”
author: Jacqueline Carey

quote: “The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.”
author: Leo Babauta

quote: “There are several ways to react to being lost. One is to panic: this was usually Valentina's first impulse. Another is to abandon yourself to lostness, to allow the fact that you've misplaced yourself to change the way you experience the world.”
author: Audrey Niffenegger

quote: “She supposed they were imperfections, those marks, but they didn't feel that way to her; they were a history, cut into his body: the map of a life of endless war.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “It's better this way, sister. There's more to life than staying safe...”
author: Stephanie Garber

quote: “If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started. ”
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: “Life takes a bit of time and a lot of relationship.”
author: Wm. Paul Young

quote: “Atticus had said it was the polite thing to talk to people about what they were interested in, not about what you were interested in.”
author: Harper Lee

quote: “Sometimes letting go is simply changing the labels you place on an event. Looking at the same event with fresh eyes.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The future is meant for those who are willing to let go of the worst parts of the past. When you cannot take two steps without turning around to inspect your footsteps, you are getting nowhere fast.”
author: Corey Taylor

quote: “Life is a succesion of lessons which must be lived to be understood.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “Don't leave it all unsaid,somewhere in the wasteland of your head.”
author: Morrissey

quote: “Life is for service.”
author: Fred Rogers

quote: “I always thought that life was about standing your ground, no matter how strong the current was. But going with the flow isn't so bad after all. As long as it takes you forward.”
author: Ai Yazawa

quote: “Experience has shown, and a true philosophy will always show, that a vast, perhaps the larger, portion of truth arises from the seemingly irrelevant.”
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: “There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them”
author: Denis Waitley

quote: “The past can not be cured.”
author: Queen Elizabeth I

quote: “dont be afraid of death, be afraid of the unlived life.”
author: Natalie Babbitt

quote: “I will continue my path, but I will keep a memory always.”
author: Rosie Thomas

quote: “My formula for life is very simple: in the morning, wake up; at night, go to sleep. In between I try and occupy myself as best I can.”
author: Cary Grant

quote: “When nothing is sure, everything is possible.”
author: Margaret Drabble

quote: “it always sound scarier when a hollerer talk soft.”
author: Kathryn Stockett

quote: “You see I kept asking myself then: why am I so stupid that if others are stupid—and I know they are—yet I won't be wiser?”
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: “Try patting them on the back or shoulder and telling them everything is going to be fine. Lots of times when girls cry, they don't want you to fix the problem, they just want to be consoled.”
author: Kiera Cass

quote: “What kind of life can you have in a house without books?”
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: “It's paradoxical that the idea of living a long life appeals to everyone, but the idea of getting old doesn't appeal to anyone.”
author: Andy Rooney

quote: “life and love are very precious when both are in full bloom.”
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: “No human should mislead another by promising them something they know to be untrue.”
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: “If you walked away from atoxic, negative, abusive,one-sided, dead-endlow vibrationalrelationship or friendship — you won.”
author: Lalah Delia

quote: “Being human is not hard because you're doing it wrong, it's hard because you're doing it right.”
author: Glennon Doyle

quote: “I've been embarrassing myself since about birth.”
author: Phil Lester

quote: “Life is the farce we are all forced to endure.”
author: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: “Some people insist that 'mediocre' is better than 'best.' They delight in clipping wings because they themselves can't fly. They despise brains because they have none.”
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: “That is the hardest thing of all. It is much harder to judge yourself than to judge others. If you succeed in judging yourself, it's because you're truly a wise man.”
author: Antoine de Saint Exupéry

quote: “Life is choice. All day, everyday. Who we talk to, where we sit, what we say, how we say it. And our lives become defined by our choices. It's as simple and as complex as that. And as powerful. so when I'm observing that's what I'm watching for. The choices people make”
author: Louise Penny

quote: “I don't know how I look, but I know how I feel: Young. Goofy. Infinite.”
author: John Green

quote: “The heart makes its choices without weighing the consequences. It doesn't look ahead to the lonely nights that follow.”
author: Tess Gerritsen

quote: “You are not the world, but you are everything that makes the world good. Without you, my life would still exist, but that's all it would manage to do.”
author: Kiera Cass

quote: “Fear comes with imagination, it’s a penalty, it’s the price of imagination.”
author: Thomas Harris
