quote: “Do the kind of things that come from the heart, When you do, you won't be dissatisfied, you won't be envious, you won't be longing for somebody else's things. On the contrary, you'll be overhelmed with what comes back”

quote: “You’ve got to think about big things while you’re doing small things, so that all the small things go in the right direction.”
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: “The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.”

quote: “Death twitches my ear;'Live,' he says... 'I'm coming.”

quote: “The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.”

quote: “No great wisdom can be reached without sacrifice.”

quote: “If you fail to plan, you are planning to fail!”
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: “You can't always judge people by the things they done. You got to judge them by what they are doing now.”
author: Kate DiCamillo

quote: “Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.”

quote: “It is better to be respected than it is to be popular. Popularity ends on yearbook day, but respect lasts forever.”

quote: “Have you ever felt the longing for someone you could admire? For something, not to look down at, but up to?”

quote: “There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.”

quote: “What we love determines what we seek. What we seek determines what we think and do. What we think and do determines who we are — and who we will become.”

quote: “The treacherous are ever distrustful.”

quote: “Friends can make you feel that the world is smaller and less sneaky than it really is, because you know people who have similar experiences.”

quote: “Thou shalt not be a victim, thou shalt not be a perpetrator, but, above all, thou shalt not be a bystander.”

quote: “If we don't change the direction we are headed, we will end up where we are going.”

quote: “My name is Salmon, like the fish; first name, Susie. I was fourteen when I was murdered.”

quote: “Successful people have libraries. The rest have big screen TVs”

quote: “We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.”

quote: “Its more fun to think of the future than dwell on the past.”

quote: “Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “And people who don’t dream, who don’t have any kind of imaginative life, they must… they must go nuts. I can’t imagine that.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “Give me the Love that leads the wayThe Faith that nothing can dismayThe Hope no disappointments tireThe Passion that'll burn like fireLet me not sink to be a clodMake me Thy fuel, Flame of God”

quote: “Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.”

quote: “Every moment of light and dark is a miracle.”

quote: “Everything you'll ever need to know is within you; the secrets of the universe are imprinted on the cells of your body.”

quote: “You’re only poor if you give up. The most important thing is that you did something. Most people only talk and dream of getting rich. You’ve done something.”

quote: “Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again. Wisely improve the present, it is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.”

quote: “My dear Watson," said [Sherlock Holmes], "I cannot agree with those who rank modesty among the virtues. To the logician all things should be seen exactly as they are, and to underestimate one's self is as much a departure from truth as to exaggerate one's own powers.”

quote: “If you have the guts to be yourself, other people'll pay your price.”
author: John Updike

quote: “I know that the molecules in my body are traceable to phenomena in the cosmos. That makes me want to grab people on the street and say: ‘Have you HEARD THIS?”

quote: “I want to be like Gandhi and Martin Luther King and John Lennon but i want to STAY ALIVE.”

quote: “Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.”

quote: “When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favour.”

quote: “Sisters in battle, I am shield and blade to you. As I breathe, your enemies will know no sanctuary. While I live, your cause is mine.”

quote: “Time to toss the dice”
author: robert jordan

quote: “It's total bullshit," he said. "The whole thing. Eighty percent survival rate and he's in the twenty percent? Bullshit. He was such a bright kid. It's bullshit. I hate it. But it was sure a privilege to love him, huh?”

quote: “I hope to write someday and that’s even more terrifying than performing. You don’t just entertain the audience, you give them little bits of your soul.”

quote: “Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on.”

quote: “Even if you don't have all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you don't want (Bob Dylan's dad)”

quote: “When blame and self-judgement are transformed, healed, and cease to be, we have reawakened without the myth, the mythos, of separation. We are One.”

quote: “Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.”

quote: “Death comes to us all; we can only choose how to face it when it comes.”

quote: “We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.”

quote: “Go on, get out! Last words are for fools who haven't said enough!”

quote: “Make today worth remembering.”

quote: “And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.”

quote: “Maybe 'Okay' will be our 'always'...”

quote: “Don't look to the approval of others for your mental stability”

quote: “Freedom is...the right to write the wrong words.”

quote: “Be like the flower that gives its fragrance to even the hand that crushes it.”

quote: “The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.”

quote: “Most people die with their music still locked up inside them.”

quote: “Most don't deserve your tears... and the ones that do will never make you cry.”

quote: “Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.”

quote: “How does one become a butterfly? They have to want to learn to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.”

quote: “But I will not run. I wouldn't be standing here if I'd quit every time something seemed impossible to overcome. I will not die today.”

quote: “Nobody steals books but your friends.”

quote: “Day after day, day after day,We stuck, nor breath nor motion;As idle as a painted shipUpon a painted ocean.”

quote: “If you are a dreamer come in”

quote: “Love your life. Because your life is what you have to give.”
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: “Nobody gets praised for the right reasons.”

quote: “When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray”

quote: “It's easy to forget things you don't need anymore.”

quote: “Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.”

quote: “He who takes offense when no offense is intended is a fool, and he who takes offense when offense is intended is a greater fool.”

quote: “Achievement has no color”

quote: “She remembered who she wasand the game changed.”

quote: “In my deepest wound I saw your glory, and it dazzled me.”

quote: “The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.”

quote: “Every window in Alcatraz has a view of San Francisco. ”

quote: “Women can fake an orgasm, but men can fake an entire relationship.”

quote: “Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.”

quote: “The road to enlightenment is long and difficult, and you should try not to forget snacks and magazines.”

quote: “You don't have to make something that people call art. Living is an artistic activity, there is an art to getting through the day.”

quote: “In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.”

quote: “We swallowed the chaos because we knew we didn't want to be ordinary.”

quote: “Ignore all hatred and criticism. Live for what you create, and die protecting it.”

quote: “I’d rather welcome change than cling to the past.”

quote: “A daydreamer is prepared for most things.”

quote: “We spend money that we do not have, on things we do not need, to impress people who do not care.”

quote: “My sun sets to rise again.”

quote: “The victim mindset dilutes the human potential. By not accepting personal responsibility for our circumstances, we greatly reduce our power to change them.”

quote: “and here you are livingdespite it all”

quote: “Of course, a sign doesn't mean anything unless you know how to interpret it.”

quote: “Skies are crying,I am watching,Catching teardrops in my hands.Only silence, as it's ending,Like we never had a chance.Do you have to make me feelLike there's nothing left of me?”

quote: “We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.”
author: Alan Turing

quote: “The question is not how to get cured, but how to live.”

quote: “I was never more hated than when I tried to be honest. Or when, even as just now I've tried to articulate exactly what I felt to be the truth. No one was satisfied”

quote: “There are some things that it is better to begin than to refuse, even though the end may be dark.”

quote: “I'm the living embodiment of 'it could be worse'.”

quote: “Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!”

quote: “Whoever you are, or whatever it is that you do, when you really want something, it's because that desire originated in the soul of the universe. It's your mission on earth.”

quote: “Anything that makes weak - physically, intellectually and spiritually, reject it as poison.”

quote: “For great men, religion is a way of making friends; small people make religion a fighting tool.”

quote: “Happiness depends more on the inward disposition of mind than on outward circumstances.”

quote: “I never did give them hell. I just told the truth, and they thought it was hell.”

quote: “A man's concern, even his despair, over the worthwhileness of life is an existential distress but by no means a mental disease.”

quote: “For those who know the value of and exquisite taste of solitary freedom (for one is only free when alone), the act of leaving is the bravest and most beautiful of all.”

quote: “Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.”

quote: “Great victory requires great risk.-Hera”

quote: “Love is like a good cake; you never know when it's coming, but you'd better eat it when it does!”

quote: “Team work makes the dream work”

quote: “Life might take you down different roads. But each of you gets to decide which one to take.”

quote: “...try to remember that dreams do come true, but they don't come easily.”

quote: “The hardest battle you are ever going to have to fight is the battle to be just you.”
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: “Until justice rolls down like water and righteousness like a mighty stream.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: “In the deepest hour of the night, confess to yourself that you would die if you were forbidden to write. And look deep into your heart where it spreads its roots, the answer, and ask yourself, must I write?”

quote: “The difference between false memories and true ones is thesame as for jewels: it is always the false ones that look themost real, the most brilliant.”
author: Salvador Dali

quote: “Try to find pleasure in the speed that you're not used to. Changing the way you do routine things allows a new person to grow inside of you. But when all is said and done, you're the one who must decide how you handle it.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “even in the loneliest momentsi have been therefor myself.”
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “It has always seemed to me that a coward is a person who cares more about what people say than about what is right. Bravery isn't about what people call you, Spensa. It's about who you know yourself to be.”

quote: “You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.”

quote: “Safety, stability--it's an illusion. It's a false god, Simon. It's like clinging to a sinking raft instead of learning to swim.”

quote: “Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can, there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.”

quote: “Forgiveness is God's greatest gift”

quote: “It is the useless things that make life worth living and that make life dangerous too: wine, love, art, beauty. Without them life is safe, but not worth bothering with.”

quote: “If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn’t have a job if he was any smarter.”
author: John Gottman (

quote: “If the stars should appear but one night every thousand years how man would marvel and adore.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “God will not have his work made manifest by cowards”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “being afraid to take chances is scarier than actually doing things that challenge you.”
author: Simone Elkeles

quote: “Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love.”

quote: “Sometimes you have to steer away from the crowd in order to be a better person. It's not always easy, that's for sure. But it's right. And sometimes doing the right thing feels good, even if it does end up in a trip to the principal's office.”
author: Simone Elkeles

quote: “I believe that God is in me as the sun is in the colour and fragrance of a flower - the Light in my darkness, the Voice in my silence.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “Let's start a new tomorrow, today.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Is there any real purpose in being alive if all we are going to do is get up every day and live only for ourselves?Live your life to help others. Give & live selflessly.”
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: “Aslan: You doubt your value. Don't run from who you are.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “When things go wrong, you'll find they usually go on getting worse for some time; but when things once start going right they often go on getting better and better.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. Live your truth and don't EVER stop!”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “She had to choose what, of the things she inherited from the people who came before her, she wanted to bring forward. And what, of the past, she wanted to leave behind.”

quote: “I realized it for the first time in my life: there is nothing but mystery in the world, how it hides behind the fabric of our poor, browbeat days, shining brightly, and we don't even know it.”

quote: “Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.”
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: “Is it easy? Usually not. But you don't forgive people for their benefit. You do it for your benefit.”
author: Andrew Matthews

quote: “Great acts are made up of small deeds.”
author: Lao-Tzu

quote: “A graceful refusal is better than a lengthy promise.”
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “Don't let them win. Don't let them beat you. Don't let them steal your magic.”
author: Brom

quote: “When something is important to you, you make sure its safe.”
author: Amanda Hocking

quote: “We have no right to express an opinion until we know all of the answers.”
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: “There is no greater insight into the future than recognizing...when we save our children, we save ourselves”
author: Margaret Mead

quote: “There is force in the universe, which, if we permit it, will flow through us and produce miraculous results.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: “You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word. It is victory, victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory, however long and hard the road may be; for without victory, there is no survival.”
author: Winston Churchill

quote: “If you want to catch beasts you don't see every day,You have to go places quite out of the way,You have to go places no others can get to.You have to get cold and you have too get wet, too.”
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: “Give your weakness to one who helps.”
author: Rumi

quote: “You don't know, oh, ohYou don't know you're beautiful.”
author: One Direction

quote: “Stand firm in the Lord. Stand firm and let Him fight your battle. Do not try to fight alone.”
author: Francine Rivers

quote: “When we are most alone is when we embrace another's loneliness.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Each of us is full of shit in our own special way. We are all shitty little snowflakes dancing in the universe.”
author: Lewis Black

quote: “Dead yesterdays and unborn tomorrows, why fret about it, if today be sweet.”
author: Omar Khayyâm

quote: “And by and by Christopher Robin came to the end of things, and he was silent, and he sat there, looking out over the world, just wishing it wouldn't stop.”
author: A.A. Milne

quote: “He who binds to himself a joyDoes the winged life destroy;But he who kisses the joy as it fliesLives in eternity's sun rise.”
author: William Blake

quote: “You must understand: they fear you. There is nothing scarier in their minds than a girl who knows the power of her flames.”

quote: “We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.”

quote: “Do you not then hear this horrible scream all around you that people usually call silence.”
author: Werner Herzog

quote: “Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?”
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: “feminism is for everybody”
author: bell hooks

quote: “Don’t tell me about your god with your words. Show me about your god with your actions.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If you do not find yourself a galaxy, it is not so bad to find yourself a star.”
author: Tamsyn Muir

quote: “I want a tattoo over my heart that reads TRY HARDER YOU LAZY PARAMEDIC SHITBAG OR I WILL HAUNT YOUR BEDROOM FOREVER”
author: Warren Ellis

quote: “It’s against the rules of humanity to believe there is nothing we can do.”
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: “Do you have to make me feel like there's nothing left of me? You can take everything I have, you can break everything I am, like I am made of glass, like I am made of paper.Go on and try to tear me down I will be rising from the ground like a Skyscraper...”
author: Demi Lovato

quote: “Write to please just one person. If you open a window and make love to the world, so to speak, your story will get pneumonia.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “When you chase a dream, you learn about yourself. You learn your capabilities and limitations, and the value of hard work and persistence.”
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: “You tried to help the people of the market. You mostly failed. This is life. The longer you live, the more you fail. Failure is the mark of a life well lived. In turn, the only way to live without failure is to be of no use to anyone. Trust me, I've practiced”
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: “if you don't have peace, it isn't because someone took it from you; you gave it away. You cannot always control what happens to you, but you can control what happens in you.”
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: “You have to teach your heart and mind how to sing together... then you'll hear the sound of your soul”
author: Renee Carlino

quote: “Successful people don't have fewer problems. They have determined that nothing will stop them from going forward.”
author: Ben Carson

quote: “Nite Owl II: But the country's disintegrating. What's happened to America? What's happened to the American dream?The Comedian: It came true. You're lookin' at it.”
author: Alan Moore

quote: “If you would not be forgotten, as soon as you are dead and rotten, either write things worth reading, or do things worth writing.”
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: “Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “For the future, the motto is, "No days unalert.”
author: Robert Greene

quote: “Christ is not valued at all, unless he is valued above all.”
author: Augustine

quote: “Yet he who reigns within himself, and rulesPassions, desires, and fears, is more a king.”
author: John Milton

quote: “Life is very short, and there's no time for fussing and fighting my friends”
author: John Lennon

quote: “Real courage is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. Doing the unpopular thing because it's what you believe, and the heck with everybody.”
author: Justin Cronin

quote: “My love is something valuable to me which I ought not to throw away without reflection.”
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: “They alone live, who live for others.”
author: Vivekananda

quote: “The shell must break before the bird can fly.”
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: “A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.”
author: William Shakespeare

quote: “If you want to change the fruits, you will first have to change the roots. If you want to change the visible, you must first change the invisible.”
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: “Loyalty and obedience to wisdom and justice are fine; but it is still finer to defy arbitrary power, unjustly and cruelly used--not on behalf of ourselves, but on behalf of others more helpless.”
author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: “And the fox said to the little prince: men have forgotten this truth, but you must not forget it. You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: “When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you'll be successful.”
author: Eric Thomas

quote: “Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “she was glad she had been scarred. She said that whoever loved her now would love her true self, and not her pretty face.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “The fallen angel becomes a malignant devil. Yet even that enemy of God and man had friends and associates in his desolation; I am alone.”
author: Mary Shelley

quote: “When you are used to the kind of life -of never getting anything you want- you stop knowing what it is you want.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Only two things can reveal life's great secrets: suffering and love.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “People trust their eyes above all else - but most people see what they wish to see, or what they believe they should see; not what is really there”
author: Zoë Marriott

quote: “Understanding is the reward of faith. Therefore, seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.”
author: St. Augustine of Hippo

quote: “Your need for acceptance can make you invisible in this world. Don't let anything stand in the way of the light that shines through this form. Risk being seen in all of your glory.”
author: Jim Carrey

quote: “The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.”
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: “Miracles do not, in fact, break the laws of nature.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “Why should we tolerate a diet of weak poisons, a home in insipid surroundings, a circle of acquaintances who are not quite our enemies, the noise of motors with just enough relief to prevent insanity? Who would want to live in a world which is just not quite fatal?”
author: Rachel Carson

quote: “A lot of people have gone further than they thought they could because someone else thought they could”
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “and i said to my body. softly. ‘i want to be your friend.’ it took a long breath. and replied ‘i have been waiting my whole life for this.”
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: “Blessed are the weird people: poets, misfits, writersmystics, painters, troubadoursfor they teach us to see the world through different eyes.”
author: Jacob Nordby

quote: “Small is the number of them that see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect.”
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: “Believe me, It would be better if we didn't meet again. Go back to school. Go back to your life. And next time they ask you, say no. Killing is for grown-ups and you're still a child.”
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: “I don't look for love. Love looks for me." "Why?" "Because it needs me. Because I'm not afraid of it.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Truth builds trust.”
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: “It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.”
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: “Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Do more than belong: participate. Do more than care: help. Do more than believe: practice. Do more than be fair: be kind. Do more than forgive: forget. Do more than dream: work.”
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: “I am larger, better than I thought; I did not know I held so much goodness.All seems beautiful to me.Whoever denies me, it shall not trouble me;	Whoever accepts me, he or she shall be blessed, and shall bless me.”
author: Walt Whitman

quote: “I am a strong believer in the tyranny, the dictatorship, the absolute authority of the writer.”
author: Philip Pullman

quote: “There is no such thing as a child who hates to read; there are only children who have not found the right book.”
author: Frank Serafini

quote: “Ends are for yesterday, not tomorrows.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Argue not concerning God,…re-examine all that you have been told at church or school or in any book, dismiss whatever insults your soul…”
author: Walt Whitman

quote: “She was like the sun, She knew her place in the world - She would shine again regardless of all the storms and changeable weather She wouldn't adjust her purpose for things that pass.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do. ”
author: John R Wooden

quote: “I close my eyes  and I can see a better day.  I close my eyes  and pray”
author: Justin Bieber

quote: “be it peace or happinesslet it enfold you”
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: “... what you learn today, for no reason at all, will help you discover all the wonderful secrets of tomorrow.”
author: Norton Juster

quote: “Until you have suffered much in your heart, you cannot learn humility.”
author: Elder Thaddeus of Vitovnica

quote: “A daily dose of daydreaming heals the heart, soothes the soul, and strengthens the imagination.”
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: “I am not afraid... I was born to do this.”
author: Joan of Arc

quote: “It is foolish to tear one’s hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.”
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: “When you spring to an idea, and decide it is truth, without evidence, you blind yourself to other possibilities.”
author: Robin Hobb

quote: “If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “If you set yourself to it, you can live the same life, rich or poor. You can keep on with your books and your ideas. You just got to say to yourself, "I'm a free man in here" - he tapped his forehead - "and you're all right.”
author: George Orwell

quote: “As the smoke clears,I awaken,And untangle you from me.Would it make you feel betterTo watch me, while I bleed?All my windows still are broken,But I'm standing on my feet.”
author: Demi Lovato

quote: “There's only one rule that I know of, babies—God damn it, you've got to be kind.”
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: “You can’t save anyone who wouldn’t save themselves without you. It’s thehardest lesson to learn in life, take it from me.”
author: Marc Jampole

quote: “What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.”
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: “Gratitude is a sign of maturity...Where there is appreciation: there is also courtesy and concern for the rights and property of others.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “Never apologize for burning too brightly or collapsing into yourself every night. That is how galaxies are made.”
author: Tyler Kent White

quote: “Anyone who is steady in his determination for the advanced stage of spiritual realization and can equally tolerate the onslaughts of distress and happiness is certainly a person eligible for liberation.”
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: “I understood what he was doing, that he had spent four years fulfilling the absurd and tedious duty of graduating from college and now he was emancipated from that world of abstraction, false security, parents, and material excess.”
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: “To save all we must risk all.”
author: Friedrich von Schiller

quote: “When someone is trying very hard to get something, they don't. And when they're running away from something as hard as they can, it usually catches up with them.”
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: “Madness and chaos are self-destructing but over thinking is the suicide.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today’s jobs with yesterday’s tools!”
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: “In the end, everything is a gag.”
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: “I only hope that we never lose sight of one thing — that it was all started by a mouse.”
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: “The summit of happiness is reached when a person is ready to be what he is.”
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: “What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.”
author: Roman Payne

quote: “A man, to be greatly good, must imagine intensely and comprehensively; he must put himself in the place of another and many others; the pains and pleasures of his species must become his own. The great instrument of moral good is the imagination.”
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: “Keep your dreams, you never know when you might need them.”
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: “Either you run the day or the day runs you..”
author: Jim Rohn

quote: “It's a rare gift, to know where you need to be, before you've been to all the places you don't need to be.”
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: “In order to write the book you want to write, in the end you have to become the person you need to become to write that book.”
author: Junot Diaz

quote: “We are what we believe we are!”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “We have been called to heal wounds, to unite what has fallen apart, and to bring home those who have lost their way.”
author: St. Francis of Assisi

quote: “You lose nothing when fighting for a cause ... In my mind the losers are those who don't have a cause they care about.”
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: “Having an eye for beauty isn't the same thing as a weakness...except possibly when it comes to you.”
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: “Arise, awake, stop not till the goal is reached.”
author: Vivekananda

quote: “when you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. your tastes only narrow & exclude people. so create.”
author: Why The Lucky Stiff

quote: “You can't go home again”
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: “Do your work, then step back. The only path to serenity.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: “Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to.”
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: “If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.”
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: “Heaven wheels above you, displaying to you her eternal glories, and still your eyes are on the ground”
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: “Small-minded people blame others. Average people blame themselves. The wise see all blame as foolishness”
author: Epictetus

quote: “We all have the same beginning - birth - and we all have the same end - death. So how different can we be?”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “All young people, regardless of sexual orientation or identity, deserve a safe and supportive environment in which to achieve their full potential.”
author: Harvey Milk

quote: “My experiences have taught me that things rarely improve with a simple change of scenery.”
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: “Life consists of what man is thinking about all day.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Nothing but a symbol? People die for symbols. People have hope because of symbols. They're not just lines. They're histories, cultures, traditions, given shape.”
author: Roshani Chokshi

quote: “Go out in the woods, go out. If you don't go out in the woods nothing will ever happen and your life will never begin.”
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

quote: “Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'.”
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: “Only when I fall do I get up again.”
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: “Pressure makes diamonds”
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: “What a wonderful life I’ve had! I only wish I’d realized it sooner.”
author: Colette

quote: “God has given us more than fourteen billion cells and connections in our brain. Why would God give us such a complex organ system unless he expects us to use it?”
author: Ben Carson

quote: “Without a sense of identity, there can be no real struggle.”
author: Paulo Freire

quote: “Avoid loud and aggressive persons,they are vexations to the spirit.”
author: Max Ehrmann

quote: “Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “Criticism - however valid or intellectually engaging - tends to get in the way of a writer who has anything personal to say. A tightrope walker may require practice, but if he starts a theory of equilibrium he will lose grace (and probably fall off).”
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: “Making others happy, through kindness of speech and sincerity of right advice, is a sign of true greatness. To hurt another soul by sarcastic words, looks, or suggestions, is despicable.”
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: “You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore”
author: André Gide

quote: “Day, the champion of the people, the one who can't bear to see those around him suffer on his behalf, who would gladly give his life for those he loves.”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “Love has no limitations. It cannot be measured. It has no boundaries. Although many have tried, love is indefinable.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “the moment you don't feel like praying, get on your knees. And the moment you don't feel like reading your bible, you'd better get that Book open.”
author: Lori Wick

quote: “To ugly ducklings everywhere,Don't worry about those fluffy yellow morons:They'll never get to be swans”
author: Zoë Marriott

quote: “Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you.”
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: “The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.”
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: “Every person has a right to risk their own life for the preservation of it.”
author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quote: “know what you want, work to get it, then value it once you have it.”
author: Nora Roberts

quote: “You are a cosmic flower. Om chanting is the process of opening the psychic petals of that flower.”
author: Amit Ray

quote: “I would court you, with all the grace and courtesy that you deserve,”
author: C.S. Pacat

quote: “Quit being so hard on yourself. We are what we are; we love what we love. We don't need to justify it to anyone... not even to ourselves.”
author: Scott Lynch

quote: “Forgive me for being so ordinary while claiming to know so extraordinary a God.”
author: Jim Elliot

quote: “Do not yearn to be popular; be exquisite. Do not desire to be famous; be loved. Do not take pride in being expected; be palpable, unmistakable.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “You are beautiful. Know this. Anyone who tells you otherwise is simply lying. You are beautiful.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Woman is a delicate creature with strong emotions who has been created by the Almighty God to shoulder responsibility for educating society and moving toward perfection. God created woman as symbol of His own beauty and to give solace to her partner and her family.”
author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib A.S

quote: “If you are still breathing maybe it is not such a bad day after all...”
author: Darren E. Laws

quote: “If you feel far from God, guess who moved?”
author: Robin Jones Gunn

quote: “No matter what happens in the world, however brutal or dystopian a thing, not all is lost if there are people out there risking themselves to document it. Little sparks cause fires, too.”
author: Tomasz Jedrowski

quote: “You become mature when you become the authority of your own life.”
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: “The truth is I didn’t need therapy; I just needed to feel loved and know that someone out there craved my attention.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “We all can be only who we are, no more, no less.”
author: Terry Goodkind

quote: “Again and again I will suffer; again and again I will get back on my feet. I will not be defeated. I won't let my spirit be destroyed.”
author: Banana Yoshimoto

quote: “Every beginning has an end and every end is a new beginning.”
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: “Advice is like snow; the softer it falls, the longer it dwells upon, and the deeper it sinks into the mind.”
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: “If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.”
author: Matt D. Miller

quote: “I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead. ”
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: “Love was that way. You could not render it in black or white. It always came down to the strange, blended shades of grey.”
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: “A young outcast will often feel that there is something wrong with himself, but as he gets older, grows more confident in who he is, he will adapt, he will begin to feel that there is something wrong with everyone else.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few”
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: “They say that every snowflake is different. If that were true, how could the world go on? How could we ever get up off our knees? How could we ever recover from the wonder of it?”
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: “There is only one day left, always starting over: It is given to us at dawn and taken away from us at dusk.”
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: “Make every effort to change things you do not like. If you cannot make a change, change the way you have been thinking. You might find a new solution.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “Fairness does not mean everyone gets the same. Fairness means everyone gets what they need.”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “I've done my best, and I begin to understand what is meant by 'the joy of strife'. Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.”
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: “Change happens when the pain of staying the same is greater than the pain of change.”
author: Tony Robbins

quote: “Your opinion is not my reality.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “She is delightfully chaotic; a beautiful mess. Loving her is a splendid adventure.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You start by writing to live. You end by writing so as not to die.”
author: Carlos Fuentes

quote: “You are doing the best you can, and that best results in good to yourself and to others. Do not nag yourself with a sense of failure. Get on your knees and ask for the blessings of the Lord;then stand on your feet and do what you are asked to do.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “Fear and realisation of ignorance, strong medicines against stupid pride.”
author: Garth Nix

quote: “If your life is worth thinking about,it is worth writing about.”
author: Robin Sharma

quote: “Books fall open, you fall in”
author: David McCord

quote: “The good thing about being old, is you don’t have to worry about dying young.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “There are worst things in life than kissing boys.”
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

quote: “The More we value things, the less we value ourselves”
author: Bruce Lee

quote: “Things will change: you won't feel this way forever. And anyway, sometimes the hardest lessons to learn are the ones your soul needs most.”
author: Kelly Cutrone

quote: “I have never felt that anything really mattered but knowing that you stood for the things in which you believed and had done the very best you could.”
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: “... it’s a blessed thing to love and feel loved in return.”
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: “But what if Shakespeare
author: Gayle Forman

quote: “Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to others.”
author: Buddha

quote: “Read. Read anything. Read the things they say are good for you, and the things they claim are junk. You'll find what you need to find. Just read.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed at some indefinite time in the future.”
author: George S. Patton Jr.

quote: “the purpose of life is the life of purpose”
author: Robin Sharma

quote: “What the society thinks is of no interest to me. All that's important is how I see myself. I know who who I am. I know the value of my work.”
author: Robin Sharma

quote: “A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.”
author: Yoko Ono

quote: “I want to be free Michael, just for once in my whole life I want to be free" "You are free. You just don't know it yet”
author: Francine Rivers

quote: “Adversity introduces a man to himself.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “You are a human with one life and its up to you to make it the best life you can.”
author: Dan Howell

quote: “Humanity has many shortcomings, but none is stronger than pride.”
author: Fredrik Backman

quote: “90% of the game is half mental.”
author: Yogi Berra

quote: “Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.”
author: Brian Weiss

quote: “...a God that did everything we thought was right and good wouldn't be the creator of the universe. He would be our puppet.”
author: Min Jin Lee

quote: “Fear grew in places unlit by knowledge”
author: Roshani Chokshi

quote: “A rose can never be a sunflower, and a sunflower can never be a rose.All flowers are beautiful in their own way, and that’s like women too. I want to encourage women to embrace their own uniqueness.”
author: Miranda Kerr

quote: “Lose your mind and come to your senses.”
author: Fritz Perls

quote: “Actually, you can be bad at something...but if you love doing it, that will be enough. - August Boatwright”
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: “God helps those who strut their stuff.”
author: Dan Sofer

quote: “If you remember nothing else, remember this: Inspiration from outside one's self is like the heat in an oven. It makes passable Bath buns. But inspiration from within is like a volcano: It changes the face of the world.”
author: Alan Bradley

quote: “Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk.”
author: Robert Bloch

quote: “You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.”
author: William Faulkner

quote: “What the soul hardly realizes is that, unbeliever or not, his loneliness is really a homesickness for God.”
author: Hubert Van Zeller

quote: “Boredom can be a lethal thing on a small island.”
author: Christopher Moore

quote: “Make your interactions with people transformational, not just transactional.”
author: Patti Smith

quote: “We are constantly invited to be what we are.”
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: “May the fleas of a thousand camels invade the crotch of the person that ruins your day. And may their arms be to short too scratch”
author: Keisha Keenleyside

quote: “The less you reveal, the more people can wonder.”
author: Emma Watson

quote: “The greatest blessing granted to mankind come by way of madness, which is a divine gift.”
author: Socrates

quote: “There's no point in wishing. We can't change anything about the past. We can only remember. We can only move forward.”
author: Emily X.R. Pan

quote: “Total paranoia is just total awareness.”
author: Charles Manson

quote: “Life is 10 percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.”
author: Lou Holtz

quote: “Do not let the hero in your soul parish, in lonely frustration, for the life you deserved but never have been able to reach. Check your road and the nature of your battle. The world you desired can be won. It exists, it is real, it is possible, it is yours.”
author: Ayn Rand

quote: “Be humble for you are made of earth. Be noble for you are made of stars.”
author: Serbian Proverb

quote: “The reward of a thing well done is having done it.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “It's okay to be a loser, it just depends on how good you are at being one.”
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: “The purpose of life is not to be happy—but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.”
author: Leo Rosten

quote: “Undisturbed calmness of mind is attained by cultivating friendliness toward the happy, compassion for the unhappy, delight in the virtuous, and indifference toward the wicked.”
author: Patanjali

quote: “Libraries store the energy that fuels the imagination. They open up windows to the world and inspire us to explore and achieve, and contribute to improving our quality of life. Libraries change lives for the better.”
author: Sidney Sheldon

quote: “Fortune does favor the bold and you'll never know what you're capable of if you don't try.”
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: “It is better to live one day as a lion than 100 years as a sheep.”
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: “My goal is this: always to put myself in the place in which I am best able to serve, wherever my gifts and qualities find the best soil to grow, the widest field of action. There is no other goal.”
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: “Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “It had never occurred to me that our lives, which had been so closely interwoven, could unravel with such speed.”
author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quote: “Some want to live within the soundOf church or chapel bell;I want to run a rescue shop,Within a yard of hell.”
author: C.T. Studd

quote: “Fear not the path of Truth for the lack of People walking on it.”
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: “All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.”
author: Byron Katie

quote: “You don't always have to kiss a lot of frogs to recognize a prince when you find one -Henrietta Barett”
author: Julia Quinn

quote: “The heart of wisdom is tolerance.”
author: Steven Erikson

quote: “Distance was a dangerous thing, she knew. Distance changed people.”
author: Rohinton Mistry

quote: “Never follow the crowd.”
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: “Be compassionate ... and take responsibility for each other. If we only learned those lessons, this world would be a better place.”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “When you're good at something, you'll tell everyone. When you're great at something, they'll tell you.”
author: Walter Payton

quote: “Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.”
author: Robert Macfarlane

quote: “For the world is in a bad state, but everything will become still worse unless each of us does his best.”
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: “We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.”
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: “I am fallen, flawed and imperfect. Yet drenched in the grace and mercy that is found in Jesus Christ, there is strength”
author: Adam Young

quote: “May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.”
author: Kate Forsyth

quote: “If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.”
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: “And I think that's what our world is desperately in need of - lovers, people who are building deep, genuine relationships with fellow strugglers along the way, and who actually know the faces of the people behind the issues they are concerned about.”
author: Shane Claiborne

quote: “Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.”
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: “Don't feel stupid if you don't like what everyone else pretends to love.”
author: Emma Watson

quote: “Don't turn over the rocks if you don't want to see the pale creatures who live under them.”
author: Janet Fitch

quote: “If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “He who speaks without an attentive ear is mute.”
author: Stephen King

quote: “I wish I could make him understand that a loving good heart is riches enough, and that without it intellect is poverty.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: “I attribute my success to this:—I never gave or took an excuse.”
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: “The world is full of painful stories. Sometimes it seems as though there aren't any other kind and yet I found myself thinking how beautiful that glint of water was through the trees.”
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: “You can't change the wind but you can set your sails.”
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: “Choices, numberless as grains of sand, had layered and compressed, coalescing into sediment, then into rock, until all was set in stone.”
author: Tara Westover

quote: “That's why I'm sorry. I'm sorry because you shouldn't have to be everything to me. I had you, but I'd forgotten that I had myself too. It's a new feeling, something I'm getting used to.”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “Everything is within your power,and your power is within you.”
author: Janice Trachtman

quote: “You are old beyond your years Zoeybird. Believe in yourself and you will find a way. But remember darkness does not always equate to evil just like light does not always bring good.”
author: P.C. Cast

quote: “After all, if you do not resist the apparently inevitable, you will never know how inevitable the inevitable was.”
author: Terry Eagleton

quote: “Though we tremble before uncertain futuresmay we meet illness, death and adversity with strengthmay we dance in the face of our fears.”
author: Gloria Anzaldúa

quote: “Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.”
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “If I am truly to become an autonomous woman, then I must take over that role of being my own guardian...I not only have to become my own husband, but I need to be my own father, too.”
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: “There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.”
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: “Teachers are the one and only people who save nations.”
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: “Always ask yourself: "What will happen if I say nothing?”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Only one life, ’twill soon be past,Only what’s done for Christ will last.”
author: C.T. Studd

quote: “If you hear how wonderful you are often enough, you begin to believe it, no matter how you try to resist it.”
author: Ben Carson

quote: “Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.”
author: Mother Teresa

quote: “Rogerson," I asked him sweetly as we sat watching a video in the pool house, "where would I find the pelagic zone?""In the open sea," he said. "Now shut up and eat your Junior Mints.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “If gold rusts, what then can iron do?”
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: “With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.”
author: William Wordsworth

quote: “impossible is not a word”
author: Obert Skye

quote: “There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance.”
author: Ali Bin Abi Thalib

quote: “It is this belief in a power larger than myself and other than myself which allows me to venture into the unknown and even the unknowable.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “There is no point in keeping vengeance or stubbornness. These things" -he sighed- "these things I so regret in my life. Pride. Vanity. Why do we do the things we do? Morrie Schwartz”
author: Mitch Albom

quote: “Buy a pup and your money will buyLove unflinching that cannot lie.”
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: “Because I am a woman, I must make unusual efforts to succeed. If I fail, no one will say, 'She doesn't have what it takes." ~ ' They will say, 'Women don't have what it takes." -”
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: “We live out our lives as we are meant to live them-with some choice, with some chance, but mostly as a result of the persons we are.”
author: Terry Brooks

quote: “Hearts can't be broken because they're made of marzipan.”
author: Kerstin Gier

quote: “Fourscore and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent, a new nation, conceived in Liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal.”
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: “There are not enough days in forever to allow me to fully express the depth of my love for you.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “I don’t want anyone to hold back who they are. It’s not okay… it’s not a good thing”
author: Connor Franta

quote: “As for what it's against - the story is against those who pervert and misuse religion, or any other kind of doctrine with a holy book and a priesthood and an apparatus of power that wields unchallengeable authority, in order to dominate and suppress human freedoms.”
author: Philip Pullman

quote: “Because people don't have wings... We look for ways to fly.”
author: Haruichi Furudate

quote: “When I try, I fail. When I trust, He succeeds.”
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: “My atheism, like that of Spinoza, is true piety towards the universe and denies only gods fashioned by men in their own image, to be servants of their human interests.”
author: George Santayana

quote: “The trouble with fiction," said John Rivers, "is that it makes too much sense. Reality never makes sense.”
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: “The heart is like a woman, and the head is like a man, and although man is the head of woman, woman is the heart of man, and she turns man's head because she turns his heart.”
author: Peter Kreeft

quote: “O love, O fire! once he drewWith one long kiss my whole soul throughMy lips, as sunlight drinketh dew.”
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: “There is no illusion greater than fear.”
author: Lao Tzu Tao Teh Ching

quote: “To those who, in spite of everything, still choose goodness”
author: Marie Lu

quote: “Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of its trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse for impossibility, for it thinks all things are lawful for itself and all things are possible”
author: Thomas A. Kempis

quote: “I am buoyant and expansive and uncontainable--but I always was so, only I never knew it!”
author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

quote: “Have faith have faith. When you have nothing else have faith.”
author: Francine Rivers

quote: “There is only one who is all powerful, and his greatest weapon is love.”
author: Stan Lee

quote: “Don't let anyone take care of you. Can you maybe leave that for me to do? I mean, take care of you? Feel free to take care of me in return... because I think I'll need you to do that.”
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: “Now you people have names. That's because you don't know who you are. We know who we are, so we don't need names.”
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: “Yes, terrible things happen, but sometimes those terrible things- they save you.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “She was broken, I think it’s because she loved too much and she was always blind to the fact that love too is sometimes broken.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.”
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: “Four things to learn in life: To think clearly without hurry or confusion; To love everybody sincerely; To act in everything with the highest motives; To trust God unhesitatingly.”
author: Helen Keller

quote: “Love cures people, both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.”
author: Karl Menninger

quote: “How can you trust me, after what your own brother did to you?""Because he was false", said Damen, "and you are true. I have never known a truer man.”
author: C.S. Pacat

quote: “It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.”
author: Jane Hamilton

quote: “Dance like you're stamping on a human face forever, love like you've been in a serious car crash that minced the front of your brain, stab like no one can arrest you, and live like there's no such thing as God.”
author: Warren Ellis

quote: “How strange is man that when he is afraid of something he runs away from it, but when he is afraid of Allah, he gets closer to Him.”
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “It's been said that love finds you when you're ready.”
author: James Patterson; Maxine Paetro

quote: “Mother is a verb. It's something you do. Not just who you are.”
author: Cheryl Lacey Donovan

quote: “When she listened to songs that she loved on the radio, something stirred inside her. A liquid ache spread under her skin, and she walked out of the world like a witch.”
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: “Man is born broken. He lives by mending. The grace of God is glue.”
author: Eugene O'Neill

quote: “Just for the record: happiness is not bullshit.”
author: Andrew Sean Greer

quote: “Were knowledge all, what were our needTo thrill and faint and sweetly bleed?”
author: Christopher Brennan

quote: “If I look at the mass I will never act.”
author: Mother Teresa

quote: “Hard work is only a prison sentence when you lack motivation”
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: “Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.”
author: Victor Hugo

quote: “One must work and dare if one really wants to live.”
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: “Everytime I plant a seed,he say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow.”
author: Bob Marley

quote: “When I pictured myself, it was always like just an outline in a colouring book, with the inside not yet completed.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “The sidelines may be safer but life is played on the field”
author: Wendy Mass

quote: “And sometimes focusing on what you can control is the only way to lessen the pang in your chest when you think about the things you can't.”
author: Elizabeth Acevedo

quote: “Brimstone once told me that to stay true in the face of evil is a feat of strength.”
author: Laini Taylor

quote: “I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.”
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: “There isa time to liveand a time to diebut never to reject the moment.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: “The whole summer lay ahead of us-time to rest, time to wait. And when the future comes-no matter what comes with it-I'll be smarter. I'll be stronger. I'll be ready.”
author: Ally Carter

quote: “I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If you don’t have the time to do something right, where are you going to find the time to fix it?”
author: Stephen King

quote: “Have love for your inner Self and everything else is done for you.”
author: Amit Ray

quote: “We're called to be faithful, to take those first difficult steps--and to leave the results up to God.”
author: Alex  Harris

quote: “It occurred to me by intuition, and music was the driving force behind that intuition. My discovery was the result of musical perception.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “What she had long believed was not true, and now the world was wide open to discover what was.It is like all my life I thought the sky was green.”
author: Shannon Hale

quote: “A great human revolution in just a single individual will help achieve a change in the destiny of a nation and, further, can even enable a change in the destiny of all humankind.”
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: “Better to shun the bait than struggle in the snare.”
author: William Blake

quote: “I want you to have big dreams, big goals. I want you to strive to achieve them. But I don't want to see you beating yourself up every time you make a mistake.”
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: “Worrying is arrogant because God knows what He's doing.”
author: Barbara Cameron

quote: “In spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart. I simply can't build up my hopes on a foundation consisting of confusion, misery and death.”
author: Anne Frank

quote: “I don't regret the painful times; I bare my scars as if they were medals.”
author: Paolo Coelho

quote: “We are constantly trying to hold it all together. If you really want to see why you do things, then don't do them and see what happens.”
author: Michael A. Singer

quote: “A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.”
author: W.C. Fields

quote: “Life is short. Kiss slowly, laugh insanely, love truly and forgive quickly”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “We never know how high we are till we are called to rise. Then if we are true to form our statures touch the skies.”
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: “I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.”
author: John Cage

quote: “People are always telling me that i'm not like other girls...that i dont dress like other girls...that i dont act like other girls. But i'm my OWN person...i go to the beat of my own drum.”
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: “To separate oneself from the burden, the angst, the anguish that we all encounter everyday. To say I am alive, I am wonderful, I am. I am. That is something to aspire to.”
author: Garth Stein

quote: “Appreciate the moment of a first kiss; it may be the last time you own your heart.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “Society will always be too fragile to accept us for all that makes us beautiful.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “So what? You're another person, so of course you look different. What do you need to be ashamed for?”
author: Yana Toboso

quote: “I don't think you should wait. I think you should speak now.”
author: Taylor Swift

quote: “Read books. Care about things. Get excited. Try not to be too down on youself. Enjoy the ever present game of knowing.”
author: Hank Green

quote: “Indeed, the more we find to love, the more we add to the measure of our hearts.”
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: “Strength is Life, Weakness is Death.Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death.Love is Life, Hatred is Death.”
author: Vivekananda

quote: “A successful marriage requires falling in love many times -- always with the same person.”
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: “The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he EMBRACES you.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “You have forgotten the Onewho doesn't care about ownership,who doesn't try to turn a profitfrom every human exchange.”
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quote: “Your humans slaughter each other because of the color of your skin, or your faith or your plitics -- or for no reason at all -- too many of you hate as easily as you draw breath. - Magneto”
author: Stan Lee

quote: “Even in the far future,never forget the you of right nowWherever you are right now,you’re just taking a break”
author: BTS

quote: “Watch for the thing that will show itself to you. Because that thing, when you find it, will be your future.”
author: Arthur Golden

quote: “God is God. He knows what he is doing. When you can’t trace his hand, trust his heart.”
author: Max Lucado (Grace for the Moment)

quote: “True beauty lies in purity of the heart.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: “If there never was a night or day and memories could fade away, then we'd be nothing left but the dreams we made”
author: Selena Gomez

quote: “If I work hard enough, there will be things I can do tomorrow that I can't do today.”
author: Randy Pausch

quote: “Failure is a greater teacher than success”
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

quote: “You often feel tired, not because you've done too much, but because you've done too little of what sparks a light in you.”
author: Alexander Den Heijer

quote: “No matter how safe and beautiful it is, a cage is still a cage.”
author: Jessica Spotswood

quote: “Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in life.”
author: Lilly Singh

quote: “To do something that you feel in your heart that's great, you need to make a lot of mistakes. Anything that's successful is a series of mistakes.”
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: “I believe in some blending of hope and sunshine sweetening the worst lots. I believe that this life is not all; neither the beginning nor the end. I believe while I tremble; I trust while I weep.”
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: “Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure”
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: “Onward and Upward! To Narnia and the North!”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.”
author: Michelle Obama

quote: “I do like the world quite a lot.”
author: Shannon Hale

quote: “Go and get your things,' he said. 'Dreams mean work.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Everyone kept telling me not to worry someone will do something. No one did so I became someone and did something.”
author: Mark A. Cooper

quote: “When I was One,I had just begun.When I was Two,I was nearly new.When I was ThreeI was hardly me.When I was Four,I was not much more.When I was Five, I was just alive.But now I am Six, I'm as clever as clever,So I think I'll be six now for ever and ever.”
author: A.A. Milne

quote: “God is whispering in your heart, in the whole existence, just tune your ears.”
author: Amit Ray

quote: “she lived with hurricane eyes and fell in love with the way the waves collapsed against her cheeks.”
author: Christopher Poindexter

quote: “Mistakes. Trial and error. Same thing. Mistakes are how we learned to walk and run and that hot things burn when you touch them. You’ve made mistakes all your life and you’re going to keep making them.”
author: Tamara Ireland Stone

quote: “For too many centuries women have been being muses to artists. I wanted to be the muse, I wanted to be the wife of the artist, but I was really trying to avoid the final issue — that I had to do the job myself.”
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: “In your own life it's important to know how spectacular you are.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Behind all seen things lies something vaster; everything is but a path, a portal or a window opening on something other than iteself. ”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: “But there's always a first time for everything”
author: Melissa de la Cruz

quote: “This was not a fearie tale. This was not the movies. This was life. It hurt more. It was excruciating. It was excruciatingly beautiful.”
author: Francesca Lia Block

quote: “I don't believe in hate. To me it wastes too much time. People who hate waste so much of their life hating that they miss out on all the other stuff out here.”
author: Jaycee Dugard

quote: “If you're serious about sanctification, you can expect to experience heart-wrenching moments that try your faith, your endurance, and your patience.”
author: Sheri L. Dew

quote: “In what will survive meI am in harmonywith my annihilation.”
author: Georges Bataille

quote: “Evil exists in us all, Torak. Some fight it. Some feed it. That's how it's always been.”
author: Michelle Paver

quote: “What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.”
author: Jason Fried

quote: “Self-esteem comes from being able to define the world in your own terms and refusing to abide by the judgments of others.”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “Here lies one whose name was writ on water.”
author: John Keats

quote: “Tell all the Truth but tell it slant--Success in Circuit liesToo bright for our infirm DelightThe Truth's superb surpriseAs Lightning to the Children easedWith explanation kindThe Truth must dazzle graduallyOr every man be blind--”
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: “The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison, was the miracle.”
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: “Can a dream be wrong? Aren't dreams God's way of telling you things?”
author: Ellen Hopkins

quote: “Sometimes success isn't about making the right decision, it's more about making some decision.”
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: “Philosophy of science is about as useful to scientists as ornithology is to birds.”
author: Richard Feynman

quote: “I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “Life doesn't just happen to you; youreceive everything in your life based on what you've given.”
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: “Living never wore one so much as the effort not to live.”
author: Anais Nin

quote: “Dreams are the language of God.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “I can tell you I love you as many times as you can stand to hear it, but all it does is remind us that love is not enough. Not even close.”
author: Mark Andrus

quote: “If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “Make visible what, without you, might perhaps never have been seen.”
author: Robert Bresson

quote: “If you're really listening, if you're awake to the poignant beauty of the world, your heart breaks regularly. In fact, your heart is made to break; its purpose is to burst open again and again so that it can hold evermore wonders.”
author: Andrew Harvey

quote: “You do not have to struggle to reach God, but you do have to struggle to tear away the self-created veil that hides him from you”
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: “Good ideas stay with you until you eventually write the story.”
author: Brian Keene

quote: “That's what you want to do? Then nothing beats a trial but a failure. Give it everything you've got. I've told you many times, 'Cant do is like Dont Care.' Neither of them have a home.”
author: Maya Angelou

quote: “If you have not done things worthy of being written about, at least write things worthy of being read.”
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: “What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?”
author: Robert Schuller

quote: “Sometimes we know in our bones what we really need to do, but we're afraid to do it. Taking a chance and stepping beyond the safety of the world we've always known is the only way to grow, though and without risk there is no reward.”
author: Wil Wheaton

quote: “It used to be about trying to do something. Now it's about trying to be someone.”
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: “If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “The word 'listen' contains the same letters as the word 'silent'.”
author: Alfred Brendel

quote: “We had the experience but missed the meaning. And approach to the meaning restores the experience in a different form.”
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: “I shut my eyes in order to see.”
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: “It was stupid to hope, she knew. But sometimes hope was all you had.”
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: “The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “I had to learn to live without you and I couldn't make sense of it, because I left so much of me inside of you.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “People don't believe what you tell them.They rarely believe what you show them.They often believe what their friends tell them.They always believe what they tell themselves.”
author: Seth Godin

quote: “A truth that no one knows is still the truth.”
author: Sharon Shinn

quote: “Never miss an opportunity to show your love, especially to those close to you, because we are always at our most cautious with them for fear of being hurt.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “It is easier, far easier, to obey another than to command oneself.”
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: “Those who use religion for their own benefit are detestable. We are against such a situation and will not allow it. Those who use religion in such a manner have fooled our people; it is against just such people that we have fought and will continue to fight.”
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: “It is beautiful to discover our wings and learn how to fly; flight is a beautiful process. But then to rest on the wings of God as He flies: this is divine.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.”
author: Richard Denney

quote: “If the world is to be healed through human efforts, I am convinced it will be by ordinary people, people whose love for this life is even greater than their fear.”
author: Joanna R. Macy

quote: “Me with nothing left to lose, plotting my big revenge in the spotlight. Give me violent revenge fantasies as a coping mechanism.”
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: “The boat is safer anchored at the port; but that’s not the aim of boats.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Keep your head in the clouds and your hands on the keyboard.”
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: “Some battles don’t have a winner. Sometimes the best a good general can hope for is a ceasefire”
author: Emma Chase

quote: “I can’t cry so I have to laugh.”
author: Maria Nhambu

quote: “I have already settled it for myself so flattery and criticism go down the same drain and I am quite free.”
author: Georgia O'Keefe

quote: “Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.”
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: “There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.”
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: “You know me better than you think, you know, and you shall know me better yet.”
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: “Suddenly, everything was beautiful. The way she viewed the world was nothing more but a reflection of herself.”
author: robert m drake

quote: “If everyone helps to hold up the sky, then one person does not become tired.”
author: Askhari Johnson Hodari

quote: “There is nothing more important than your eternal salvation.”
author: Kirk Cameron

quote: “Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.”
author: Les Brown

quote: “The world is so full of a number of things, I ’m sure we should all be as happy as kings.”
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: “No one lights a lamp in order to hide it behind the door: the purpose of light is to create more light, to open people's eyes, to reveal the marvels around.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Being against evil doesn't make you good. Tonight I was against it and then I was evil myself. I could feel it coming just like a tide... I just want to destroy them. But when you start taking pleasure in it you are awfully close to the thing you're fighting.”
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: “Inspiration comes of working every day.”
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: “... just because [butterflies'] lives were short didn't mean they were tragic... See, they have a beautiful life.”
author: Lisa Genova

quote: “Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.”
author: Germany Kent

quote: “Coming from your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man!”
author: Stan Lee

quote: “In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.”
author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quote: “A monkey glances up and sees a banana, and that's as far as he looks. A visionary looks up and sees the moon.”
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: “Nobody sees a flower - really - it is so small it takes time - we haven't time - and to see takes time, like to have a friend takes time.”
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: “In a strong relationship, you should love your companion more than you need them.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “The Lord is my shepherd. I shall not want for nothing. He makes me lie down in the green pastures. He greases up my head with oil. He gives me kung-fu in the face of my enemies. Amen”
author: Stephen King

quote: “Our men think earning money and ordering around others is where power lies. They don't think power is in the hands of the woman who takes care of everyone all day long, and gives birth to their children.”
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: “Tough times don't last, tough people do, remember?”
author: Gregory Peck

quote: “The major work of the world is not done by geniuses. It is done by ordinary people, with balance in their lives, who have learned to work in an extraordinary manner.”
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: “I was good and bad, but never wicked.”
author: Anne Rice

quote: “Silent acquiescence in the face of tyranny is no better than outright agreement.”
author: C.J. Redwine

quote: “Percy let me go, she croaked. You can't pull me up. Never”
author: Rick Riordan

quote: “On Wednesday, when the sky is blue,and I have nothing else to do,I sometimes wonder if it's true That who is what and what is who." - Winnie-the-Pooh”
author: A.A. Milne

quote: “The important thing is not the object of love, but the emotion itself.”
author: Gore Vidal
